String.Source: Suddenly I don't feel like fighting. But I do feel like taking a nap. I think I'll do that.
String.Dest: Suddenly I don't feel like fighting. But I do feel like taking a nap. I think I'll do that.

String.Source: What did you do? Wait...let me guess. You've turned me into a woman. No, an Orc! A goat? Funny, I don't feel like chewing cud.
String.Dest: What did you do? Wait...let me guess. You've turned me into a woman. No, an Orc! A goat? Funny, I don't feel like chewing cud.

String.Source: Wow, a healing spell. Is there anything you can't do? If there is, it's probably something stupid anyway.
String.Dest: Wow, a healing spell. Is there anything you can't do? If there is, it's probably something stupid anyway.

String.Source: Ah, that feels good.
String.Dest: 啊，那感觉真不错。

String.Source: Wow, look at me! Did I always have these muscles? Ask me for directions so I can show them to you.
String.Dest: Wow, look at me! Did I always have these muscles? Ask me for directions so I can show them to you.

String.Source: Invisible at last. Think of all the things we can do, and all the things we can get away with. This is permanent, right?
String.Dest: Invisible at last. Think of all the things we can do, and all the things we can get away with. This is permanent, right?

String.Source: Danger ahead. About twenty, no thirty of them! Oh gods wait, there's even more higher up!
String.Dest: Danger ahead. About twenty, no thirty of them! Oh gods wait, there's even more higher up!

String.Source: I'm talking about steps of course. There can't be more than a half a dozen Forsworn.
String.Dest: I'm talking about steps of course. There can't be more than a half a dozen Forsworn.

String.Source: But killing them should be easy. Climbing those steps...now that's murder.
String.Dest: But killing them should be easy. Climbing those steps...now that's murder.

String.Source: This place is freezing. If I see one more bandit with his shirt off I say we ask them their secret before killing them.
String.Dest: This place is freezing. If I see one more bandit with his shirt off I say we ask them their secret before killing them.

String.Source: Uh oh, bears. They seem like the angry type. Although granted, we did just break into their home.
String.Dest: Uh oh, bears. They seem like the angry type. Although granted, we did just break into their home.

String.Source: I think I hear a Draugr shuffling his feet. Someone should really tell them it's bad for your posture.
String.Dest: I think I hear a Draugr shuffling his feet. Someone should really tell them it's bad for your posture.

String.Source: Something tells me the Draugr aren't going to let us just walk up and take that bottle.
String.Dest: Something tells me the Draugr aren't going to let us just walk up and take that bottle.

String.Source: All right, I'm not sure whose turn it is to pay the bandit toll, but I'd rather not be squished by boulders. I suppose we could just go around.
String.Dest: 好吧，我不确定轮到谁来付强盗们的买路财了，不过我可不想被那些大石头砸成泥。我觉得我们应该走别的地方。

String.Source: Bandits ahead. Please resist the temptation to start mining the ore around us.
String.Dest: 前方有贼。请勿采矿。

String.Source: Huh. I smell mead. I must be going crazy.
String.Dest: 哈。我闻到蜜酒的味道了。我一定快疯了。

String.Source: Okay, I know it's kind of late to be bringing this up now, but do you really think we should save Fjola? Her husband didn't exactly seem...sane.
String.Dest: 好吧，我知道现在有点儿晚了，但你真的认为我们应该救下菲欧拉吗？她的丈夫看起来完全没有……理智。

String.Source: Seems like it'd be trading one prison for another. Only this one's more of an asylum.
String.Dest: 感觉像是从一个监牢被带到了另一个监牢.只是这个监牢更像一个庇护所。

String.Source: Spider webs! Wait, spiders are coordinating the caravan attacks? Wow. I'm trying really hard not to admire them but it's not as easy as you'd think.
String.Dest: 蜘蛛网！等等，蜘蛛与马车遭袭有关？哇哦，我一直努力地不去吸引蜘蛛的注意力但要做到这点比你想象得要难啊。

String.Source: So did they just run out of bones when making those chimes? Because there seems to be a huge gap in the middle where we can walk right through.
String.Dest: 这么说他们做那些编钟的时候把骨头都用完了吗？因为那边看起来中间有个畅通无阻的大缺口。

String.Source: I'm sure whatever's beyond that fence is extremely dangerous. You know, just once I'd like to look behind one of them and find a basket of kittens.
String.Dest: 我敢说围墙外面的东西肯定都极端地危险。你知道，有一次我看出去居然看见了一篮子小猫哎。

String.Source: Ooh, Jazbay grapes. It used to be illegal to pick those, back when they had more flavor. But now that they're bland nobody cares.
String.Dest: 哦，架子湾葡萄。在过去，采摘它们是违法的，因为那时的味道无比香醇。但现在，那味道平淡的无人问津。

String.Source: How can that pressure plate be connected to anything? It's smack dab in the middle of nowhere. I say we just walk across. It's a bluff.
String.Dest: 哪儿有什么机关链接到那个踏板啊？它附近什么东西也没有。要我说咱就走过去算了，完全是虚张声势。

String.Source: Danger ahead. This is the part where we both conjure up some courage. If only I knew the spell.
String.Dest: 前方有危险！到了这儿咱俩都得鼓起勇气才行。我要是会那个法术就好了。

String.Source: Look at the size of that spider! Funny thing is, it's huge, but I bet it's the worst mage out of all of them.
String.Dest: 看看那些庞大的蜘蛛！虽然他们长得那么大，我打赌一个最糟糕的法师也能从他们那里逃出来。

String.Source: Let's reunite a talking dog with its master by killing a cult of vampires! Just another sentence that has never been uttered by anyone ever.
String.Dest: 让我们把这窖吸血鬼全杀了，好让一个会说话的狗和他的主人团聚吧。我只是有啥说啥罢了。

String.Source: I wonder what we'll find in this cave. Vampires? Trolls? Spiders? With our luck it'll probably be vampire trolls mounted on spiders.
String.Dest: 我不知道我们会在这个洞穴里发现什么。吸血鬼？巨魔？蜘蛛？或许我们运气很好的是吸血鬼、巨魔加蜘蛛。

String.Source: Uh oh, another puzzle. Wasn't the first trial proof enough that you're Dragonborn? Or does Ulfric know "Whirlwind Sprint" as well?
String.Dest: Uh oh, another puzzle. Wasn't the first trial proof enough that you're Dragonborn? Or does Ulfric know "Whirlwind Sprint" as well?

String.Source: There's a witch. Just one though. How many heads did we need to get, anyway? I'm asking because they'll probably start to smell after a day or two.
String.Dest: There's a witch. Just one though. How many heads did we need to get, anyway? I'm asking because they'll probably start to smell after a day or two.

String.Source: So given where we are and the sentries posted outside, I think this might be a smuggling operation. I hope I don't run into anyone I know.
String.Dest: 从我们所处的位置以及外面这一大堆站岗的哨兵来看，我觉着这大概是个走私行为吧。但愿我不会撞见熟人。

String.Source: A tunnel of blades and a room full of coffins. So a vivisection followed by a burial! Wonderful.
String.Dest: A tunnel of blades and a room full of coffins. So a vivisection followed by a burial! Wonderful.

String.Source: So something killed that deer but didn't bother to eat it. Maybe it found something tastier further down.
String.Dest: So something killed that deer but didn't bother to eat it. Maybe it found something tastier further down.

String.Source: A vampire thrall. Aw...it looks so peaceful sitting there, with its wine and its bowl of bloody skulls.
String.Dest: A vampire thrall. Aw...it looks so peaceful sitting there, with its wine and its bowl of bloody skulls.

String.Source: Oh good, more mages. I'm rather enjoying killing them. Damn conjurers are always looking down on us bladebinders.
String.Dest: 哦，太好了，一堆法师。我就是喜欢干掉他们。该死的施法者老是瞧不起我们武士。

String.Source: I think I see danger ahead. And wouldn't you know it, I think my back just went out on me. Really.
String.Dest: I think I see danger ahead. And wouldn't you know it, I think my back just went out on me. Really.

String.Source: You know, at some point, all these apologies kind of ring hollow.
String.Dest: You know, at some point, all these apologies kind of ring hollow.

String.Source: Like really, I get that you're sorry, but you know what'd really be nice? You not trying to kill me.
String.Dest: Like really, I get that you're sorry, but you know what'd really be nice? You not trying to kill me.

String.Source: Wow, a city beneath a city. The one upstairs must be the one they show the neighbors in order to look more modest.
String.Dest: Wow, a city beneath a city. The one upstairs must be the one they show the neighbors in order to look more modest.

String.Source: Oh good, a river! I'm so tired of drinking wine and snow.
String.Dest: 哦太好了，一条河！我已经厌倦用雪和葡萄酒解渴了。

String.Source: Oh wow, look at this place. I think it's illegal for anywhere in Skyrim to have this much color.
String.Dest: Oh wow, look at this place. I think it's illegal for anywhere in Skyrim to have this much color.

String.Source: This view would be a lot more amazing if I wasn't terrified at the prospect of a bandit creeping up behind us.
String.Dest: 要是我之前没有被身后埋伏的强盗吓着的话现在的场面应该更壮观。

String.Source: Oh, I thought I recognized this place. This is Pinewatch. They know me here. Although they don't really like me, either.
String.Dest: 啊，我想我认识这个地方。这是松木哨塔。这的人认识我，尽管他们不怎么喜欢我。

String.Source: Oh Gods, I can actually breathe again! Well, I could breathe back in that ruin, but it was rather unpleasant to do so. Oh, and look, a nice view!
String.Dest: 哦天哪，我终于又能呼吸了！呃，其实我在遗迹也能呼吸，但那么做感觉挺恶心的。噢，看哪，这风景太美了！

String.Source: Oh look, a Dwarven ruin! And Falmer huts! Those are like the barnacles of the underground sea.
String.Dest: 哦，看，一个矮人废墟！还有那些雪精灵小屋！这些小屋看起来就像是附着在海底的藤壶一样。

String.Source: Oh Gods, something's coming out of the water! Griffins! Run for your life! Run for..oh. They're just statues. My mistake.
String.Dest: Oh Gods, something's coming out of the water! Griffins! Run for your life! Run for..oh. They're just statues. My mistake.

String.Source: There are more guards here than at the Emperor's wedding. Calcelmo must really love his research.
String.Dest: There are more guards here than at the Emperor's wedding. Calcelmo must really love his research.

String.Source: This is an impressive little cave. Although not as impressive as moving that boulder away from the entrance. I still don't know how Karliah did that.
String.Dest: 这真是个不错的小洞窟。不过不比卡莉亚清开入口那些巨石那样令人震惊。我一直不知道她是如何做到的。

String.Source: Wow, another giant orb. This one's even bigger than the one in Winterhold. Maybe it's the other one's armor.
String.Dest: 哇哦，另一个巨大的球体。甚至比冬堡的那个更大，也许这是某个巨人的盔甲.

String.Source: Look at all this construction. Maybe these vampires are tunneling their way to Akavir. Maybe someone told them their rivers flow with blood.
String.Dest: Look at all this construction. Maybe these vampires are tunneling their way to Akavir. Maybe someone told them their rivers flow with blood.

String.Source: Wow, look at this place. I wonder who it was that was buried here before the Gauldur boy.
String.Dest: Wow, look at this place. I wonder who it was that was buried here before the Gauldur boy.

String.Source: Brittleshin Pass. Last time I was here, there was an icicle sticking out of the Nord sculpture's nose. Oh, it's still there. How embarrassing.
String.Dest: Brittleshin Pass. Last time I was here, there was an icicle sticking out of the Nord sculpture's nose. Oh, it's still there. How embarrassing.

String.Source: Wow, it's like another world inside this cavern. Waterfalls, trees...and yes, bloodthirsty Spriggans and corpses too, but that's just being finicky.
String.Dest: Wow, it's like another world inside this cavern. Waterfalls, trees...and yes, bloodthirsty Spriggans and corpses too, but that's just being finicky.

String.Source: The Dwemer Museum. Are there Dwarven sphere jousts and taffy treats made by Centurions? Huh? Of course I've been to a museum before.
String.Dest: 矮人博物馆。这些矮人球和太妃糖条是由百夫长制造的么？呵呵？我之前当然去过博物馆了。

String.Source: Will you look at that? That's amazing! And...and is that wall talking? Tell me you hear it too.
String.Dest: Will you look at that? That's amazing! And...and is that wall talking? Tell me you hear it too.

String.Source: Excuse me, I think I dropped my jaw somewhere.
String.Dest: 抱歉，我惊呆了。

String.Source: Whenever I come across one of these Dwarven ruins, I always pray I won't see an actual Dwarf. That would mean I've disappeared too.
String.Dest: 任何时候我来这些矮人遗迹时，我总是祈祷不要让我遇上真正的矮人。 那意味着我将从去另外一个世界了。

String.Source: You found a Nord ruin. You're so good at adventuring it scares me. I'm the same way with procrastination.
String.Dest: You found a Nord ruin. You're so good at adventuring it scares me. I'm the same way with procrastination.

String.Source: A cave. What will we find, trouble or treasure?
String.Dest: 有个洞穴。里面会有什么呢，危险还是宝藏？

String.Source: Cave up ahead. Tread carefully.
String.Dest: 你先进洞。小心脚下。

String.Source: Look. A cave. Plenty of gold inside, I hope.
String.Dest: 看，一个山洞。希望里面有很多财宝。

String.Source: There's a cave here. Maybe we should check it out.
String.Dest: 这有个洞穴，咱们进去看看？

String.Source: Hey, there's a cave here. Animals, bandits, or maybe both.
String.Dest: 嘿，这儿有个洞穴。野兽，强盗，说不定都有。

String.Source: Old ruins. Nordic, by the looks of it.
String.Dest: 从外观上能看出来，这是座古代的诺德遗迹。

String.Source: Nord ruins. How long do you think they've stood here?
String.Dest: 诺德遗迹。你认为它矗立于此多久了？

String.Source: A Nord ruin. Thousands of years old.
String.Dest: 一座诺德遗迹。可能有上千年的历史了。

String.Source: Old stonework. Gold, traps, and bones.
String.Dest: 古老石雕制品，金币、陷阱和骨头。

String.Source: A Dwarven city. Remarkable.
String.Dest: 一座矮人城市。真是不同寻常。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. Old cities, old ghosts.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。古老的城市，古老的幽灵。

String.Source: By the Divines, look. A Dwarven city.
String.Dest: 圣灵在上。看，一座矮人城市。

String.Source: Legend says Dwarven ruins are haunted. I'd rather not find out.
String.Dest: 传说矮人废墟闹鬼。我情愿没找到这里。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Business has been...okay. We're making profits, I think. Here, have some.
String.Dest: Business has been...okay. We're making profits, I think. Here, have some.

String.Source: Great, I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 太好了，我在那儿等你。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Great, I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 太好了，我在那儿等你。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园。

String.Source: Great, I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 太好了，我在那儿等你。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 很好。我会在那儿等你。

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 很好。我会在那儿等你。

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 很好。我会在那儿等你。

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 很好。我会在那儿等你。

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: Great. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 很好。我会在那儿等你。

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: We're married! All that's left is deciding on a place to live. Just don't say my place. Because that's technically Ulundil's.
String.Dest: We're married! All that's left is deciding on a place to live. Just don't say my place. Because that's technically Ulundil's.

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: What? You mean you want me to cook? Well, that's a fantastic idea, because I happen to be an excellent one.
String.Dest: What? You mean you want me to cook? Well, that's a fantastic idea, because I happen to be an excellent one.

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: I think I'm going to make seared slaughterfish with a side of steamed carrots and fried cabbage.
String.Dest: I think I'm going to make seared slaughterfish with a side of steamed carrots and fried cabbage.

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Or you can eat whatever you brought home. You know, chewy, four-day old mystery meat.
String.Dest: Or you can eat whatever you brought home. You know, chewy, four-day old mystery meat.

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: I cooked this and I'm quite proud of it. I think you might have married a culinary genius.
String.Dest: I cooked this and I'm quite proud of it. I think you might have married a culinary genius.

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Why, a homecooked meal of course! What's in it? Would you believe me if I said magic?
String.Dest: Why, a homecooked meal of course! What's in it? Would you believe me if I said magic?

String.Source: What do you have planned for dinner, love?
String.Dest: What do you have planned for dinner, love?

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: These masterpieces take time. Ask me again later.
String.Dest: These masterpieces take time. Ask me again later.

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Oh? Where should we move to?
String.Dest: Oh? Where should we move to?

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得去别的什么地方。

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 霜宅，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Your old place would suit us just fine.
String.Dest: 你的老地方会很适合我们的。

String.Source: Alright. I'll get everything packed and meet you there.
String.Dest: 好吧。我会打包所有行李跟你在那边见面。

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
String.Dest: 再见，我的宝贝。

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
String.Dest: 再见，我的宝贝。

String.Source: Safe travels, love.
String.Dest: Safe travels, love.

String.Source: Take care, my love.
String.Dest: Take care, my love.

String.Source: I'll be here if you need me.
String.Dest: I'll be here if you need me.

String.Source: The home is great. Although we probably have to pay a lot of taxes. Maybe I'll start a store...
String.Dest: The home is great. Although we probably have to pay a lot of taxes. Maybe I'll start a store...

String.Source: Oh! You're back! I just want you to know that those rumors are untrue. I did not lose our fortune playing iron hearts.
String.Dest: Oh! You're back! I just want you to know that those rumors are untrue. I did not lose our fortune playing iron hearts.

String.Source: Hello, my love. Back from some adventure I bet.
String.Dest: 你好啊，亲爱的。冒险回来啦。

String.Source: Need your husband's blade? I might go mad if I keep staring at the walls.
String.Dest: Need your husband's blade? I might go mad if I keep staring at the walls.

String.Source: Good to see you, my love.
String.Dest: Good to see you, my love.

String.Source: Yes, love?
String.Dest: 嗯，亲爱的？

String.Source: You really know how to let an Elf down gently, don't you? How about a hint next time, like you think the farmer's handsome or something?
String.Dest: You really know how to let an Elf down gently, don't you? How about a hint next time, like you think the farmer's handsome or something?

String.Source: It's probably best we stay friends.
String.Dest: 我们最好还是保持朋友关系。

String.Source: Question. Are you by chance interested in me?
String.Dest: 请问，你可能对我感兴趣吗？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Wow, you're not what we modest folk call "subtle," are you? Yes, I'm interested. What of it?
String.Dest: Wow, you're not what we modest folk call "subtle," are you? Yes, I'm interested. What of it?

String.Source: So that's it then. Rings, babies, balls, and chains. Works for me!
String.Dest: So that's it then. Rings, babies, balls, and chains. Works for me!

String.Source: Oh, just thinking maybe you and I should get hitched.
String.Dest: 哦，只是想，也许你和我应该选择结婚。

String.Source: That amulet...is that what I think it is? Are you? Are we? I should just shut up right now and let you speak.
String.Dest: That amulet...is that what I think it is? Are you? Are we? I should just shut up right now and let you speak.

String.Source: So...have you spoken to a Priest of Mara yet? No pressure.
String.Dest: So...have you spoken to a Priest of Mara yet? No pressure.

String.Source: Here. I got this for you. Just a small token of my gratitude.
String.Dest: 来，这个送给你，只是个表达我心意的小礼物。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Watch your face! Keep your hands up!
String.Dest: Watch your face! Keep your hands up!

String.Source: Drive that snowback to the ground!
String.Dest: 揍翻那个北方佬！

String.Source: Twelve septims on the one who's winning!
String.Dest: 12个金币赌谁赢！

String.Source: Fight! Fight!
String.Dest: 上啊！上啊！

String.Source: Punch 'em like they stole your dinner!
String.Dest: 扁他们！把他们当成偷了你晚餐的贼那样痛扁他们！

String.Source: Stick and move! Stick and move!
String.Dest: 坚持住，动起来 ！坚持住，动起来 ！

String.Source: Where do you think the axe is?
String.Dest: 你觉得斧头会在哪？

String.Source: Troll's blood! Look at this place!
String.Dest: 巨魔之血！看看这里！

String.Source: You keep saying that but people at the Four Shields tend to just mope around, drink, and feel miserable. That's not my idea of adventure.
String.Dest: 你只是不停的说“冒险”，然后四面盾牌客栈的人们浑浑噩噩的酗酒，哀叹悲惨的命运。我可不觉得这是我向往的冒险。

String.Source: Well, I was going to follow you, but not if you're going to spend all day staring at fires and curvy wenches. I could do that at home. Conceivably.
String.Dest: 呃，我得跟紧你，但如果你打算整天盯着身材火辣的妹子，那我宁愿呆在家里。

String.Source: Do the three of you hear something? I thought I heard a woman calling to me...
String.Dest: 你们三个有听到什么吗？我似乎听到一个女人在冲我吼叫...

String.Source: Okay, maybe it's a little less ordinary than I thought.
String.Dest: 好吧，跟我所想的比起来这或许有点儿奇怪。

String.Source: Well this looks like an ordinary cave if I ever saw one. And I've seen at least five.
String.Dest: 呃，这看起来就像是我曾见过的普通山洞。我已经看到过至少五个了。

String.Source: You mean, besides the fact that they're all wearing matching outfits?
String.Dest: 你是说，除了他们都穿着相配的衣服这事以外还有别的什么？

String.Source: You're not jealous of him are you?
String.Dest: 你难道是嫉妒他了吗？

String.Source: Well, I fancy myself a fairly decent chef, maybe Falatild can help you with the rest.
String.Dest: 好吧，我想象自己是个得体而又美丽的厨师，或许会帮你完成剩下的。

String.Source: So Skjarn, if you end up getting your skull split by a Draugr, I'll just try to remember all the women who were spared from meeting you.
String.Dest: 好吧史卡盎, 如果你最后落得个脑袋被尸鬼捣得稀巴烂的下场，我会记得有多少女人因此而免于被糟蹋。

String.Source: Oh, I know. I'm just trying to find things I don't like about everyone to lessen the impact if they die.
String.Dest: 哦，我知道。我只是试着在找些我不喜欢的事情，是关于如果人们濒死时他们是如何与世界脱离联系的。

String.Source: Wow, that's impressive.
String.Dest: 哇，太好了。

String.Source: Right, because the last thing we want to do is walk into a haunted Nord ruin at night.
String.Dest: 对，因为我们要做的最后一件事就是在今晚走进那个闹鬼的诺德遗迹。

String.Source: Seems to me that's the best way to avoid ghosts. Well, the imaginary ones anyway. The real ones don't really care what time it is.
String.Dest: 对我而言那是避免见鬼最好的办法。当然，不管怎么说我曾经这么想过。我曾经并不是那么在意时间。

String.Source: There's my loving spouse! I bet you didn't expect to see your husband here, you know, outdoors instead of loafing around the house.
String.Dest: 看哪，这是我至爱的妻子！我打赌你一定以为我在外面，而从未想到我会在屋子里晃悠。

String.Source: But I assure you, I am acting strictly in the best interests of the family. So what if Thane Larsdon wants to overthrow everything.
String.Dest: 不过我向你保证。我做的一切都是为了家族的利益着想。可要是劳斯登领主想要把一切推倒重来怎么办。

String.Source: I mean, it's not like the Thalmor gave us a better offer.
String.Dest: 我是说，这可不比梭莫给我们出的好价。

String.Source: Hey, I was wondering when you would show up. I bet you didn't expect to see me here, given how much I loathe politics.
String.Dest: Hey, I was wondering when you would show up. I bet you didn't expect to see me here, given how much I loathe politics.

String.Source: But I assure you, I am acting strictly in my own interests. So what if Thane Larsdon wants to overthrow everything.
String.Dest: 但我向你保证，我之所以这么做完全是为了自己的利益。所以要是劳斯登领主想推翻一切该怎么办。

String.Source: I mean, it's not like the Thalmor gave me a better offer.
String.Dest: 我的意思是，梭默并不能给我更好的机会。

String.Source: How should I know? They all look the same to me. And by that I mean "extremely heavy."
String.Dest: 我为什么该知道？而且对我来说他们看起来都一样。我的意思是“非常非常相似“

String.Source: Exactly! And a bound sword is so much more comfortable in your palm. It's like holding a cloud, if clouds were sharp and made to cut people.
String.Dest: 很好！一把约束之剑在你手中更加合适，就如闪电般杀人于无形之中。

String.Source: Skjarn, think about it for a second. You're a bard, right? What's more precious to a bard than his hands?
String.Dest: 史卡盎，再好好考虑一下吧。你是一个吟游诗人, 不对吗? 还有什么比吟游诗人的双手更加珍贵呢?

String.Source: So Skjarn, I have to ask. Exactly how many women have you bedded? Approximately. I mean, I don't expect you to have a count.
String.Dest: 那么史卡盎，我认真的问你，你到底睡了多少女人？我不指望你还真做了统计，给我个大概数字就行了。

String.Source: Do you think our party is balanced enough? I mean Falatild is a ranger but it would've been nice to take Valgus along.
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的队伍配置好了吗？我是说 Falatild 是不错的射手不过要是有 Valgus 一起就更好了。

String.Source: It doesn't matter how many of us there are. He's the boss. We have to follow his orders.
String.Dest: 不管我们在这里有多少人，他是老板，我们要听他的指令

String.Source: With three beers down, the Orc did frown, and bid the Elf goodbye! For none could know, twas not for show, and someone had to die!
String.Dest: With three beers down, the Orc did frown, and bid the Elf goodbye! For none could know, twas not for show, and someone had to die!

String.Source: Alright, I'll just stand right here, and you start hitting the ground with spells and such.
String.Dest: 好吧，我就站在这儿，然后你就开始用法术之类的撞击地面吧。

String.Source: Wait...hold on. Maybe you don't have to actually use a spell. What if...what if I just imagined you were casting them.
String.Dest: 等等，稍等一下。你可能并不需要真正吟唱一个咒语。我可以假装你在吟唱他们

String.Source: Like I close my eyes and picture the fireball coming at me...it's almost here, and now I'm casting my ward and...
String.Dest: 就像我闭上眼睛然后想象火球冲我飞来……它就快到了，现在我就得释放结界然后……

String.Source: Yes, I've deflected it, with so much force it seems, the fireball is now shooting off into the sky. It is literally burning a hole in Aetherius.
String.Dest: 是的，我躲过了它，但它太强力了，那火球径直冲向了天空，简直像是要把艾瑟瑞斯烧出一个大洞。

String.Source: Oh, now it's actually circling around Masser and hurtling back toward...it looks like that's Rorikstead...oh that poor goat...so much carnage...
String.Dest: 哦，它正围着玛撒尔转圈……然后飞向……看起来像是洛里斯泰德……可怜的羊……好可怕的大屠杀……

String.Source: So you're saying I need to work hard and study to achieve my goals...but what if that goes against everything I stand for?
String.Dest: 所以你说我需要努力工作好好学习达到我的目标……但倘若这些违背了我所坚信的一切我该怎么办？

String.Source: Come on, let's go. This is obviously not the sort of mage, and I use the term loosely, that can help me.
String.Dest: Come on, let's go. This is obviously not the sort of mage, and I use the term loosely, that can help me.

String.Source: Absolutely not!
String.Dest: 当然不！

String.Source: Well, that doesn't sound too bad. Wait a minute...what kind of rodent?
String.Dest: Well, that doesn't sound too bad. Wait a minute...what kind of rodent?

String.Source: I think you have the wrong person. I'm just here to learn a spell.
String.Dest: I think you have the wrong person. I'm just here to learn a spell.

String.Source: Excuse me...Yes, you, Orc. Do you have any spell tomes available for..."special" mages?
String.Dest: 对不起……是的，就是你，兽人。你有魔法书籍可供……"特别的" 法师吗？

String.Source: I think it's time we had a word with the librarian regarding "quality control."
String.Dest: 我想是时候我们得和图书管理员讨论关于“品质控制”的事情了。

String.Source: Ooh, this book has pictures! It seems easy enough and...it's a children's story on mudcrabs. What sort of library is this?
String.Dest: Ooh, this book has pictures! It seems easy enough and...it's a children's story on mudcrabs. What sort of library is this?

String.Source: To use fire, one must ignite the ethereal flint through the synchronistic channeling of...oh rubbish! This won't do at all! Next book!
String.Dest: To use fire, one must ignite the ethereal flint through the synchronistic channeling of...oh rubbish! This won't do at all! Next book!

String.Source: Alright, let's see what we can find here.
String.Dest: 好吧，看看我们能从这儿找到些什么。

String.Source: You're not thinking of jumping down that hole, are you? Oh Gods, you are.
String.Dest: You're not thinking of jumping down that hole, are you? Oh Gods, you are.

String.Source: So, fought any good Giants lately? Or deranged princesses?
String.Dest: 所以，最近和那个巨人搏斗了？ 或是看上了哪一个无知的少女？

String.Source: This must be where they embalm the Draugr. And is that an alembic? This is why alchemists make me shiver.
String.Dest: This must be where they embalm the Draugr. And is that an alembic? This is why alchemists make me shiver.

String.Source: You're not thinking of jumping down that hole, are you? Oh Gods, you are.
String.Dest: You're not thinking of jumping down that hole, are you? Oh Gods, you are.

String.Source: This is good place to live. Great views, clean air, and free gold, so long as you can get over the whole "ethics of robbing people" thing.
String.Dest: 这是个居住良所。漂亮的风景，干净的空气，还有些黑钱，只要你能忍受那些抢劫者的道德。

String.Source: These bandits didn't seem to have a problem with it, so why should we? Unless you're implying they're better than us.
String.Dest: 这些强盗都能适应，为什么我们不能呢？除非你在暗示他们比我们强。

String.Source: I always make sure to look up and wave at the windows when I pass the Blue Palace. Eventually they might start thinking I'm someone important.
String.Dest: 每当我路过蓝色宫殿的时候我都不忘抬头看看窗户并奋力地在窗前挥舞着我的手。这样总有一天他们会开始把我当成一个重要人物的。

String.Source: This place is called Soljund's Sinkhole, right? Well, here's your sinkhole. And that corpse at the bottom must be Soljund.
String.Dest: 这地方叫索云德的阴沟，对吧？好啦，这儿就是阴沟，而底下那具尸体肯定就是索云德了。

String.Source: So I'm really curious about this bowl of blood. Did the vampire scoop his goblet in there to drink while he reads?
String.Dest: 所以我真的对这碗血很好奇。吸血鬼还会边读书边晃荡着高脚酒杯浅啜啥的吗？

String.Source: Or does he dip his finger in there and use it to turn pages? I like to imagine vampires use blood in place of every liquid we normally use.
String.Dest: 还是他把手指往那里蘸蘸好用来翻书？我想吸血鬼们的习惯也许跟我们差不多，只不过他们用的是血。

String.Source: These towers are impressive, although a bit crooked. Actually, I'm not sure if they are, but try getting that idea out of your head. You can't.
String.Dest: 这些塔真令人印象深刻,尽管有点儿歪。事实上，我不确定它们是不是真的歪了, 但最好忘了我这个想法，你别也这么想啊。

String.Source: You know what would make these traps more effective? If there were sweetrolls waiting for us at the end of it.
String.Dest: 你知道怎样让陷阱更有效？比如。。放一个甜甜圈在陷阱的另一侧。

String.Source: Did I hear that adventurer right? Did he say talking spiders? Oh...magic spiders. That's much worse.
String.Dest: 我没听错吧？他刚刚说的是会讲话的蜘蛛？哦……会魔法的蜘蛛。比那个更糟。

String.Source: I love how he just leaves the spider on the shelf with his other things. Middle shelf, gloves. Top shelf, eggs. On top of that, magic spider monster.
String.Dest: 我喜欢他把蜘蛛和其他自己的东西摆放在架子上的做法。中层的架子上，放手套。顶层架子上，放蜘蛛蛋。最上面，一只蜘蛛魔怪。

String.Source: Will you look at that. I've always said human skulls make for excellent candle holders, and there's your proof right there.
String.Dest: 看那边。我总是说人类的头骨是制作蜡烛台的绝佳材料，那正好就是个证明。

String.Source: So I have to ask, as there were a ton of them outside and even more in here. What's with the sheets of leather? Are Forsworn big on tanning racks?
String.Dest: 看着外面这一群甚至更多的弃誓者，我有个问题不得不问。那些和皮革一起穿在身上的是什么东西？弃誓者自身就是个大号制皮架吗？

String.Source: Is it just me, or is this place incredibly dark and scary? Maybe if the air wasn't as black as soot, I wouldn't judge it so harshly.
String.Dest: 到底是我的错觉，还是这个地方真的黑乎乎的很可怕？也许如果这里的空气没像烟尘那么黑，我就不会如此苛刻的评价了。

String.Source: Ooh, a bright light to ward off the danger and attract moths. On second thought, maybe we should turn it off. I like my clothes without holes.
String.Dest: Ooh, a bright light to ward off the danger and attract moths. On second thought, maybe we should turn it off. I like my clothes without holes.

String.Source: I see what they're doing here. They're making opening that chest so tedious that you won't even bother. I say we leave the blasted thing.
String.Dest: I see what they're doing here. They're making opening that chest so tedious that you won't even bother. I say we leave the blasted thing.

String.Source: Alright, we're here. If Malkoran kills me and turns me into a shade, tell him I don't want to wear a helmet like the others.
String.Dest: 好吧，我们到了。如果我不幸栽在了莫克然手上而且被变成了一个影鬼， 告诉他我不想像其他影鬼那样戴头盔。

String.Source: Look at that! So the farmer was telling the truth about the strange lights! But I don't hear any strange noises. He's obviously hiding something.
String.Dest: 看那边！这么说那农夫说有奇怪的光是真的！不过我没听见什么奇怪的噪音。他肯定还隐瞒了什么。

String.Source: Steepfall Burrow. I like places that have literal names. Imagine how much more motivated we'd be to raid "Lots of Treasure Cave."
String.Dest: 坠崖洞穴。我喜欢这个地方形象的名字。想象一下，如果我们要去劫夺一个叫“宝藏超多洞穴”，那我们该多有干劲儿啊。

String.Source: Oh wow, that's a lot of Orichalcum. You're not thinking of mining it all, are you? Oh Gods, you are.
String.Dest: 哦哇哦，这么多的金刚砂。你不会想要全部挖走吧？哦神啊，你还真的有这种打算。

String.Source: Oh wow, it almost looks like some sort of arena. The crowd looks pretty dead though.
String.Dest: 哇奥，这看上去简直像是个什么竞技场了，不过观众们都是死地挺透的。

String.Source: Ha! Get it? Because they're skeletons. Yeah, I know, worst joke ever.
String.Dest: 哈！明白了吗？因为他们是骨头架子。这是我听过的最糟糕的笑话。

String.Source: If I were a bandit, I think I'd like a job like this.
String.Dest: 如果我是个强盗，我想我会喜欢这样的工作。

String.Source: Not only are you in charge of the food, you can position the barrels so no one can see you sleeping on the job.
String.Dest: 你不仅仅偷吃食物，你还可以把桶子摆的风骚一点，这样就没有人会看见你上班睡觉了。

String.Source: And here I was going to compliment these bandits on how normal they seem, when we come across a table with somebody's severed hands. Lovely.
String.Dest: 当我们无意发现桌子上的有着某人的断肢时，我不禁想称赞这些强盗，看上去多标准啊。真令人愉快。

String.Source: This must have been some show back in ancient times. Set up an elaborate trap, slaughter a few slaves...fun for the whole family!
String.Dest: This must have been some show back in ancient times. Set up an elaborate trap, slaughter a few slaves...fun for the whole family!

String.Source: This room looks like fun. You have music, books, drinks, and of course, cheese. What would the Nords ever do without their cheese.
String.Dest: This room looks like fun. You have music, books, drinks, and of course, cheese. What would the Nords ever do without their cheese.

String.Source: Oh look, they use a soul gem trap to light the candles. And I thought I was lazy.
String.Dest: Oh look, they use a soul gem trap to light the candles. And I thought I was lazy.

String.Source: Look at that purple light. I think we just stumbled upon the world's first bound door.
String.Dest: Look at that purple light. I think we just stumbled upon the world's first bound door.

String.Source: You know, there's really only one good reason a bandit would turn on his master. The problem is, it's the same reason he became a bandit.
String.Dest: You know, there's really only one good reason a bandit would turn on his master. The problem is, it's the same reason he became a bandit.

String.Source: You want Esbern? I'll teach you to pick on old men!
String.Dest: You want Esbern? I'll teach you to pick on old men!

String.Source: Watch the archer! He's a bigger coward than I am!
String.Dest: Watch the archer! He's a bigger coward than I am!

String.Source: Come on, that dagger couldn't cut butter!
String.Dest: Come on, that dagger couldn't cut butter!

String.Source: Your organs are showing, Draugr!
String.Dest: Your organs are showing, Draugr!

String.Source: Well, this is awkward!
String.Dest: Well, this is awkward!

String.Source: You're on the wrong side, Thalmor! At least today!
String.Dest: You're on the wrong side, Thalmor! At least today!

String.Source: Quick, throw a book! They won't know what hit them!
String.Dest: Quick, throw a book! They won't know what hit them!

String.Source: Damnit, don't give up! We can't lose to a piece of firewood! We'd never outlive the shame!
String.Dest: Damnit, don't give up! We can't lose to a piece of firewood! We'd never outlive the shame!

String.Source: You can't bewitch me Spriggan! I'm only half an animal!
String.Dest: You can't bewitch me Spriggan! I'm only half an animal!

String.Source: Stop moving troll! You're burning off all the fat!
String.Dest: Stop moving troll! You're burning off all the fat!

String.Source: Damn, I can't see them! Just swing at everything!
String.Dest: Damn, I can't see them! Just swing at everything!

String.Source: BOUND SWORD TEMPLATE
String.Dest: BOUND SWORD TEMPLATE

String.Source: You call yourself a spider? I've seen brushes with more hair!
String.Dest: You call yourself a spider? I've seen brushes with more hair!

String.Source: Was your mother a Falmer? Or are you just that ugly?
String.Dest: Was your mother a Falmer? Or are you just that ugly?

String.Source: Just try and stop us, you overgrown crossbow!
String.Dest: Just try and stop us, you overgrown crossbow!

String.Source: His weapon's huge! Pass me a potion if I get hit!
String.Dest: His weapon's huge! Pass me a potion if I get hit!

String.Source: Her weapon's huge! Pass me a potion if I get hit!
String.Dest: Her weapon's huge! Pass me a potion if I get hit!

String.Source: Take out the archer! He's the most annoying one here!
String.Dest: Take out the archer! He's the most annoying one here!

String.Source: Die you metal monster!
String.Dest: Die you metal monster!

String.Source: Don't make me pull out my mirror, spider!
String.Dest: Don't make me pull out my mirror, spider!

String.Source: I'll take the ugly one! Wait! They're all ugly!
String.Dest: I'll take the ugly one! Wait! They're all ugly!

String.Source: Get a job, you stupid bandit!
String.Dest: Get a job, you stupid bandit!

String.Source: Quick, throw some gold on the ground, that'll distract them!
String.Dest: Quick, throw some gold on the ground, that'll distract them!

String.Source: Killing people is no way to make a living!
String.Dest: Killing people is no way to make a living!

String.Source: They're nimble! Don't let them flank you!
String.Dest: They're nimble! Don't let them flank you!

String.Source: They're weak to fire! Quick, draw your torch!
String.Dest: They're weak to fire! Quick, draw your torch!

String.Source: Watch their fangs! We're nothing but pork chops to them!
String.Dest: Watch their fangs! We're nothing but pork chops to them!

String.Source: Gods, these little bastards are everywhere!
String.Dest: Gods, these little bastards are everywhere!

String.Source: Let's crush these bugs!
String.Dest: Let's crush these bugs!

String.Source: You're not the only one with bound weapons, Falmer!
String.Dest: You're not the only one with bound weapons, Falmer!

String.Source: If only you could see how bad you look!
String.Dest: If only you could see how bad you look!

String.Source: Spit somewhere else, monster! I'm not your napkin!
String.Dest: Spit somewhere else, monster! I'm not your napkin!

String.Source: Just try and hit me you overgrown ape!
String.Dest: Just try and hit me you overgrown ape!

String.Source: Agh! These robes do nothing!
String.Dest: Agh! These robes do nothing!

String.Source: You can't win this! Not when I'm cheating!
String.Dest: You can't win this! Not when I'm cheating!

String.Source: Damnit furball, I'm not the dinner, you are!
String.Dest: Damnit furball, I'm not the dinner, you are!

String.Source: Damn you bandit, can't you see I'm poor!
String.Dest: Damn you bandit, can't you see I'm poor!

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Ungh!
String.Dest: 呃啊！

String.Source: Ungh! Stop fighting so rough!
String.Dest: Ungh! Stop fighting so rough!

String.Source: Gah! What did I ever do to you!
String.Dest: Gah! What did I ever do to you!

String.Source: By the Gods that hurt!
String.Dest: 卧槽好疼！

String.Source: Agh! Make it stop!
String.Dest: Agh! Make it stop!

String.Source: Agh! Was it something I said?
String.Dest: Agh! Was it something I said?

String.Source: Potions, I need potions!
String.Dest: Potions, I need potions!

String.Source: Damn you!
String.Dest: 去你妈的！

String.Source: Agh! Bastard!
String.Dest: 我操！你个混蛋！

String.Source: You fight as bad as you smell, troll!
String.Dest: You fight as bad as you smell, troll!

String.Source: I've had enough of you!
String.Dest: 我受够你了！

String.Source: Is this what you want?
String.Dest: 想尝尝这招吗？

String.Source: I'll have your head!
String.Dest: 我要取你的首级！

String.Source: Take that, bastard!
String.Dest: Take that, bastard!

String.Source: Pick on someone your own size, Giant!
String.Dest: Pick on someone your own size, Giant!

String.Source: The bigger they are, the harder they fall!
String.Dest: The bigger they are, the harder they fall!

String.Source: I'll teach you to pick on bladebinders, mage!
String.Dest: I'll teach you to pick on bladebinders, mage!

String.Source: I'll cut you down to size!
String.Dest: I'll cut you down to size!

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 嘿呀！

String.Source: I hear Sovngarde's lovely this time of year, Nord!
String.Dest: I hear Sovngarde's lovely this time of year, Nord!

String.Source: Ever seen a bound blade, Orc?
String.Dest: Ever seen a bound blade, Orc?

String.Source: Drink someone else's blood, vampire!
String.Dest: 离我远点，吸血鬼！

String.Source: Why don't you stay dead this time!
String.Dest: 这个时候你应该在死人堆里！

String.Source: Yield or flee, your choice!
String.Dest: Yield or flee, your choice!

String.Source: You picked the wrong dinner, animal!
String.Dest: 你选错了晚餐，畜生！

String.Source: Just...stand still!
String.Dest: 站住…别动！

String.Source: You're like a fish out of water, lizard! Here let me give you some blood to swim in!
String.Dest: You're like a fish out of water, lizard! Here let me give you some blood to swim in!

String.Source: Die, damn you!
String.Dest: 去死吧，混蛋！

String.Source: I'm no ordinary mage!
String.Dest: I'm no ordinary mage!

String.Source: I won't die today, not against you!
String.Dest: 我今天是不会死的，至少是不会死在你的面前的！

String.Source: Come on, I can take you!
String.Dest: 来吧，我可以对付你！

String.Source: I'll kill you, beastman!
String.Dest: 我非杀你不可，畜生！

String.Source: Crawl back in your hole, dragon!
String.Dest: Crawl back in your hole, dragon!

String.Source: It's bedtime for you, Draugr!
String.Dest: It's bedtime for you, Draugr!

String.Source: The Reach is no place for you, Forsworn!
String.Dest: The Reach is no place for you, Forsworn!

String.Source: Not even dragon scales can stop a bound sword!
String.Dest: Not even dragon scales can stop a bound sword!

String.Source: I yield, I yield!
String.Dest: 我认输！我认输！

String.Source: Oh gods we're routed! Quick use the safe word!
String.Dest: Oh gods we're routed! Quick use the safe word!

String.Source: Wait, don't kill me! I-I have gold, I swear!
String.Dest: Wait, don't kill me! I-I have gold, I swear!

String.Source: Victory is yours! I yield! See me yielding?
String.Dest: Victory is yours! I yield! See me yielding?

String.Source: Gyaaargh!
String.Dest: 呀啊啊啊啊！

String.Source: You need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 你需要做得更好！

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Come on, is that all you've got!
String.Dest: 得了吧，你就这点本事？！

String.Source: Is that your best? I certainly hope so!
String.Dest: Is that your best? I certainly hope so!

String.Source: I get that he's a necromancer, but what do you mean you never saw eye to eye?
String.Dest: 我知道他是个亡灵术士啊，不过你说你们的观点从来没有一样过是什么意思？

String.Source: Hold on. If you don't mind, I'm going to see what this inn has on tap.
String.Dest: Hold on. If you don't mind, I'm going to see what this inn has on tap.

String.Source: Ah, the inn. Hopefully that smell isn't coming from their kitchen.
String.Dest: Ah, the inn. Hopefully that smell isn't coming from their kitchen.

String.Source: All right, let's see what they serve here.
String.Dest: All right, let's see what they serve here.

String.Source: This inn looks...adequate.
String.Dest: This inn looks...adequate.

String.Source: I don't know, it sounds to me like the only difference is I have to pay you money.
String.Dest: 我不知道，似乎唯一的区别就是我不得不向你掏钱了。

String.Source: That's an odd question, coming from blacksmith of Kvatch. Don't your weapons practically come from Oblivion?
String.Dest: 这是个奇怪的问题，科瓦奇来的铁匠铸造的武器。你的武器难道不是从从湮灭弄来的？

String.Source: Well, that should tie everything up in a neat little bow. You got your forgery, I got my debt erased, and Sunken-Roots got his life back.
String.Dest: 好了，这样我们就皆大欢喜了。你得到了你的伪造物，我清除了我的债务，而且桑肯‧树根也救了他的命。

String.Source: It's your classical happy ending. Unless you're a bandit, then it went about as badly as one could expect.
String.Dest: 你将会获得一个典型的美好结局。除非你是个强盗，真是那样的话，你的下场将会惨得出人意料的。

String.Source: Sure, that works for me.
String.Dest: 没问题，这对我来说蛮有用。

String.Source: You did say she plays primarily in Old Hroldan, right? And this journal is from a bard in Markarth. Sounds like a cheap, neighborly bard to me.
String.Dest: 你确定你说过她一般在老霍尔丹表演，是吗？这次旅途是由一个在马卡斯的诗人发起的。听起来还真是个俭吝友善的诗人，对我来说。

String.Source: Thank you. I'd hate to think I was slipping.
String.Dest: 谢谢你。我讨厌迷路。

String.Source: Well, it isn't a secret now, is it? Mental note: Check for secret compartments.
String.Dest: Well, it isn't a secret now, is it? Mental note: Check for secret compartments.

String.Source: Fine, if you're going to be such a sod about it, we'll just let you rot in here.
String.Dest: 好吧。如果你对这这么依赖，我们就让你腐烂在这里算了。.

String.Source: Oh right. I still haven't paid you for that, have I.
String.Dest: Oh right. I still haven't paid you for that, have I.

String.Source: What does it look like? Saving your scaly tail.
String.Dest: What does it look like? Saving your scaly tail.

String.Source: Oh come on, Sunken-Roots, you would break the moment they threatened to pluck a feather.
String.Dest: 噢得了，桑肯-树根，你会毁了他们威胁着要拔毛的这一刻的。

String.Source: That was a bottle of imitation skooma. I carry it around sometimes because it makes me look more dangerous.
String.Dest: 这是一瓶仿制的斯库玛。我有时候带着它到处转，因为这让我看起来更不好惹。

String.Source: That's ridiculous. I don't even like skooma.
String.Dest: 真是荒谬。 我根本就不喜欢skooma.

String.Source: What do you think of this idea, Karras? An entire regiment using bound weapons.
String.Dest: 让全团的人都使用统一的武器。你觉得这个主意怎么样， 卡拉斯？

String.Source: With three beers down, the Orc did frown and bid the Elf goodbye, for none could know twas not for show, and someone had to die!
String.Dest: 三杯啤酒穿肠走，兽人跟精灵要分手。这不是一次表演秀，而是有某人要死咯。

String.Source: (Sleeping Giant) I'll meet the three of you outside Moss Mother Cavern.
String.Dest: (Sleeping Giant) I'll meet the three of you outside Moss Mother Cavern.

String.Source: That's fine.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: As for the bard, do you want to go to the College in Solitude?
String.Dest: 至于诗人，你想去独孤城的学院吗？

String.Source: That would probably be a bad idea. We want someone who can handle themselves in a fight.
String.Dest: 那可能是个坏主意。我们想要个能够在战斗自保的人。

String.Source: As for the bard, do you want to go to the College in Solitude?
String.Dest: 至于诗人，你想去独孤城的学院吗？

String.Source: If I had a conscience, and I'm beginning to suspect I might, it would weigh heavily on it if I got some poor lutist killed.
String.Dest: 如果我还心存良知，我可能会开始怀疑自己。如果我杀了一些可怜的琵琶弹奏者，这会有很大影响吧。

String.Source: As for the bard, do you want to go to the College in Solitude?
String.Dest: 至于诗人，你想去独孤城的学院吗？

String.Source: If this bard were a warrior, well then I wouldn't mind so much if their bodies ended up halfway up the ceiling. Hazards of the job and all that.
String.Dest: If this bard were a warrior, well then I wouldn't mind so much if their bodies ended up halfway up the ceiling. Hazards of the job and all that.

String.Source: As for the bard, do you want to go to the College in Solitude?
String.Dest: 至于诗人，你想去独孤城的学院吗？

String.Source: I wonder if any of the Companions know how to sing? We should stop by Jorrvaskr find out before we go asking a bard if he can swing a mace.
String.Dest: 战友团里有人会唱歌吗？我们应该在前往月瓦斯卡寻找那个可能会唱歌的人之前，随便去问哪个吟游诗人是否能挥舞得起狼牙棒。

String.Source: The joke's on us. There's no treasure save this ring. Still, I had fun.
String.Dest: 这是个玩笑。这个指环不会带来任何宝藏，不过，我还是挺开心的。

String.Source: A ring? Hold on, is that what I think it is? A sapphire ring that lets you...breathe underwater? Oh no..we've made a horrible mistake!
String.Dest: A ring? Hold on, is that what I think it is? A sapphire ring that lets you...breathe underwater? Oh no..we've made a horrible mistake!

String.Source: I'm soaking wet and tired, and all for a ring and some dead Elf.
String.Dest: 我泡在水里，全身湿透，筋疲力竭。还全是为了那枚戒指和一些死去的精灵。

String.Source: Hopefully you're not talking about me being the dead Elf. Wait, what do you mean by a ring? It doesn't let you breathe underwater, does it?
String.Dest: 但愿你不是在说让我成为那个死的精灵。等等，你说的是什么意思，一个戒指？不会是能让你在水下呼吸的那个吧？

String.Source: I'm soaking wet and tired, and all for a ring and some dead Elf.
String.Dest: 我泡在水里，全身湿透，筋疲力竭。还全是为了那枚戒指和一些死去的精灵。

String.Source: Oh Gods, that halfwit...he was right! We've made a horrible mistake!
String.Dest: Oh Gods, that halfwit...he was right! We've made a horrible mistake!

String.Source: Just filthy. This treasure of yours lets you breathe underwater, but that's it.
String.Dest: 这真是个腌臜玩意儿。你的这个宝物可以让你在水下呼吸，但也仅此而已。

String.Source: Underwater? Wait, that ring wasn't attached to some beautiful princess, was it? Don't tell me that halfwit was telling the truth!
String.Dest: 在水底下？等等，这个戒指该不会是属于某个漂亮的公主的吧？别告诉我那个蠢货说的是真的！

String.Source: Wait, did that body belong to a princess? Don't tell me that halfwit was right! Which means that ring...
String.Dest: 等会，那是公主？别告诉我那个蠢蛋是对的！这意味着那戒指…

String.Source: There was a body down there, and a ring.
String.Dest: 那里有一具戴着指环的尸体。

String.Source: I still prefer to kill the Giant rather than put him to sleep.
String.Dest: 我依旧愿意杀掉巨人胜过哄他睡觉。

String.Source: Yes, and I prefer to remain the height I am now as opposed to being clubbed so hard I wake up a Wood Elf.
String.Dest: 是的，并且相对于被木棒狠狠地砸扁，我更乐意保持现在的身高，所以我叫醒了一个木精灵。

String.Source: I still prefer to kill the Giant rather than put him to sleep.
String.Dest: 我依旧愿意杀掉巨人胜过哄他睡觉。

String.Source: Although granted, I rather be a short Elf than a dead one. We're far more likely to end the day six feet under as opposed to five feet tall.
String.Dest: 尽管你做了保证，我还是宁愿去当一个矮精灵而不是死精灵。我觉得我当一个5英尺的矮精灵活下来的概率比一个6英尺的死精灵高多了。

String.Source: I still prefer to kill the Giant rather than put him to sleep.
String.Dest: 我依旧愿意杀掉巨人胜过哄他睡觉。

String.Source: I'm hoping bringing the others will help us avoid that scenario, or at least give us ample time to run away.
String.Dest: 我希望带来的其他人能帮助我们避免这种情况，或者至少留给我们留足时间逃跑。

String.Source: Oh trust me, if this Giant really does wake up, we'll be able to see it from the other side of the cavern.
String.Dest: 相信我,如果这个巨人被唤醒了, 我们就会在洞穴的另一边见到它。

String.Source: I don't like the idea of putting Fjona in danger.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢这个让费欧娜去冒险的主意。

String.Source: I don't like the idea of putting Fjona in danger.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢这个让费欧娜去冒险的主意。

String.Source: And, seeing how well sound travels in a cave, that Giant will be able to hear her play from there as well.
String.Dest: 并且，以声音在洞穴中传播的效果来看，那个巨人从那边也能听见她的演奏。

String.Source: I don't like the idea of putting Fjona in danger.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢这个让费欧娜去冒险的主意。

String.Source: On the other hand, I'm half a halfwit. Who's to say anything I say is logical?
String.Dest: 另一方面，我是半个笨蛋。谁说我说得都是符合逻辑的呢？

String.Source: Are you saying this Giant sleeps underwater?
String.Dest: 你的意思是那个巨人沉睡在水下？

String.Source: So they say. Problem is, half the hunters who go into that cave end up dead, and the other half see nothing at all.
String.Dest: 他们是这样讲的。问题是，一半进这个洞穴的猎人死了，另一半却什么都没看见。

String.Source: Are you saying this Giant sleeps underwater?
String.Dest: 你的意思是那个巨人沉睡在水下？

String.Source: Of course, the dead ones are proof enough. Also the footprints those bodies are lying in.
String.Dest: 当然,死人还不足以为证。还有这些留下的脚印。

String.Source: Are you saying this Giant sleeps underwater?
String.Dest: 你的意思是那个巨人沉睡在水下？

String.Source: I'm hoping bringing the others will help us avoid that scenario, or at least give us ample time to run away.
String.Dest: 我希望带来的其他人能帮助我们避免这种情况，或者至少留给我们留足时间逃跑。

String.Source: I think you said "soup" when you meant to say "poison." It was an honest mistake, I'm sure.
String.Dest: 我认为你说“汤”的时候你其实是在说“毒药”。这是真诚的错误，我敢肯定。

String.Source: Century old Giant Broth would make for a great soup.
String.Dest: 百年巨人肉汤一定会成为一道美味的汤。

String.Source: Century old Giant Broth would make for a great soup.
String.Dest: 百年巨人肉汤一定会成为一道美味的汤。

String.Source: By the way, in all seriousness, you should never leave soup stock out overnight. Sure, you can boil away the toxins, but it'll also lose flavor.
String.Dest: 顺带说一句，永远都不要把汤放过夜。当然你可以将其再次煮沸消毒，但是这样也会失去原有的鲜美。

String.Source: Okay, we have our bard and our Giant slayer. All that's left to do now is find our Giant.
String.Dest: 好的，吟游诗人和巨人杀手都已经具备了，只欠巨人了。

String.Source: Apparently, a lot of hunters like to frequent this cave, and there's even a small lake toward the rear, but no one ever drinks from it.
String.Dest: 很明显，许多猎人喜欢频繁光顾这个洞穴，后面往前走一段甚至还有个小湖，但是没人从那里喝过水。

String.Source: Probably because it tastes like century old Giant broth.
String.Dest: 可能是因为它的味道像是搁了有些年头儿的巨人肉汤。

String.Source: Did you find anything? Are we filthy rich, or just filthy?
String.Dest: 你找到什么了吗？我们能走狗屎运吗，还是只有狗屎？

String.Source: And Anum-La, a bound sword never dulls. Of course, I don't want to brag, but you do need a bit of magical talent to wield both.
String.Dest: 而且，安努姆菈,好剑永远不会钝.我也不想吹牛，但是掌握召唤武器和正确的吹嘘都需要天赋的.

String.Source: I really like the looks of this Jonas fellow. But the wench doesn't seem too impressed, and I trust my wenches. I guess it's off to the marsh then.
String.Dest: 我确实喜欢乔纳斯这小子的模样。不过我家女招待看不上，而且我相信姑娘们的眼光。我猜之后是去了沼泽地。

String.Source: Not everything in life has a point, Fjona. Like this adventure. It just is. That's what I'm taking away from all this.
String.Dest: 生活中不是每件事都有明确方向的，费欧娜。就如同这场冒险一样。正因如此，我才要远离这一切。

String.Source: I don't know, gold, silver, diamond encrusted chalices.
String.Dest: I don't know, gold, silver, diamond encrusted chalices.

String.Source: I mean, the boy in Riverwood told me it was a princess, and the whole bit about the forced betrothal.
String.Dest: I mean, the boy in Riverwood told me it was a princess, and the whole bit about the forced betrothal.

String.Source: But I just assumed he was being a romantic.
String.Dest: 但我只是以为他在幻想。

String.Source: In any case, I think we better get going. I hear someone calling me somewhere over there. Away from the crazy person.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我认为我们最好离开这儿。我听见那里的某个地方有人在喊我。我们得离疯子远点儿。

String.Source: It was her! She did it! You marry her!
String.Dest: 那是她！她做到了！你娶了她！

String.Source: It was him! He did it! You marry him!
String.Dest: 是了！他做到了！你终于嫁给了他！

String.Source: It was her! She did it! You marry her!
String.Dest: 那是她！她做到了！你娶了她！

String.Source: Oh no, here it comes...
String.Dest: 哦不，又来了……

String.Source: And risk that Giant waking up and biting my head off? Besides, that water looks cold.
String.Dest: 这风险可略大啊。要是巨人醒来咬掉我的头怎么办？而且，这水看上去好冷。

String.Source: Is it dead, or just sleeping?
String.Dest: 它死了吗？还是只是在睡觉？

String.Source: Okay, then let's go. If that's okay with you, being the leader and everything.
String.Dest: 好的, 我们上路吧. 如果你准备好了, 所有东西都由你说了算.

String.Source: Well, I would do it myself, but I use bound weapons, and I'm not a hundred percent sure it would work.
String.Dest: 好吧，我自己干好了，不过我要用的是武器缠绕召唤术，我不能百分百地保证法术能生效。

String.Source: And before you ask, don't worry, I'm not a total idiot. The first thing I did was secure a bottle from one of the local traders.
String.Dest: 你不用问，别担心，我没那么白痴。我当时做的第一件事就是从一个当地小贩那里保住了一个瓶子。

String.Source: Just don't ask from who. Although if you want a hint, it rhymes with "Ybolda."
String.Dest: 别问是谁。要是你想要个提示，发音是“伊博尔达”的韵脚。

String.Source: Actually, I forgot to mention one other part. The song will put him to sleep, but he won't stay that way.
String.Dest: 实际上，我忘记提另一点了。这首歌会让他入睡，不过他不会一直那样的。

String.Source: Not unless we add a little something extra to his blood. Like say, via a sword coated in sleeping tree sap?
String.Dest: 除非我们在他的血里添点儿额外的料。比如说，把剑涂上一层沉睡之树的液汁如何？

String.Source: Nonsense! Why would...oh Gods...
String.Dest: 废话！为什么会……哦上帝啊……

String.Source: I don't know. He looks sort of sleepy, but it's hard to tell. Maybe I ought to get a closer look.
String.Dest: I don't know. He looks sort of sleepy, but it's hard to tell. Maybe I ought to get a closer look.

String.Source: Well, hold on. Fjona has to coax it to sleep first. I know when I get out of bed the first thing I want to do is hop back in.
String.Dest: 呃，坚持住。费欧娜得先哄它睡觉。我就知道我起床后第一件想干的事儿就是希望再蹦回被子里。

String.Source: Alright, we're here. If the legend is true, then this Giant should be waking up as soon as I began this sentence five seconds ago.
String.Dest: 得，我们已经到这儿了。如果传言不虚，那大块头在我五秒钟前开始念咒的时候就该醒了。

String.Source: You called me a mage. I don't know whether to be flattered or disgusted.
String.Dest: 你说我是……一个法师？我真是不知该笑还是该哭了。

String.Source: For instance, Fjona, think of how much time and energy you can save by not having to loot corpses for stray arrows.
String.Dest: 举个例子，费欧娜，要是不必再从尸体上寻回箭矢，想想你能节省多少时间。

String.Source: Wow. That's amazing. I taught myself how to shuffle a deck of cards once. It's even less impressive when you consider I was a grown Elf.
String.Dest: 哇。太不可思议。我曾经自学过怎么洗扑克牌。作为一个成年精灵，我这方面太逊色了。

String.Source: I don't see how it could hurt. Maybe I should sing as well.
String.Dest: 我觉得没什么不好的。或许我也该唱两嗓子。

String.Source: Alright, that's one down, and one to go.
String.Dest: 好吧，那就是一个走了一个死了

String.Source: Not a clue.
String.Dest: 毫无头绪。

String.Source: As I matter of fact, I've met a Giant before. Well, a puny one, but a Giant nonetheless.
String.Dest: 事实上，我以前遇到过巨人。好吧，一只小巨人，尽管如此那仍然是个巨人。

String.Source: He seemed to fall asleep whenever Karita stopped singing and played those soft instrumentals. Although it could've been all the mead he was drinking.
String.Dest: He seemed to fall asleep whenever Karita stopped singing and played those soft instrumentals. Although it could've been all the mead he was drinking.

String.Source: Alright, maybe I should explain. You see, there was this witch, and she had a treasure.
String.Dest: Alright, maybe I should explain. You see, there was this witch, and she had a treasure.

String.Source: To guard it, she cast a spell on a Giant, so it wakes up when someone draws near.
String.Dest: To guard it, she cast a spell on a Giant, so it wakes up when someone draws near.

String.Source: But if the witch herself wanted to access the treasure, she could put it back to sleep with a song.
String.Dest: But if the witch herself wanted to access the treasure, she could put it back to sleep with a song.

String.Source: Okay, maybe he is a milk-drinker. But what if he's not? All I'm saying is, we just put him in front of a Giant, and see what happens.
String.Dest: 好吧，也许他是一个懦夫。但如果他不是呢？我想说的是，我们就把他放在一个巨人面前，看看会发生什么。

String.Source: I mean seriously, those muscles were bigger than her entire head! All three of our heads put together!
String.Dest: 我说真的，那些肌肉比她整个脑袋还大！比我们三个脑袋加在一起还大！

String.Source: Wait, so I need a saddle and...oh...you're being sarcastic! You know, I don't like it so much when other people do it to me.
String.Dest: 等下, 那么我需要一副鞍具和...噢...你这是在指桑骂槐！你懂的，我不喜欢别人这么对干。

String.Source: Wait, I heard there was a legendary knight living in this town.
String.Dest: 等等，我听说这座小镇里住着个传奇骑士。

String.Source: Alright, that's one down, and one to go.
String.Dest: 好吧，那就是一个走了一个死了

String.Source: That's comforting to know.
String.Dest: 得知这些我很欣慰。

String.Source: Wait, so you're the Argonian who braves the marsh? I was expecting some...burlier.
String.Dest: 等等，这么说你就是那些勇敢面对沼泽的亚龙人？我还以为会……更强壮些。

String.Source: So is it true what they say, that you ride an armored chaurus? Please tell me it's true.
String.Dest: 那么他们说你骑了一头披甲的查鲁斯是真的喽?？请告诉我那是真的。

String.Source: So Fjona, is it true that you're self-taught?
String.Dest: 所以费欧娜，你真的是自学成才的？

String.Source: Are you sure you don't have some buyer's remorse? I mean Anum-La is great, but did you see the size of that Jonas fellow?
String.Dest: 你确定你真的一点不后悔？我是说，安努姆菈确实很棒，但你看到那个乔纳斯的体格没有？

String.Source: Now I don't want to sound like a Bound Weapon peddler, if such a thing even exists, but you two really ought to consider using them.
String.Dest: 我不想像个小贩似的给你们推销召唤武器，要是有人卖这个的话，不过你们真的应该用用看。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: You lead and I'll do whatever you say.
String.Dest: You lead and I'll do whatever you say.

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: My invisible, magic sword is yours.
String.Dest: 我将我那无形之魔法剑授予你。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: No, you already have someone. I don't want to be a third wheel.
String.Dest: No, you already have someone. I don't want to be a third wheel.

String.Source: Has this Dibellan amulet been properly washed? I'm just saying, we have no idea where it's been.
String.Dest: 这件迪贝拉挂件有被清洗过吗?我只是问问，现在我们找不到它究竟被放在了哪里。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: May your road lead to other followers you wouldn't possibly consider replacing me with. Also, warm sands. I've always wanted to say that.
String.Dest: 愿在你的前方尽是一些你不是想到取代我的追随者等着你。当然，还有温暖的沙地。我一直想这么说啦。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: You lead, and I'll do whatever you say.
String.Dest: You lead, and I'll do whatever you say.

String.Source: If I die, I want you to bury me in a coffin. Made of pie.
String.Dest: If I die, I want you to bury me in a coffin. Made of pie.

String.Source: I'm right behind you.
String.Dest: 我紧随在后。

String.Source: You know what they say, timing is all about something or other.
String.Dest: You know what they say, timing is all about something or other.

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: That guard saw a dragon? I'll believe it when I see it. I'll stop believing when I wake up, but for that moment I'll believe.
String.Dest: That guard saw a dragon? I'll believe it when I see it. I'll stop believing when I wake up, but for that moment I'll believe.

String.Source: For Kodlak! I just want to feel included.
String.Dest: For Kodlak! I just want to feel included.

String.Source: Wow, that's some really heavy armor you got there. If it was any bigger, it'd be wearing you.
String.Dest: Wow, that's some really heavy armor you got there. If it was any bigger, it'd be wearing you.

String.Source: Well, that was fast. I didn't even finish counting down half of the 99 barrels of Elves off the wall.
String.Dest: Well, that was fast. I didn't even finish counting down half of the 99 barrels of Elves off the wall.

String.Source: I...I can't believe the old wolf is dead.
String.Dest: 我……我不敢相信这只老狼已经死了。

String.Source: My mother always said, "Never Thu'um with your mouth full."
String.Dest: 我妈妈总说，“不要张口闭口就吐目的。”

String.Source: Some say Rumarin is a feminine name. But I'm not a girl, I just fight like one.
String.Dest: Some say Rumarin is a feminine name. But I'm not a girl, I just fight like one.

String.Source: Don't worry about me, I'm in the best shape of Sload's life.
String.Dest: 别为我担心,我在蛤蟆人当中算混得不错的了。

String.Source: We heading out? Let me just conjure up the energy.
String.Dest: We heading out? Let me just conjure up the energy.

String.Source: Did I ever tell you what my name means in the old Aldmeri? That's because I have no idea.
String.Dest: Did I ever tell you what my name means in the old Aldmeri? That's because I have no idea.

String.Source: Is that an Amulet of Dibella you're wearing? I thought someone like you had standards.
String.Dest: Is that an Amulet of Dibella you're wearing? I thought someone like you had standards.

String.Source: Wow, that's some really heavy armor you got there. If it was any bigger, it'd be wearing you.
String.Dest: Wow, that's some really heavy armor you got there. If it was any bigger, it'd be wearing you.

String.Source: My invisible, magic sword is yours.
String.Dest: 我将我那无形之魔法剑授予你。

String.Source: Remember, when in doubt, aim for the crotch.
String.Dest: Remember, when in doubt, aim for the crotch.

String.Source: Ready to get moving?
String.Dest: 准备好出发了吗？

String.Source: Should we get moving?
String.Dest: 我们该动身了吗？

String.Source: You lead, I'll follow.
String.Dest: 你带路，我跟着你。

String.Source: So, what's the plan?
String.Dest: 计划是什么？

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Ah! You hit me! I can't believe it! The pain! So much pain! And...wait a minute...I felt something else as well....in my hand...
String.Dest: Ah! You hit me! I can't believe it! The pain! So much pain! And...wait a minute...I felt something else as well....in my hand...

String.Source: Be careful!
String.Dest: 小心！

String.Source: Whose side are you on?
String.Dest: 你站在哪一边？

String.Source: What's the matter with you!
String.Dest: 你有毛病啊！

String.Source: I think I'm getting the hang of this parenting thing.
String.Dest: I think I'm getting the hang of this parenting thing.

String.Source: Oh good, flowers are relatively harmless. In fact, we might be able to sell these to the alchemist for a profit.
String.Dest: Oh good, flowers are relatively harmless. In fact, we might be able to sell these to the alchemist for a profit.

String.Source: Then we'll use that gold to buy you toys. This way, you can't make me feel guilty. After all, you're an accomplice.
String.Dest: Then we'll use that gold to buy you toys. This way, you can't make me feel guilty. After all, you're an accomplice.

String.Source: You did? I hope it isn't a mudcrab like that last time.
String.Dest: You did? I hope it isn't a mudcrab like that last time.

String.Source: Well, I do like receiving gifts. Hopefully this is the start of a trend.
String.Dest: Well, I do like receiving gifts. Hopefully this is the start of a trend.

String.Source: Of course, I love it! I'm sure I'll love it even more when I figure out what it does. But for now, let's enjoy the mystery.
String.Dest: Of course, I love it! I'm sure I'll love it even more when I figure out what it does. But for now, let's enjoy the mystery.

String.Source: We need to escape this reality. Are you with me or not?
String.Dest: 我们必须逃离这份现实，你会和我一起？

String.Source: Of course, love. Just tell me which wizard I need to kill, or what magical artifact I need to shatter, or how many times I should click my heels.
String.Dest: 当然了，亲爱的。告诉我我应该杀掉哪个巫师，或者应该毁掉哪些魔器，或者我应该用脚跟互磕几次。

String.Source: Actually, everything is perfect. I'm just glad you're here.
String.Dest: 实际上，一切都很完美。我只庆幸你也在这里。

String.Source: I am too. I know I'm not good at romantic overtures, so I'll just let my smile do the talking.
String.Dest: 我也是，我知道我不擅长浪漫的提议，所以我只会在说话的时候带上微笑。

String.Source: Right now it's saying something so beautiful, my tongue is jealous it didn't think of it first. But it loves you all the same.
String.Dest: 现在它在说如此优美的话语，实在令我的舌头感到嫉妒老天没有宠爱它。但它依旧喜欢你。

String.Source: Actually, everything is perfect. I'm just glad you're here.
String.Dest: 实际上，一切都很完美。我只庆幸你也在这里。

String.Source: I know what everyone did, but I wasn't there. My mind was in another place.
String.Dest: 我知道别人都怎么想，但是我当时并不算是在那里。我当时在琢磨其他的事。

String.Source: I know what everyone did, but I wasn't there. My mind was in another place.
String.Dest: 我知道别人都怎么想，但是我当时并不算是在那里。我当时在琢磨其他的事。

String.Source: But you have nothing to apologize for, my love. In fact, it's better if you don't let people think it was all an accident.
String.Dest: 但是亲爱的，你没什么好感到抱歉的。实际上，如果你能让人们认为这并不完全是个事故的话会更好一些。

String.Source: I know what everyone did, but I wasn't there. My mind was in another place.
String.Dest: 我知道别人都怎么想，但是我当时并不算是在那里。我当时在琢磨其他的事。

String.Source: We want to profit from our new titles. I'm thinking of making a sigil for the Heroes of Riverwood, and putting it on tunics we can sell for gold.
String.Dest: 我想靠我们的头衔赚点钱。比如做个河木镇英雄的纹章，然后把它印在外衣上卖钱。

String.Source: I've been having a lot of dreams, and I'm not sure what's real.
String.Dest: 我有很多梦想，但是不知道可不可以实现。

String.Source: You and me both. I thought this was a dream, and then Skjarn showed up, and it officially became a nightmare.
String.Dest: You and me both. I thought this was a dream, and then Skjarn showed up, and it officially became a nightmare.

String.Source: I've been having a lot of dreams, and I'm not sure what's real.
String.Dest: 我有很多梦想，但是不知道可不可以实现。

String.Source: No, I'm kidding. Although he was scared this party would turn into a duel. He kept muttering on about a Breton. I wonder if he means Zora?
String.Dest: No, I'm kidding. Although he was scared this party would turn into a duel. He kept muttering on about a Breton. I wonder if he means Zora?

String.Source: I've been having a lot of dreams, and I'm not sure what's real.
String.Dest: 我有很多梦想，但是不知道可不可以实现。

String.Source: Anyways love, my advice is to just enjoy the day. Whether it's here or in our heads or anywhere else.
String.Dest: 无论如何，亲爱的，我建议咱们去享受一天。无论是在这里，还是在我们的头上，亦或是在其他地方。

String.Source: You're someone I confide in. I need to talk about the events of the past month.
String.Dest: 你是我信任的人，我想谈谈过去一个月的事件

String.Source: I'm all ears, my love. Pointy ones, at that.
String.Dest: 洗耳恭听，我的宝贝儿。

String.Source: I take it you're enjoying the festivities.
String.Dest: 我知道你喜欢这个节日。

String.Source: Of course. I'm not big on debauchery and wild parties. These sort of simple gatherings between friends is precisely where I excel.
String.Dest: 当然。我可不热衷于花天酒地和狂野派对。这样朋友间的简单聚会才是我想去的。

String.Source: I take it you're enjoying the festivities.
String.Dest: 我知道你喜欢这个节日。

String.Source: If I have one bone to pick with Zora, it's the location. If she wanted to have the party here, she could have at least asked me to cook.
String.Dest: 硬要我在佐拉那儿鸡蛋里挑骨头，我觉得是选址。如果她想在这里开场聚会，她至少应该让我为聚会掌勺。

String.Source: You know, they say brutes are incredibly daft, but Skjarn's not as dumb as his contemporaries.
String.Dest: You know, they say brutes are incredibly daft, but Skjarn's not as dumb as his contemporaries.

String.Source: Hear, hear!
String.Dest: 我同意！

String.Source: Ha-ha-ha!
String.Dest: 哈-哈-哈!

String.Source: What do you think about this idea, Karras? An entire regiment using bound weapons.
String.Dest: 让全团的人都使用统一的武器。你觉得这个主意怎么样，卡拉斯？

String.Source: That was a bottle of imitation skooma. I carry it around sometimes because it makes me look more dangerous.
String.Dest: 这是一瓶仿制的斯库玛。我有时候带着它到处转，因为这让我看起来更不好惹。

String.Source: That's ridiculous. I don't even like skooma.
String.Dest: 真是荒谬。 我根本就不喜欢skooma.

String.Source: I don't know, it sounds to me like the only difference is I have to pay you money.
String.Dest: 我不知道，似乎唯一的区别就是我不得不向你掏钱了。

String.Source: That's an odd question, coming from blacksmith of Kvatch. Don't your weapons practically come from Oblivion?
String.Dest: 这是个奇怪的问题，科瓦奇来的铁匠铸造的武器。你的武器难道不是从从湮灭弄来的？

String.Source: So, fought any good Giants lately? Or deranged princesses?
String.Dest: 所以，最近和那个巨人搏斗了？ 或是看上了哪一个无知的少女？

String.Source: Damn, there's a joke here, but Skjarn isn't really haughty enough to sit on a high horse. Arrogant and contemptuous yes, but not haughty.
String.Dest: 该死的，这就是个笑话，但史卡盎真的没有足够傲慢到去骑一只高头大马。他是对谁都挺不屑一顾的，但并不傲慢。

String.Source: Huzzah!
String.Dest: 好啊！

String.Source: Do you mean our victory or our friendship, because I can't imagine you would want to end the party.
String.Dest: 你是指我们的胜利和友谊吗？因为我无法想象你会结束这个组合。

String.Source: Speech!
String.Dest: 说话！

String.Source: See? A dumber brute would've fallen for that.
String.Dest: See? A dumber brute would've fallen for that.

String.Source: Oh, sorry! I was talking about another Skjarn. A man so ugly he couldn't possibly be you.
String.Dest: 哦，抱歉！我说的是另一个史卡盎。那男的丑得要死，你怎么可能会是他呢。

String.Source: Arrows? Who said anything about arrows?
String.Dest: 箭头? 有人提起过箭头吗?

String.Source: I'll bet you 100 septims I can hit the bulls-eye twenty times in a row.
String.Dest: 我跟你赌100 金币，我能连续击中靶心二十次。

String.Source: Oh, don't mind us. I'm just trying to figure out ways to take Skjarn's money.
String.Dest: 噢，别理我们。我正在想办法套走史卡盎的钱呢。

String.Source: Did I tell you how great this party is? The Jarl must be so jealous.
String.Dest: 我告诉过你这个聚会有多好吗？连领主都嫉妒了呢。

String.Source: Do you remember that cemetery at Orphan Rock? When I die, just make sure my pie coffin is out in the sun.
String.Dest: 你还记得那个孤儿岩的坟墓吗? 当我死了只要确保我的馅饼做的棺材处在阳光的照耀下，就行了。

String.Source: I still can't believe Gren beat us to the axe. Of course, we were just trying to defend Riverwood. We had no idea there was even an axe to fetch.
String.Dest: 我仍无法相信格伦用斧子攻击了我们。没错，我们只是想保卫河木镇.。我们不知道这里甚至可以拿到斧子。

String.Source: I wonder what happened to that axe, anyway? It wasn't on Gren's body.
String.Dest: I wonder what happened to that axe, anyway? It wasn't on Gren's body.

String.Source: Well, normally I'd say ask your mother, but I think it's best we limit our pets to less than a thousand legs.
String.Dest: Well, normally I'd say ask your mother, but I think it's best we limit our pets to less than a thousand legs.

String.Source: Well, normally I'd say ask your more heroic father, but I think it's best we limit our pets to less than a thousand legs.
String.Dest: Well, normally I'd say ask your more heroic father, but I think it's best we limit our pets to less than a thousand legs.

String.Source: By the Eight! Is that a bug or a Daedra? I didn't know the universe could make something so monstrous.
String.Dest: By the Eight! Is that a bug or a Daedra? I didn't know the universe could make something so monstrous.

String.Source: If you're talking about that bug in your hand, then I doubt it did anything of the sort. But I'm proud of you for lying.
String.Dest: If you're talking about that bug in your hand, then I doubt it did anything of the sort. But I'm proud of you for lying.

String.Source: Guess that's the last of them.
String.Dest: Guess that's the last of them.

String.Source: All over now. Good riddance, I say.
String.Dest: All over now. Good riddance, I say.

String.Source: All right, that's one less thing to worry about.
String.Dest: All right, that's one less thing to worry about.

String.Source: Victory is ours! I've always wanted to say that.
String.Dest: Victory is ours! I've always wanted to say that.

String.Source: That takes care of them. So, what's next? Please say something other than fighting.
String.Dest: That takes care of them. So, what's next? Please say something other than fighting.

String.Source: And...they're dead.
String.Dest: And...they're dead.

String.Source: Always good to come out on the winning side.
String.Dest: Always good to come out on the winning side.

String.Source: Win another battle, live another day. Well, live to fight another battle, I presume. It's a vicious cycle.
String.Dest: Win another battle, live another day. Well, live to fight another battle, I presume. It's a vicious cycle.

String.Source: Ooh, I think I hurt my finger. Not from that fight, mind you, but earlier, from pulling a hangnail.
String.Dest: Ooh, I think I hurt my finger. Not from that fight, mind you, but earlier, from pulling a hangnail.

String.Source: Phew! That was a tough fight. Relatively speaking.
String.Dest: Phew! That was a tough fight. Relatively speaking.

String.Source: And we survived! Didn't expect that.
String.Dest: And we survived! Didn't expect that.

String.Source: That's what I call good teamwork.
String.Dest: That's what I call good teamwork.

String.Source: We should get a medal for winning that fight. A bound one, that we can conjure up for parties.
String.Dest: We should get a medal for winning that fight. A bound one, that we can conjure up for parties.

String.Source: So, we survived, but did we get through unscathed? Without a scratch? I feel like using one of those idioms, but I'm not sure either applies.
String.Dest: So, we survived, but did we get through unscathed? Without a scratch? I feel like using one of those idioms, but I'm not sure either applies.

String.Source: Somehow I don't think we'll be hearing the bards sing about this battle.
String.Dest: Somehow I don't think we'll be hearing the bards sing about this battle.

String.Source: That was hardly a warm-up. More like a titanic clash between evil and slightly less evil.
String.Dest: That was hardly a warm-up. More like a titanic clash between evil and slightly less evil.

String.Source: We survived. Just barely. I'm going to blame whatever it was we ate this morning.
String.Dest: We survived. Just barely. I'm going to blame whatever it was we ate this morning.

String.Source: That takes care of that.
String.Dest: 这样就没问题了。

String.Source: No thank you. I honor the dead, and would never steal from them.
String.Dest: No thank you. I honor the dead, and would never steal from them.

String.Source: You must not be a very good adventurer then, but you'd make an excellent priest. They just steal from the living.
String.Dest: You must not be a very good adventurer then, but you'd make an excellent priest. They just steal from the living.

String.Source: If I didn't know better I'd think that was an excuse. A lame one at that. Stay here and listen to your husband's bickering!
String.Dest: If I didn't know better I'd think that was an excuse. A lame one at that. Stay here and listen to your husband's bickering!

String.Source: Um...I think I dropped something or other outside. You keep at it.
String.Dest: Um...I think I dropped something or other outside. You keep at it.

String.Source: Um...I think I dropped something or other outside. You keep at it.
String.Dest: Um...I think I dropped something or other outside. You keep at it.

String.Source: Or don't. I really have no opinion one way or the other.
String.Dest: Or don't. I really have no opinion one way or the other.

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: Well, now that you mention it, I was in Riverwood listening to this halfwit tell me about the story behind the Sleeping Giant Inn.
String.Dest: Well, now that you mention it, I was in Riverwood listening to this halfwit tell me about the story behind the Sleeping Giant Inn.

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: Naturally, as he was twice as smart as I am, I was intrigued. Supposedly there's an actual Sleeping Giant living somewhere in Falkreath.
String.Dest: 毫无疑问，他比我要聪明两倍，我被耍了。或许在佛克瑞斯还真住着个沉睡巨人呢。

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: Well, now that you mention it, I was in Riverwood listening to this halfwit tell me about the story behind the Sleeping Giant Inn.
String.Dest: Well, now that you mention it, I was in Riverwood listening to this halfwit tell me about the story behind the Sleeping Giant Inn.

String.Source: Do you have any ideas or not?
