String.Dest: Do you have any ideas or not?

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: Naturally, as he was twice as smart as I am, I was intrigued. Supposedly there's an actual Sleeping Giant living somewhere in Falkreath.
String.Dest: 毫无疑问，他比我要聪明两倍，我被耍了。或许在佛克瑞斯还真住着个沉睡巨人呢。

String.Source: Do you have any ideas or not?
String.Dest: Do you have any ideas or not?

String.Source: As in, that's all he does. Sleep. Part of a hagraven spell, supposedly. It only wakes when somebody tries to steal the witch's treasure.
String.Dest: As in, that's all he does. Sleep. Part of a hagraven spell, supposedly. It only wakes when somebody tries to steal the witch's treasure.

String.Source: What do you mean by "Sleeping" Giant?
String.Dest: 你说"睡着的"巨人是什么意思？

String.Source: What do you mean by "Sleeping" Giant?
String.Dest: 你说"睡着的"巨人是什么意思？

String.Source: Now, the person I spoke with said he already slew the Giant, but later on I realized he was making the whole thing up. The slaying part.
String.Dest: Now, the person I spoke with said he already slew the Giant, but later on I realized he was making the whole thing up. The slaying part.

String.Source: What do you mean by "Sleeping" Giant?
String.Dest: 你说"睡着的"巨人是什么意思？

String.Source: The Giant and the treasure may very well exist.
String.Dest: 宝藏和守护巨人很可能是存在的。

String.Source: Giants go to sleep just like the rest of us. How is this one different?
String.Dest: 巨人也是跟我们一样要睡觉的吧。为嘛这只不睡？

String.Source: The say a hagraven cast a spell on it long ago, and it only wakes when an adventurer comes to plunder the treasure it guards.
String.Dest: 据说有一个乌鸦鬼婆很久以前给它施加了一个咒语，只有当冒险者来夺取它所守护的财宝时，它才会苏醒过来。

String.Source: Giants go to sleep just like the rest of us. How is this one different?
String.Dest: 巨人也是跟我们一样要睡觉的吧。为嘛这只不睡？

String.Source: Now, the person I spoke with said he already slew the Giant, but later on I realized he was making the whole thing up. The slaying part.
String.Dest: Now, the person I spoke with said he already slew the Giant, but later on I realized he was making the whole thing up. The slaying part.

String.Source: The Giant and the treasure may very well exist.
String.Dest: 宝藏和守护巨人很可能是存在的。

String.Source: Giants go to sleep just like the rest of us. How is this one different?
String.Dest: 巨人也是跟我们一样要睡觉的吧。为嘛这只不睡？

String.Source: It inevitably will, which is why I propose we bring along some muscle, just in case the whole lullaby thing doesn't work.
String.Dest: 喔，我料到了这点，这也是我坚持带上一名战士的原因，就是为了防着给它唱催眠曲这招不管用。

String.Source: Something tells me this will go horribly wrong.
String.Dest: 我感觉到这件事正在被搞砸。

String.Source: Something tells me this will go horribly wrong.
String.Dest: 我感觉到这件事正在被搞砸。

String.Source: I have some friends in Morthal who told me there's some legendary hero who lives in the marsh and rides a Chaurus.
String.Dest: 我有一些朋友住在墨索尔城，他们告诉我哪里有一些传说中的英雄骑着泥螃蟹生活在沼泽里.

String.Source: Something tells me this will go horribly wrong.
String.Dest: 我感觉到这件事正在被搞砸。

String.Source: If we can recruit him and the bard, I'd feel a lot more comfortable about our chances.
String.Dest: 如果我们能招募他和那个诗人，我感觉我们承担的风险会更小点儿。

String.Source: Then we have to find ourselves a bard.
String.Dest: 这么说咱们得找个吟游诗人入伙。

String.Source: Well yes, but to be honest, I would rather not stake my life on the words of this halfwit, regardless of how smart he seems standing next to me.
String.Dest: 好吧，但是老实说，我不会因为这个蠢货说的东西就用生命冒险，不管站在我身边的他看起来有多聪明。

String.Source: Then we have to find ourselves a bard.
String.Dest: 这么说咱们得找个吟游诗人入伙。

String.Source: I was thinking we should also recruit a strong warrior, in the event the giant refuses to take its nap.
String.Dest: 我想我们也应该招募一个强大的战士，如果这个巨人一直不去睡午觉的话。

String.Source: Then we have to find ourselves a bard.
String.Dest: 这么说咱们得找个吟游诗人入伙。

String.Source: I have some friends in Morthal who told me there's some legendary hero who lives in the marsh and rides a Chaurus.
String.Dest: 我有一些朋友住在墨索尔城，他们告诉我哪里有一些传说中的英雄骑着泥螃蟹生活在沼泽里.

String.Source: Then we have to find ourselves a bard.
String.Dest: 这么说咱们得找个吟游诗人入伙。

String.Source: If we can recruit him and the bard, I'd feel a lot more comfortable about our chances.
String.Dest: 如果我们能招募他和那个诗人，我感觉我们承担的风险会更小点儿。

String.Source: If I listen to your advice, I'm the lowest wit of all.
String.Dest: 若是我听了你的建议，我就是最不风趣的人了。

String.Source: Yes, but if we were smart, we wouldn't be adventurers. We would be scholars or librarians or some other horrifyingly dull occupation.
String.Dest: 是啊，如果我们够聪明的话，我们就不会是冒险者啦。我们可以是学者或是图书馆员或其他听起来高端却无趣的职业。

String.Source: If I listen to your advice, I'm the lowest wit of all.
String.Dest: 若是我听了你的建议，我就是最不风趣的人了。

String.Source: Besides, this will be as easy as taking meat from a mudcrab. You see, there's a trick to this spell that the hagraven uses to get to her treasure.
String.Dest: 而且，这会像从泥沼蟹身上得到蟹肉一样容易。你瞧，使用这个魔法有个窍门儿，乌鸦鬼婆就常用它来获取她的宝藏。

String.Source: If I listen to your advice, I'm the lowest wit of all.
String.Dest: 若是我听了你的建议，我就是最不风趣的人了。

String.Source: According to the halfwit, all we need to do is play it a lullaby and we'll be able to rock the angry giant back to sleep.
String.Dest: 根据那个白痴所说，我们只要哼首摇篮曲就能把愤怒的巨人哄睡着。

String.Source: How do you propose we get past the Giant?
String.Dest: 你打算怎么让我们从那些巨人身边穿过？

String.Source: I am glad you asked. It means we think on the same level, as that is precisely what I asked our halfwit friend.
String.Dest: 很高兴你这样问了。这意味着我们的智商好歹是在同一个水平面上，我就是这样问我们那个蠢货朋友的。

String.Source: How do you propose we get past the Giant?
String.Dest: 你打算怎么让我们从那些巨人身边穿过？

String.Source: Supposedly the sleep spell has a weakness which allows the Hagraven to access her treasure.
String.Dest: 很可能那个睡眠魔法什么弱点让乌鸦鬼婆有机可乘以便取用她的宝藏。

String.Source: How do you propose we get past the Giant?
String.Dest: 你打算怎么让我们从那些巨人身边穿过？

String.Source: According to him, all we need to do is play it a lullaby and we'll be able to rock the angry giant back to sleep.
String.Dest: 照他的说法，我们只需要对着一个狂怒的巨人演奏摇篮曲就能让他安然入睡。

String.Source: Sleeping or not, slaying a Giant doesn't sound too difficult.
String.Dest: 不管睡觉与否，杀一个巨人都不会太难。

String.Source: Maybe for you, but I'd feel better if I didn't get squashed in the process. And besides, there may be a better way.
String.Dest: 对你来说是容易，但对于我来说，我可不想被巨人给踩瘪了。以及，应该会有更好的办法来解决吧。

String.Source: The halfwit told me there's a trick to the spell that lets the hagraven get to her treasure.
String.Dest: 那个傻瓜告诉我这个咒语有个窍门能让乌鸦鬼婆得到她的宝贝。

String.Source: Sleeping or not, slaying a Giant doesn't sound too difficult.
String.Dest: 不管睡觉与否，杀一个巨人都不会太难。

String.Source: Sleeping or not, slaying a Giant doesn't sound too difficult.
String.Dest: 不管睡觉与否，杀一个巨人都不会太难。

String.Source: According to him, all we need to do is play it a lullaby and we'll be able to rock the angry giant back to sleep.
String.Dest: 照他的说法，我们只需要对着一个狂怒的巨人演奏摇篮曲就能让他安然入睡。

String.Source: In other words, this could be a complete waste of time.
String.Dest: 换句话说这完全就是在浪费时间。

String.Source: Well, nothing in life is guaranteed, save the end of it. I should note however that this halfwit was very detailed in his description of the Giant.
String.Dest: 好吧，生命里没有什么是有保证的，让我们试试做到最好。我再怎么也该注意到这个笨蛋对巨人的描述太过详细了。

String.Source: For instance, supposedly the spell has a weakness which allows the Hagraven to access her treasure.
String.Dest: 比如说，那个法术很可能有某种弱点会被乌鸦鬼婆利用来存取她自己的宝藏。

String.Source: In other words, this could be a complete waste of time.
String.Dest: 换句话说这完全就是在浪费时间。

String.Source: In other words, this could be a complete waste of time.
String.Dest: 换句话说这完全就是在浪费时间。

String.Source: According to him, all we need to do is play it a lullaby and we'll be able to rock the angry giant back to sleep.
String.Dest: 照他的说法，我们只需要对着一个狂怒的巨人演奏摇篮曲就能让他安然入睡。

String.Source: As am I. I do prefer being alive as opposed to that other thing.
String.Dest: As am I. I do prefer being alive as opposed to that other thing.

String.Source: In any case, if there's a way to make you better in combat, I'm all for it.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，只要有办法提高你的战斗力，我都完全赞成。

String.Source: I say we scour the halls of the Arcanaeum in Winterhold. There must be a book there somewhere I can understand.
String.Dest: 我们我们要仔细找找冬堡的秘藏馆，我想一定有一本书，我可以或多或少看懂一点。

String.Source: In any case, if there's a way to make you better in combat, I'm all for it.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，只要有办法提高你的战斗力，我都完全赞成。

String.Source: So what do you think is the best way to tap your limitless potential?
String.Dest: 你觉得什么是最好的方法来发掘你无限的潜力？

String.Source: Ha-ha, have your fun. But in all honesty, I do think I might be able to learn a spell or two. I mean, I learned bladebinding easily enough.
String.Dest: Ha-ha, have your fun. But in all honesty, I do think I might be able to learn a spell or two. I mean, I learned bladebinding easily enough.

String.Source: I say we scour the halls of the Arcanaeum in Winterhold. There must be a book there somewhere I can understand.
String.Dest: I say we scour the halls of the Arcanaeum in Winterhold. There must be a book there somewhere I can understand.

String.Source: So what do you think is the best way to tap your limitless potential?
String.Dest: 你觉得什么是最好的方法来发掘你无限的潜力？

String.Source: So we've reached a consensus then. I'm not a hapless idiot after all. Just hapless.
String.Dest: So we've reached a consensus then. I'm not a hapless idiot after all. Just hapless.

String.Source: I agree with Olivia. The tomes failed you.
String.Dest: 我跟奥莉薇雅想的一样。那些书辜负了你的期望。

String.Source: It's always some wizard's fault. They're just bad people in general.
String.Dest: 都是法师们的错。他们大部分都是坏人。

String.Source: Well, I used to think so, but now that I'm thinking about learning more spells, I probably should describe them with a few less expletives.
String.Dest: 嗯，我以前也是这样，但现在我我在考虑多学些魔法的事儿，我形容它们应该少些脏话。

String.Source: It's always some wizard's fault. They're just bad people in general.
String.Dest: 都是法师们的错。他们大部分都是坏人。

String.Source: I'll still hate them of course. I think I'll always be a bladebinder at heart. But maybe a bladebinder who's one by choice, not by skill.
String.Dest: I'll still hate them of course. I think I'll always be a bladebinder at heart. But maybe a bladebinder who's one by choice, not by skill.

String.Source: If that were true, wouldn't every child from here to Valenwood be casting invisibility spells on our clothes?
String.Dest: 如果这是真的，难道每一个从威木省来这里的孩子都能在我们的衣服上施展无形的法术吗？

String.Source: Stop making excuses. Spell tomes are so easy a child could figure them out.
String.Dest: 别找理由了，法术书简单的连个小孩都能弄明白。.

String.Source: Unless the children of this generation are far more respectful of their elders than mine. Such a shame.
String.Dest: 现在的孩子对于长辈的态度远不如我小的时候恭敬，真丢人。

String.Source: Stop making excuses. Spell tomes are so easy a child could figure them out.
String.Dest: 别找理由了，法术书简单的连个小孩都能弄明白。.

String.Source: Way to pass the blame onto somebody else.
String.Dest: 这样的责任推给别人。

String.Source: Oh, I never miss an opportunity to attribute my failings to others.
String.Dest: 哦，我不会错过任何一个把自己的失败归咎于他人的机会。

String.Source: Just the other day I was questioning my ability to lead when I realized how much easier it is to follow you instead. See? All your fault.
String.Dest: Just the other day I was questioning my ability to lead when I realized how much easier it is to follow you instead. See? All your fault.

String.Source: Way to pass the blame onto somebody else.
String.Dest: 这样的责任推给别人。

String.Source: Yes, I have one. This Olivia Meronin character you met in Winterhold. Is it true what she says?
String.Dest: 对，我想起来了。那位你在冬堡见到的奥莉薇雅·梅洛妮，她说的是不是真的？

String.Source: Any questions now that we have time to relax?
String.Dest: 我们现在有时间休息吗？

String.Source: You know, the bit about students not failing so much as instructors failing to teach them.
String.Dest: 就是那所谓的防止教育者教育失败同时受教者归于堕落的事儿啦，你懂的。.

String.Source: Any questions now that we have time to relax?
String.Dest: 我们现在有时间休息吗？

String.Source: I mean, maybe it isn't my fault I can't cast a spell. Maybe it's the fault of the wizards who write those blasted spell tomes!
String.Dest: I mean, maybe it isn't my fault I can't cast a spell. Maybe it's the fault of the wizards who write those blasted spell tomes!

String.Source: Any questions now that we have time to relax?
String.Dest: 我们现在有时间休息吗？

String.Source: So it's Rumarin's turn to make a decision. Bold move on your part, seeing as I'm half a halfwit.
String.Dest: 现在轮到罗美勒决定了. Bold 挪到你的位置上去, 看看你有没有我一半精明.

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: Where do you think we should go next?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们接下来该去哪?

String.Source: Just remember to point the finger elsewhere when things go wrong, otherwise I'm likely to pull it and make some sort of crude noise.
String.Dest: 只需记住，当事情出错了的时候，要责怪别的人，否则我可能会逃走，还会发出些粗杂的噪音。

String.Source: Thonar locked me up. This was about revenge.
String.Dest: Thonar locked me up. This was about revenge.

String.Source: And the bloodthirsty murderers and savages we unleashed on The Reach? Just a means to an end.
String.Dest: And the bloodthirsty murderers and savages we unleashed on The Reach? Just a means to an end.

String.Source: Thonar locked me up. This was about revenge.
String.Dest: Thonar locked me up. This was about revenge.

String.Source: Oh, I'm not disagreeing with you. I totally get it. I'd kill all of the townsfolk for personal satisfaction. That's just the way the Gods made me.
String.Dest: Oh, I'm not disagreeing with you. I totally get it. I'd kill all of the townsfolk for personal satisfaction. That's just the way the Gods made me.

String.Source: True, and we can always kill Thonar later. That's the best part about loose ends. They can always be tied.
String.Dest: True, and we can always kill Thonar later. That's the best part about loose ends. They can always be tied.

String.Source: Thonar locked me up. But revenge wasn't worth letting Madanach free.
String.Dest: Thonar locked me up. But revenge wasn't worth letting Madanach free.

String.Source: They may not have signed the Green Pact, but I have.
String.Dest: 他们可能还没签署绿色条约，但是我已经签了。

String.Source: Oh right. Religion. One of three topics I love to not discuss, next to politics and Ulundil's unfortunate haircut.
String.Dest: Oh right. Religion. One of three topics I love to not discuss, next to politics and Ulundil's unfortunate haircut.

String.Source: They may not have signed the Green Pact, but I have.
String.Dest: 他们可能还没签署绿色条约，但是我已经签了。

String.Source: Well, I may not be able to discuss it, but I can still give you a look of disapproval. See if you can read this one.
String.Dest: Well, I may not be able to discuss it, but I can still give you a look of disapproval. See if you can read this one.

String.Source: The name's Rumarin. Professional adventurer, bladebinder, and grave robber.
String.Dest: The name's Rumarin. Professional adventurer, bladebinder, and grave robber.

String.Source: What's your name?
String.Dest: 你叫什么名字?

String.Source: Well, if was a coward, the last place I'd be is out here. Although I do my best to avoid combat whenever necessary.
String.Dest: Well, if was a coward, the last place I'd be is out here. Although I do my best to avoid combat whenever necessary.

String.Source: Frightening? If you're a coward maybe.
String.Dest: Frightening? If you're a coward maybe.

String.Source: Frightening? If you're a coward maybe.
String.Dest: Frightening? If you're a coward maybe.

String.Source: For instance, that treasure over there? All yours. Those bones won't be needing it.
String.Dest: For instance, that treasure over there? All yours. Those bones won't be needing it.

String.Source: Are you okay? The skeletons must have surprised you.
String.Dest: 你没事吧？那些骷髅是不是吓了你一跳。

String.Source: Oh, I'm fine. Don't worry, that's not blood on my face, it's makeup. No, I'm sorry, "war paint."
String.Dest: Oh, I'm fine. Don't worry, that's not blood on my face, it's makeup. No, I'm sorry, "war paint."

String.Source: Are you okay? The skeletons must have surprised you.
String.Dest: 你没事吧？那些骷髅是不是吓了你一跳。

String.Source: Doesn't help much in actual war, though. But you did great. That's why you get first shot at robbing these graves.
String.Dest: Doesn't help much in actual war, though. But you did great. That's why you get first shot at robbing these graves.

String.Source: What's a bladebinder?
String.Dest: 束刃是什么？

String.Source: It's right there in the word. I summon and bind blades and weapons from Oblivion.
String.Dest: It's right there in the word. I summon and bind blades and weapons from Oblivion.

String.Source: What's a bladebinder?
String.Dest: 束刃是什么？

String.Source: I was always good with a sword and a bow, and always too lazy to carry them. Learning how to conjure the weapons I need solved that dilemma.
String.Dest: I was always good with a sword and a bow, and always too lazy to carry them. Learning how to conjure the weapons I need solved that dilemma.

String.Source: What's a bladebinder?
String.Dest: 束刃是什么？

String.Source: Well, for starters, traveling light makes it easy to flee.
String.Dest: Well, for starters, traveling light makes it easy to flee.

String.Source: What are the advantages of using only bound weapons?
String.Dest: What are the advantages of using only bound weapons?

String.Source: What's a bladebinder?
String.Dest: 束刃是什么？

String.Source: Not that I would advocate running from a fight. No, best to back away slowly until your friends intervene.
String.Dest: Not that I would advocate running from a fight. No, best to back away slowly until your friends intervene.

String.Source: What are the advantages of using only bound weapons?
String.Dest: What are the advantages of using only bound weapons?

String.Source: Yes, and it's quite clear who wins there. Thonar has all that silver, and Madanach had rags.
String.Dest: Yes, and it's quite clear who wins there. Thonar has all that silver, and Madanach had rags.

String.Source: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.
String.Dest: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.

String.Source: Although maybe rags are like coin for savages. They'll certainly keep you warmer at night.
String.Dest: Although maybe rags are like coin for savages. They'll certainly keep you warmer at night.

String.Source: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.
String.Dest: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.

String.Source: See, and that's where I'm confused. Thonar had all that silver, and Madanach has...well, rags.
String.Dest: See, and that's where I'm confused. Thonar had all that silver, and Madanach has...well, rags.

String.Source: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.
String.Dest: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.

String.Source: Are they magical rags? Well, in that case, I suppose they might be worth something. Although I still would be cautious in wearing it.
String.Dest: Are they magical rags? Well, in that case, I suppose they might be worth something. Although I still would be cautious in wearing it.

String.Source: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.
String.Dest: I chose the side that offered the greater boon. It's that simple.

String.Source: I didn't realize you were so sensitive.
String.Dest: 我不理解你为什么如此敏感。

String.Source: Yes, especially when it comes to my gangly figure and my nirnroot collection. Mock that and I'm a liable to end up in tears.
String.Dest: Yes, especially when it comes to my gangly figure and my nirnroot collection. Mock that and I'm a liable to end up in tears.

String.Source: But no, I suppose I get a bit defensive when someone asks me whether "I know magic."
String.Dest: 不是，当有人问我是否懂得魔法的时候，我会变得有一些抗拒。

String.Source: I didn't realize you were so sensitive.
String.Dest: 我不理解你为什么如此敏感。

String.Source: Of course, it's kind of my fault for playing along.
String.Dest: Of course, it's kind of my fault for playing along.

String.Source: I didn't realize you were so sensitive.
String.Dest: 我不理解你为什么如此敏感。

String.Source: True, but I don't think Alduin eats metaphors. If he did, nobody would give two septims about his diet.
String.Dest: True, but I don't think Alduin eats metaphors. If he did, nobody would give two septims about his diet.

String.Source: I'm not a world, but people think the world of me.
String.Dest: 这不是我的世界，但人们认为这是我的世界。

String.Source: In any case, you might have noticed, but I'm not so great at goodbyes. It's like closing a book.
String.Dest: In any case, you might have noticed, but I'm not so great at goodbyes. It's like closing a book.

String.Source: I'm not a world, but people think the world of me.
String.Dest: 这不是我的世界，但人们认为这是我的世界。

String.Source: Well, I hope this one still has some pages left. Most of them involve me taking your leftovers, but you get the idea. Good luck.
String.Dest: Well, I hope this one still has some pages left. Most of them involve me taking your leftovers, but you get the idea. Good luck.

String.Source: I'm not a world, but people think the world of me.
String.Dest: 这不是我的世界，但人们认为这是我的世界。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, we did. It was when your back was turned.
String.Dest: As a matter of fact, we did. It was when your back was turned.

String.Source: Oh right. I suppose you couldn't have just tapped me on the shoulder?
String.Dest: Oh right. I suppose you couldn't have just tapped me on the shoulder?

String.Source: As a matter of fact, we did. It was when your back was turned.
String.Dest: As a matter of fact, we did. It was when your back was turned.

String.Source: You know, just to say something like, "Look Rumarin, one of the Gods of all creation, Jephre, has come to Jorrvaskr for lunch and tea."
String.Dest: 比如，你只要说说"看看罗米勒, 创世诸神之一： 杰佛瑞, 来到了月瓦斯卡用餐喝茶。“

String.Source: As a matter of fact, we did. It was when your back was turned.
String.Dest: As a matter of fact, we did. It was when your back was turned.

String.Source: Leave it to me to miss out on everything.
String.Dest: 我为了他错过了一切。

String.Source: So that explains your outfit, I suppose? Although I'm not sure. The people here have a strange way of conveying status.
String.Dest: So that explains your outfit, I suppose? Although I'm not sure. The people here have a strange way of conveying status.

String.Source: Bandits are an excellent form of exercise. You should be luring them.
String.Dest: Bandits are an excellent form of exercise. You should be luring them.

String.Source: The other day I confused a hunter with a noble, and vice versa. The folks here really ought to carry signs so I know who to be courteous to.
String.Dest: The other day I confused a hunter with a noble, and vice versa. The folks here really ought to carry signs so I know who to be courteous to.

String.Source: Bandits are an excellent form of exercise. You should be luring them.
String.Dest: Bandits are an excellent form of exercise. You should be luring them.

String.Source: Where are you headed now?
String.Dest: 你现在要前往何处?

String.Source: Oh, I have a friend who works the stables at Windhelm. That's where I'm staying for the time being.
String.Dest: Oh, I have a friend who works the stables at Windhelm. That's where I'm staying for the time being.

String.Source: Where are you headed now?
String.Dest: 你现在要前往何处?

String.Source: I normally travel alone, but that's because I'm insufferable. If by chance you're willing to overlook that, I might make for a good companion.
String.Dest: I normally travel alone, but that's because I'm insufferable. If by chance you're willing to overlook that, I might make for a good companion.

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: I hate it. Well, I would, if I was the sort of person who abhorred being happy. There are really people like that, you know.
String.Dest: I hate it. Well, I would, if I was the sort of person who abhorred being happy. There are really people like that, you know.

String.Source: No, this Breezehome is aptly named. Everything is just that. Relaxed. Easy. A breeze, so to speak.
String.Dest: No, this Breezehome is aptly named. Everything is just that. Relaxed. Easy. A breeze, so to speak.

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: Why, it's absolutely dreadful! I say that because I want to be the first Elf to ever complain about living in a castle.
String.Dest: Why, it's absolutely dreadful! I say that because I want to be the first Elf to ever complain about living in a castle.

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: No, really, what is there to say? We live in a thousand story house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 不，说真的，这简直难以用语言形容！我们住在独孤城。住在一栋充满历史和传奇的房子里！

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: My clothes feel nicer, the air feels fresher, and I have a sudden urge to call people "peasants."
String.Dest: My clothes feel nicer, the air feels fresher, and I have a sudden urge to call people "peasants."

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: Good, it just needs more room for display cases. Just not enough places to display your weapon here. Well, all except that weapon.
String.Dest: Good, it just needs more room for display cases. Just not enough places to display your weapon here. Well, all except that weapon.

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: No, I kid. We're adventurers, right? We need to show people all our spoils lest they think we're lazy!
String.Dest: No, I kid. We're adventurers, right? We need to show people all our spoils lest they think we're lazy!

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: Can't have people coming over and the only thing we have to show them is a tuft of Werewolf hair, Mehrunes' drawstring and a slice of moldy cheese.
String.Dest: 别让人们过来，我们能给他们看的东西只有一簇狼人毛，一条梅鲁涅斯的裤带和一片发霉的奶酪。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: I like the fact that this home has a balcony and a fishing boat. Not that I have any inkling as to how to use either, but I can pretend to.
String.Dest: I like the fact that this home has a balcony and a fishing boat. Not that I have any inkling as to how to use either, but I can pretend to.

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: When I lived with the traveling artists, I once played an Argonian fishmonger with surprising accuracy.
String.Dest: 当我跟一帮在旅行的艺术家住在一起的时候, 我还曾经扮演过亚龙鱼贩子呢，而且演得很像。

String.Source: He was dead, of course, but you'd be surprised how many people mistake me for a corpse.
String.Dest: 他死了，当然，但你会惊奇地发现很多人误以为我也是一具尸体。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: A Dwemer home, how delightful! I hope you're open to listening to my decorating ideas.
String.Dest: A Dwemer home, how delightful! I hope you're open to listening to my decorating ideas.

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: I was thinking we could have a couple Dwarven spheres in the corner, and roll them at guests from time to time whenever they annoyed us.
String.Dest: 我在想我们可以在那个角落上放两只矮人球，一旦有来访者打扰了我们，我们就把矮人球扔向他们。

String.Source: The spheres wouldn't be functioning, of course, unless you wanted them to be. That's entirely up to you, but don't look at me to clean up the blood.
String.Dest: 除非你想要让那些球体运作，不然它们是不会动的。这完全取决于你，不过别指望我来帮你清理你的血迹。

String.Source: What do you think of our home?
String.Dest: 你觉得我们的家怎么样？

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: Well I was terrified. But Otero rose up, looking fat and half drunk, and warned the bandits to leave, or die.
String.Dest: Well I was terrified. But Otero rose up, looking fat and half drunk, and warned the bandits to leave, or die.

String.Source: The bandits started roaring with laughter. When Otero made another threat, some were reduced to tears.
String.Dest: The bandits started roaring with laughter. When Otero made another threat, some were reduced to tears.

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: They never saw the blade slide out of his sleeve. I never saw a fat man act so swift.
String.Dest: They never saw the blade slide out of his sleeve. I never saw a fat man act so swift.

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: And that's when I learned how disarming laughter really is.
String.Dest: And that's when I learned how disarming laughter really is.

String.Source: How did that relationship develop?
String.Dest: 关系是如何发展起来的？

String.Source: Otero was always better with children than adults. Probably because it's easier to make them laugh.
String.Dest: Otero was always better with children than adults. Probably because it's easier to make them laugh.

String.Source: You see, laughter was important to him. He said it was powerful enough to disarm any foe.
String.Dest: You see, laughter was important to him. He said it was powerful enough to disarm any foe.

String.Source: How did that relationship develop?
String.Dest: 关系是如何发展起来的？

String.Source: It helps that my parents were troubadours, and we spent every day around performers of all walks of life.
String.Dest: It helps that my parents were troubadours, and we spent every day around performers of all walks of life.

String.Source: You certainly have a healthy sense of humor.
String.Dest: You certainly have a healthy sense of humor.

String.Source: You certainly have a healthy sense of humor.
String.Dest: You certainly have a healthy sense of humor.

String.Source: Jesters, actors, magicians, and bards...a wellspring of speechcraft that you couldn't help but drink from.
String.Dest: Jesters, actors, magicians, and bards...a wellspring of speechcraft that you couldn't help but drink from.

String.Source: You certainly have a healthy sense of humor.
String.Dest: You certainly have a healthy sense of humor.

String.Source: It was the jester to whom I gravitated to, a Nord man named Otero.
String.Dest: 那是一个我喜欢的小丑，是个诺德人，叫奥特罗。

String.Source: When did you become an adventurer?
String.Dest: When did you become an adventurer?

String.Source: The day I stopped wanting to be a jester.
String.Dest: The day I stopped wanting to be a jester.

String.Source: When did you become an adventurer?
String.Dest: When did you become an adventurer?

String.Source: I was about ten years old. Otero had taken me aside one afternoon to practice his new act.
String.Dest: I was about ten years old. Otero had taken me aside one afternoon to practice his new act.

String.Source: When did you become an adventurer?
String.Dest: When did you become an adventurer?

String.Source: It was a great routine. In fact, I was laughing so loud I attracted an audience. A group of bandits.
String.Dest: It was a great routine. In fact, I was laughing so loud I attracted an audience. A group of bandits.

String.Source: Yes, it's almost rather adorable the way they think they can still spend it. And even if they could, what would they spend it on?
String.Dest: 是啊，他们到了这个地步仍然认为他们能花掉那笔钱还真是令人尊敬。。也许他们能，他们又能花到哪里呢？

String.Source: Yes, I'll be taking everything here. Whether the dead like it or not.
String.Dest: Yes, I'll be taking everything here. Whether the dead like it or not.

String.Source: Traps, probably. Although I imagine the only thing a skeleton fears are dogs.
String.Dest: Traps, probably. Although I imagine the only thing a skeleton fears are dogs.

String.Source: Yes, I'll be taking everything here. Whether the dead like it or not.
String.Dest: Yes, I'll be taking everything here. Whether the dead like it or not.

String.Source: That's always been my strategy for brawls. The problem is I never have enough companions to make it worthwhile.
String.Dest: That's always been my strategy for brawls. The problem is I never have enough companions to make it worthwhile.

String.Source: Yes, and once your friends are there to hold you back, you charge ahead.
String.Dest: 是的，并且一旦你的朋友让你回去，你会义无反顾地回去。

String.Source: Well, I know a guy. A real master of mimicry.
String.Dest: Well, I know a guy. A real master of mimicry.

String.Source: Who crafts these robes?
String.Dest: Who crafts these robes?

String.Source: Robes from Winterhold, fake scimitars from Hammerfell, there is nothing this craftsman can't replicate. Well, except a personality.
String.Dest: Robes from Winterhold, fake scimitars from Hammerfell, there is nothing this craftsman can't replicate. Well, except a personality.

String.Source: Who crafts these robes?
String.Dest: Who crafts these robes?

String.Source: I hate to do it, but it's their fault for putting gold in their coffins.
String.Dest: I hate to do it, but it's their fault for putting gold in their coffins.

String.Source: Yes, the markets in Sovngarde must be awfully expensive given how desperate they are to take their possessions with them.
String.Dest: 是啊，鉴于松加德的人们是在多么铤而走险的情况下才能把自己的财产带在身边，那里市场的物价一定贵的吓人。

String.Source: Okay, the Dragonborn and Alduin walk into a tavern. The Dragonborn orders a drink, while Alduin orders a High Elf.
String.Dest: Okay, the Dragonborn and Alduin walk into a tavern. The Dragonborn orders a drink, while Alduin orders a High Elf.

String.Source: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.
String.Dest: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.

String.Source: The wench brings over their orders. The Dragonborn takes a sip. Alduin, however, grabs the Elf by the tail and presses him against his bottom.
String.Dest: The wench brings over their orders. The Dragonborn takes a sip. Alduin, however, grabs the Elf by the tail and presses him against his bottom.

String.Source: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.
String.Dest: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.

String.Source: The wench, disgusted, asks the Dragonborn what in Oblivion he's doing.
String.Dest: 那年轻的女孩，露出厌恶的神色，责问龙裔在湮灭里都干了些什么。

String.Source: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.
String.Dest: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.

String.Source: The Dragonborn says, "Well, Alduin will eat just about anything, but ever since he ate the world, he likes to measure things first."
String.Dest: 龙裔说， "是啊，奥杜因什么都吃。但自从他吃了个世界之后，他就开始喜欢在吃之前先测量东西的大小了。"

String.Source: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.
String.Dest: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.

String.Source: That's the joke. And since I know you're going to kill that hungry son of a bitch, I might as well tell it now while it's still relevant. Good luck.
String.Dest: That's the joke. And since I know you're going to kill that hungry son of a bitch, I might as well tell it now while it's still relevant. Good luck.

String.Source: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.
String.Dest: No, I haven't. Let's hear it.

String.Source: Oh right, saving the world and all that. (Sigh) Fine, if you must.
String.Dest: Oh right, saving the world and all that. (Sigh) Fine, if you must.

String.Source: This isn't the time for that.
String.Dest: This isn't the time for that.

String.Source: But it's a shame, seeing as the joke loses its relevance the moment you kill Alduin.
String.Dest: But it's a shame, seeing as the joke loses its relevance the moment you kill Alduin.

String.Source: This isn't the time for that.
String.Dest: This isn't the time for that.

String.Source: Which makes his death go against my self-interests. Hmmm....maybe we should let him live?
String.Dest: Which makes his death go against my self-interests. Hmmm....maybe we should let him live?

String.Source: This isn't the time for that.
String.Dest: This isn't the time for that.

String.Source: This isn't the time for that.
String.Dest: This isn't the time for that.

String.Source: Eh, forget it, I suppose one bad joke isn't worth losing the world over. Good luck.
String.Dest: Eh, forget it, I suppose one bad joke isn't worth losing the world over. Good luck.

String.Source: Ha! Well I'm sure wherever Madanach is, he'll be glad to know you didn't put much thought into his death.
String.Dest: 哈！我确定无论迈德纳奇在哪儿，他都会很高兴知道你没把太多心思花在他的死上的。

String.Source: I needed to escape Cidhna Mine. I didn't real care who lived or died.
String.Dest: I needed to escape Cidhna Mine. I didn't real care who lived or died.

String.Source: Ha! Well I'm sure wherever Thonar is, he'll be glad to know you didn't put much thought into his death.
String.Dest: 哈！好吧我很清楚托纳尔在哪,他一定很乐意听说你对他的死不以为意。

String.Source: I needed to escape Cidhna Mine. I didn't real care who lived or died.
String.Dest: I needed to escape Cidhna Mine. I didn't real care who lived or died.

String.Source: This was never about Ancano or revenge. It was about saving the College.
String.Dest: This was never about Ancano or revenge. It was about saving the College.

String.Source: Really? You mean to tell me you didn't enjoy it just a little? Well, you're a better mortal than I am.
String.Dest: Really? You mean to tell me you didn't enjoy it just a little? Well, you're a better mortal than I am.

String.Source: This was never about Ancano or revenge. It was about saving the College.
String.Dest: This was never about Ancano or revenge. It was about saving the College.

String.Source: Although I suppose I do hold a special kind of loathing for Elves like him.
String.Dest: 尽管我承认我确实对像他这样的精灵有一种特殊的厌恶感。

String.Source: This was never about Ancano or revenge. It was about saving the College.
String.Dest: This was never about Ancano or revenge. It was about saving the College.

String.Source: Not every High Elf is destined to become a wizard. Granted, I'm partly to blame for the way people see me.
String.Dest: Not every High Elf is destined to become a wizard. Granted, I'm partly to blame for the way people see me.

String.Source: So you admit I'm funny. I was starting to wonder if my jokes had any impact. I was just about to dig deep in my arsenal too.
String.Dest: So you admit I'm funny. I was starting to wonder if my jokes had any impact. I was just about to dig deep in my arsenal too.

String.Source: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.
String.Dest: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.

String.Source: For instance, have I told you the one about the Dragonborn, Alduin, and the High Elf?
String.Dest: 例如，我告诉过你那个关于龙裔，奥杜因，和高精灵的故事吗？

String.Source: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.
String.Dest: You're deflecting your fears with humor. Don't worry, I got this.

String.Source: You're right. I could do with a more balanced diet.
String.Dest: You're right. I could do with a more balanced diet.

String.Source: Good. I'm glad we're on the same page. The problem is getting the others to comply.
String.Dest: Good. I'm glad we're on the same page. The problem is getting the others to comply.

String.Source: We'll need to split up and work on each Companion individually. I'll talk to Ria, and you talk to everyone else.
String.Dest: 我们得分头行动跟战友团的人合作。我去找Ria，你负责其他人。

String.Source: You're right. I could do with a more balanced diet.
String.Dest: You're right. I could do with a more balanced diet.

String.Source: You're right. I could do with a more balanced diet.
String.Dest: You're right. I could do with a more balanced diet.

String.Source: That may seem unfair, but there's no other way. The rest of them scare me.
String.Dest: That may seem unfair, but there's no other way. The rest of them scare me.

String.Source: So he was a bard of some sort? That's a dangerous profession for someone who can shout you to death.
String.Dest: So he was a bard of some sort? That's a dangerous profession for someone who can shout you to death.

String.Source: It's a musical horn. It makes music.
String.Dest: It's a musical horn. It makes music.

String.Source: What if he got carried away during a rendition of Ragnar the Red? I've seen it happen before.
String.Dest: What if he got carried away during a rendition of Ragnar the Red? I've seen it happen before.

String.Source: It's a musical horn. It makes music.
String.Dest: It's a musical horn. It makes music.

String.Source: It's a musical horn. It makes music.
String.Dest: It's a musical horn. It makes music.

String.Source: My theory is the horn is the Daedric kind, like the sort a Dremora wears on his head. Just some food for thought.
String.Dest: My theory is the horn is the Daedric kind, like the sort a Dremora wears on his head. Just some food for thought.

String.Source: See, you can say that because we're married. And because you're the Dragonborn. And because I have a sense of humor about myself.
String.Dest: See, you can say that because we're married. And because you're the Dragonborn. And because I have a sense of humor about myself.

String.Source: My dear, I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我觉得你比起香蕉来更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: My dear, I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我觉得你比起香蕉来更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: But truth is, I'm never comfortable staying in one place, and I'd rather conjure up a good blade than a broom.
String.Dest: But truth is, I'm never comfortable staying in one place, and I'd rather conjure up a good blade than a broom.

String.Source: My dear, I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我觉得你比起香蕉来更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: Not that I don't mind cleaning for you. Did I mention how much I love you and that I'm glad your home?
String.Dest: Not that I don't mind cleaning for you. Did I mention how much I love you and that I'm glad your home?

String.Source: See, you can say that because we're friends. And because you're the Dragonborn. And because I have a sense of humor about myself.
String.Dest: See, you can say that because we're friends. And because you're the Dragonborn. And because I have a sense of humor about myself.

String.Source: I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 我觉得比起香蕉来，你更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: But mostly because you're my primary source of income. Seriously, I'd starve without you. Back to adventuring then?
String.Dest: But mostly because you're my primary source of income. Seriously, I'd starve without you. Back to adventuring then?

String.Source: I think you're more of a snowberry than a banana.
String.Dest: 我觉得比起香蕉来，你更像个雪浆果。

String.Source: Like what, for instance?
String.Dest: Like what, for instance?

String.Source: Well, how about Black-Briar Golden? You change the name, keep the taste.
String.Dest: Well, how about Black-Briar Golden? You change the name, keep the taste.

String.Source: Like what, for instance?
String.Dest: Like what, for instance?

String.Source: Maybe it's not too late. I can see it now. Maven says "Sorry I ruined your business Sabjorn, but your mead was just too tasty!"
String.Dest: Maybe it's not too late. I can see it now. Maven says "Sorry I ruined your business Sabjorn, but your mead was just too tasty!"

String.Source: Like what, for instance?
String.Dest: Like what, for instance?

String.Source: And Sabjorn would say, "Is that the reason? I thought you just didn't like me. Why didn't you say so sooner!"
String.Dest: And Sabjorn would say, "Is that the reason? I thought you just didn't like me. Why didn't you say so sooner!"

String.Source: Like what, for instance?
String.Dest: Like what, for instance?

String.Source: And Maven would be like "I don't know! No hard feelings, then?" Then they would have a laugh and share a sweetroll.
String.Dest: And Maven would be like "I don't know! No hard feelings, then?" Then they would have a laugh and share a sweetroll.

String.Source: You're assuming there's a dragon to be concerned about. I'm not so sure there is.
String.Dest: You're assuming there's a dragon to be concerned about. I'm not so sure there is.

String.Source: You don't look too concerned about the dragon.
String.Dest: 你好像对龙什么的毫不在意。

String.Source: I mean, do we really take this guard at his word? Maybe he wants an excuse to get off his shift.
String.Dest: I mean, do we really take this guard at his word? Maybe he wants an excuse to get off his shift.

String.Source: You don't look too concerned about the dragon.
String.Dest: 你好像对龙什么的毫不在意。

String.Source: If I had a septim for every time a guard lied to get off work, I'd have like, a hundred septims.
String.Dest: 如果一枚金币每次都能骗到一个守卫让他下班，我想要一百个金币。

String.Source: You don't look too concerned about the dragon.
String.Dest: 你好像对龙什么的毫不在意。

String.Source: Maybe that's not a lot of gold, but it's a lot of lies.
String.Dest: 或许这并不是很大一笔钱，但这是用一大堆谎言换来的。

String.Source: You don't look too concerned about the dragon.
String.Dest: 你好像对龙什么的毫不在意。

String.Source: I am. I'm a very picky person, and it's very hard to find a Nord beverage that suits my palate.
String.Dest: I am. I'm a very picky person, and it's very hard to find a Nord beverage that suits my palate.

String.Source: Are you sad to see Honningbrew out of business?
String.Dest: 你看到蜂蜜酒地破产难过吗?

String.Source: Are you sad to see Honningbrew out of business?
String.Dest: 你看到蜂蜜酒地破产难过吗?

String.Source: Honningbrew was that drink. I just don't get why Maven doesn't rebrand it as something else.
String.Dest: Honningbrew was that drink. I just don't get why Maven doesn't rebrand it as something else.

String.Source: You picked up conjuring weapons just like that?
String.Dest: 你就是这样拿魔法武器的？

String.Source: That's where the knife ears come in handy. Or was it crocodile lips? Toadskin? I can never forget these infernal nicknames the humans give us.
String.Dest: That's where the knife ears come in handy. Or was it crocodile lips? Toadskin? I can never forget these infernal nicknames the humans give us.

String.Source: You picked up conjuring weapons just like that?
String.Dest: 你就是这样拿魔法武器的？

String.Source: What I'm trying to say is that High Elves are born with an affinity for magic. A head start, if you will, in the skill of hand waggling.
String.Dest: What I'm trying to say is that High Elves are born with an affinity for magic. A head start, if you will, in the skill of hand waggling.

String.Source: You should do your duty and clear an area of bandit scum.
String.Dest: 尽你的责任，做掉一片区域的强盗人渣吧。

String.Source: The only duty I have is to myself, and he would rather be healthy and alive.
String.Dest: 我只对自己负有责任，他也许会健康地活下去的。

String.Source: Imitation robes? Is it some sort of black market operation?
String.Dest: Imitation robes? Is it some sort of black market operation?

String.Source: That makes it sound so sinister, like some place you buy fur coats made from Khajiit pelts.
String.Dest: 这让它听起来很邪恶的样子，好像某个卖虎人毛皮做成皮衣的黑市。

String.Source: Imitation robes? Is it some sort of black market operation?
String.Dest: Imitation robes? Is it some sort of black market operation?

String.Source: Nothing was hurt in the sewing of this robe. Well, maybe the college's reputation.
String.Dest: Nothing was hurt in the sewing of this robe. Well, maybe the college's reputation.

String.Source: Unfortunately I'm not familiar with bound armor spells, and I've yet to find a book on the subject in my travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 不幸的是我不会束缚铠甲咒语，并且游遍整个天际我也没能找到记载它的法术书。

String.Source: If the robes are cheap, what about bound armor for protection?
String.Dest: If the robes are cheap, what about bound armor for protection?

String.Source: How dare you question the legitimacy of this artifact. You should be ashamed.
String.Dest: How dare you question the legitimacy of this artifact. You should be ashamed.

String.Source: Oh, I wouldn't dare do such a thing! You know me, always serious, always respectful.
String.Dest: Oh, I wouldn't dare do such a thing! You know me, always serious, always respectful.

String.Source: I'm not saying the horn isn't real, just that it might not be the kind of horn you think it is.
String.Dest: 我并不是说那支号角不是真的，只是也许它不是你所想的那种号角。

String.Source: How dare you question the legitimacy of this artifact. You should be ashamed.
String.Dest: How dare you question the legitimacy of this artifact. You should be ashamed.

String.Source: How dare you question the legitimacy of this artifact. You should be ashamed.
String.Dest: How dare you question the legitimacy of this artifact. You should be ashamed.

String.Source: My theory is the horn is the Daedric kind, like the sort a Dremora wears on his head. Just some food for thought.
String.Dest: My theory is the horn is the Daedric kind, like the sort a Dremora wears on his head. Just some food for thought.

String.Source: Oh really? I hope you mean madly in love with me, because I wasn't being serious earlier. Two out three apothecaries say I'm completely sane.
String.Dest: Oh really? I hope you mean madly in love with me, because I wasn't being serious earlier. Two out three apothecaries say I'm completely sane.

String.Source: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.

String.Source: The third? Well, let's not talk about that one. Let's just say he won't be treating any more cases of witbane anytime soon. Because I killed him.
String.Dest: The third? Well, let's not talk about that one. Let's just say he won't be treating any more cases of witbane anytime soon. Because I killed him.

String.Source: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.

String.Source: That was another joke by the way. Just in case you thought my smile was malicious.
String.Dest: That was another joke by the way. Just in case you thought my smile was malicious.

String.Source: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.

String.Source: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: Good news husband! I'm completely mad as well.

String.Source: Did I also mention how much I love you and that I'm glad you're home?
String.Dest: Did I also mention how much I love you and that I'm glad you're home?

String.Source: Oh really? I hope you mean mad about adventuring, because I wasn't being serious earlier. Two out three apothecaries say I'm completely sane.
String.Dest: Oh really? I hope you mean mad about adventuring, because I wasn't being serious earlier. Two out three apothecaries say I'm completely sane.

String.Source: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.

String.Source: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.

String.Source: The third? Well, let's not talk about that one. Let's just say he won't be treating any more cases of witbane anytime soon. Because I killed him.
String.Dest: The third? Well, let's not talk about that one. Let's just say he won't be treating any more cases of witbane anytime soon. Because I killed him.

String.Source: No, I'm kidding. I would never kill anyone without you around, you're my alibi. Anyways, good to have you back.
String.Dest: No, I'm kidding. I would never kill anyone without you around, you're my alibi. Anyways, good to have you back.

String.Source: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.
String.Dest: Good news! I'm completely mad as well.

String.Source: Oh I agree. The Forsworn are a wicked bunch. All that murdering and pillaging and stuff. And having a Silver-Blood on your side is never a bad thing.
String.Dest: 噢，我同意。弃誓者是一群邪恶的人。他们烧杀抢掠无恶不作。另外，和银血家族站在一边准没错。

String.Source: The Forsworn are a blight on the Reach. Madanach got what he deserved.
String.Dest: 弃誓者是边塞领的毒瘤。迈德纳奇得到了他应得的。

String.Source: That's why we work well together. We think on the same level. Always finishing each other's...finishing each other's...
String.Dest: That's why we work well together. We think on the same level. Always finishing each other's...finishing each other's...

String.Source: The Forsworn are a blight on the Reach. Madanach got what he deserved.
String.Dest: 弃誓者是边塞领的毒瘤。迈德纳奇得到了他应得的。

String.Source: Oh, I totally agree. An Elf is nothing without his scruples. Although having a purse full of rubies would be nice too.
String.Dest: Oh, I totally agree. An Elf is nothing without his scruples. Although having a purse full of rubies would be nice too.

String.Source: This is the rightful land of the Forsworn. I did what I did on principle.
String.Dest: This is the rightful land of the Forsworn. I did what I did on principle.

String.Source: That's why I leave the tough moral quandaries to you. It saves me from all the thinking and absolves me of all the blame.
String.Dest: That's why I leave the tough moral quandaries to you. It saves me from all the thinking and absolves me of all the blame.

String.Source: This is the rightful land of the Forsworn. I did what I did on principle.
String.Dest: This is the rightful land of the Forsworn. I did what I did on principle.

String.Source: Yes, that's more than we can say for Ancano.
String.Dest: 是的，那不仅仅我们可以为安卡诺说话.

String.Source: I wonder if the body's lying around somewhere. I wouldn't mind raising him from the dead and having him fetch our flagons.
String.Dest: I wonder if the body's lying around somewhere. I wouldn't mind raising him from the dead and having him fetch our flagons.

String.Source: Yes, that's more than we can say for Ancano.
String.Dest: 是的，那不仅仅我们可以为安卡诺说话.

String.Source: Needless to say I never liked him. He reminds me of every mage who ever looked down on me for being a bladebinder.
String.Dest: Needless to say I never liked him. He reminds me of every mage who ever looked down on me for being a bladebinder.

String.Source: Yes, that's more than we can say for Ancano.
String.Dest: 是的，那不仅仅我们可以为安卡诺说话.

String.Source: Not every High Elf is destined to become a wizard. Granted, I'm partly to blame for that perception.
String.Dest: Not every High Elf is destined to become a wizard. Granted, I'm partly to blame for that perception.

String.Source: Alright, here's a few more. "I'll be with you in spirit." "Bound weapons don't work in Sovngarde." "I slept with Odahviing's sister."
String.Dest: Alright, here's a few more. "I'll be with you in spirit." "Bound weapons don't work in Sovngarde." "I slept with Odahviing's sister."

String.Source: I'd like to hear more of these excuses. Those didn't suffice.
String.Dest: I'd like to hear more of these excuses. Those didn't suffice.

String.Source: Okay, so I made some of those up. Maybe all of them, but the point is, you didn't give me any time to make up some good ones.
String.Dest: Okay, so I made some of those up. Maybe all of them, but the point is, you didn't give me any time to make up some good ones.

String.Source: I'd like to hear more of these excuses. Those didn't suffice.
String.Dest: I'd like to hear more of these excuses. Those didn't suffice.

String.Source: I'd like to hear more of these excuses. Those didn't suffice.
String.Dest: I'd like to hear more of these excuses. Those didn't suffice.

String.Source: Look, I think it's obvious I want you to succeed. And if it came down to it, I'd be willing to fight by your side. No, I'd be honored to.
String.Dest: Look, I think it's obvious I want you to succeed. And if it came down to it, I'd be willing to fight by your side. No, I'd be honored to.

String.Source: I'd like to hear more of these excuses. Those didn't suffice.
String.Dest: I'd like to hear more of these excuses. Those didn't suffice.

String.Source: But I'll have to settle for having been with you until now. That alone should fetch me a free drink or two at the tavern. Good luck.
String.Dest: But I'll have to settle for having been with you until now. That alone should fetch me a free drink or two at the tavern. Good luck.

String.Source: Oh stop complaining you bloody thumb-drinker.
String.Dest: 噢，别抱怨你的伤了，你这吮指头的货。

String.Source: Well, it's not just a preference. There's a practical aspect to it. Meat makes me feel sluggish.
String.Dest: Well, it's not just a preference. There's a practical aspect to it. Meat makes me feel sluggish.

String.Source: Remember, I'm a bladebinder. I conjure weapons because I don't want to carry them. The same is true for a bulging stomach.
String.Dest: Remember, I'm a bladebinder. I conjure weapons because I don't want to carry them. The same is true for a bulging stomach.

String.Source: Oh stop complaining you bloody thumb-drinker.
String.Dest: 噢，别抱怨你的伤了，你这吮指头的货。

String.Source: Oh stop complaining you bloody thumb-drinker.
String.Dest: 噢，别抱怨你的伤了，你这吮指头的货。

String.Source: Just throw in a word with the cook if you can. Blame it on the "stupid Elf," and then point at me and I'll wave or something.
String.Dest: Just throw in a word with the cook if you can. Blame it on the "stupid Elf," and then point at me and I'll wave or something.

String.Source: Most robes lack defense anyway. You need alteration to steel your flesh.
String.Dest: Most robes lack defense anyway. You need alteration to steel your flesh.

String.Source: Not everyone can do both conjuration and alteration. Most can't do either.
String.Dest: Not everyone can do both conjuration and alteration. Most can't do either.

String.Source: I mean, tomes tell us how to cast magic, but does anyone really know how it works?
String.Dest: 我是说，法术书能教会我们如何施放法术，但是有人真正知道其中的原理么？

String.Source: Most robes lack defense anyway. You need alteration to steel your flesh.
String.Dest: Most robes lack defense anyway. You need alteration to steel your flesh.

String.Source: Most robes lack defense anyway. You need alteration to steel your flesh.
String.Dest: Most robes lack defense anyway. You need alteration to steel your flesh.

String.Source: They say there's a book on conjuration so complicated that only two scholars can understand it and both disagree on the meaning. Vehemently.
String.Dest: They say there's a book on conjuration so complicated that only two scholars can understand it and both disagree on the meaning. Vehemently.

String.Source: I do. They're tall, punctual, and have good posture.
String.Dest: I do. They're tall, punctual, and have good posture.

String.Source: As a High Elf, you must have an opinion on the Thalmor.
String.Dest: 作为一个高精灵，你必须对梭默有所表态。

String.Source: He wore it as a hat.
String.Dest: 他把它当帽子来戴。

String.Source: Well, you're getting warmer. I was thinking it was a Dremora horn. That's right Jurgen Windcaller was a Dremora. It's just a theory, anyway.
String.Dest: Well, you're getting warmer. I was thinking it was a Dremora horn. That's right Jurgen Windcaller was a Dremora. It's just a theory, anyway.

String.Source: Admit it, you love my childish antics. Can you imagine how dreadful life would be if you had to wake up every morning next to a humorless sod?
String.Dest: Admit it, you love my childish antics. Can you imagine how dreadful life would be if you had to wake up every morning next to a humorless sod?

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: If you're curious, you can ask me, because I know. I'm married to one.
String.Dest: If you're curious, you can ask me, because I know. I'm married to one.

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: No really, you're wonderful, savior of Skyrim and all that. You might want to stop with the insults though. Not everyone finds them attractive.
String.Dest: No really, you're wonderful, savior of Skyrim and all that. You might want to stop with the insults though. Not everyone finds them attractive.

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Admit it, you love my childish antics. Can you imagine how dreadful life would be if your adventuring companion was some mindless atronach?
String.Dest: Admit it, you love my childish antics. Can you imagine how dreadful life would be if your adventuring companion was some mindless atronach?

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: If you're curious, you can ask me, because I know. I'm good friends with one.
String.Dest: 如果如果你感到好奇，你可以问我，因为我知道，你是我的好朋友。

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: No really, you're wonderful, savior of Skyrim and all that. You might want to stop with the insults though. Not everyone finds them attractive.
String.Dest: No really, you're wonderful, savior of Skyrim and all that. You might want to stop with the insults though. Not everyone finds them attractive.

String.Source: Gold coins up your nose? So that's why you're an insufferable mouth breather.
String.Dest: 你鼻子上有金币？这就是为什么你是个讨厌的嘴巴呼吸者。

String.Source: Ever seen an Elf juggle three axes while conjuring a fourth? Tie a cherry stem into a knot with their tongue? Now that's magic.
String.Dest: Ever seen an Elf juggle three axes while conjuring a fourth? Tie a cherry stem into a knot with their tongue? Now that's magic.

String.Source: Do you know any other magic besides conjuring weapons?
String.Dest: 除了召唤出武器你还会什么魔法？

String.Source: Now, if you mean spells and things, that, I'm afraid, requires more than being born with your ears pointed skyward.
String.Dest: Now, if you mean spells and things, that, I'm afraid, requires more than being born with your ears pointed skyward.

String.Source: Do you know any other magic besides conjuring weapons?
String.Dest: 除了召唤出武器你还会什么魔法？

String.Source: That requires...ugh...studying.
String.Dest: That requires...ugh...studying.

String.Source: Do you know any other magic besides conjuring weapons?
String.Dest: 除了召唤出武器你还会什么魔法？

String.Source: True, there isn't any downside to taking the guard at his word. Other than maybe building a deep-seeded mistrust of all Nord guards.
String.Dest: True, there isn't any downside to taking the guard at his word. Other than maybe building a deep-seeded mistrust of all Nord guards.

String.Source: You could be right, but we can't take that chance.
String.Dest: 你也许是对的，但是我们不能冒这个险。

String.Source: You could be right, but we can't take that chance.
String.Dest: 你也许是对的，但是我们不能冒这个险。

String.Source: Which I already have! So no harm, no foul.
String.Dest: Which I already have! So no harm, no foul.

String.Source: You could be right, but we can't take that chance.
String.Dest: 你也许是对的，但是我们不能冒这个险。

String.Source: Okay, you've convinced me. There's a dragon out there. And coincidentally, something warm running down my leg.
String.Dest: Okay, you've convinced me. There's a dragon out there. And coincidentally, something warm running down my leg.

String.Source: That's a wonderful idea. You are full of great suggestions.
String.Dest: That's a wonderful idea. You are full of great suggestions.

String.Source: I am? I mean, of course I am! It all comes from having a wealth of experience and an extremely finicky stomach.
String.Dest: I am? I mean, of course I am! It all comes from having a wealth of experience and an extremely finicky stomach.

String.Source: You should solicit me for advice more often. I have all sorts of opinions on all kinds of topics.
String.Dest: 你应该多问问我的观点。对于任何话题我都有很多要说的。

String.Source: That's a wonderful idea. You are full of great suggestions.
String.Dest: That's a wonderful idea. You are full of great suggestions.

String.Source: That's a wonderful idea. You are full of great suggestions.
String.Dest: That's a wonderful idea. You are full of great suggestions.

String.Source: Sure, they're all tailored to what you want to hear, but that doesn't make me a lap dog. It just means I'm attentive.
String.Dest: Sure, they're all tailored to what you want to hear, but that doesn't make me a lap dog. It just means I'm attentive.

String.Source: Good. It isn't healthy for adventurers to get too close to each other.
String.Dest: Good. It isn't healthy for adventurers to get too close to each other.

String.Source: Because...we're all going to die? That doesn't really motivate us, now does it?
String.Dest: Because...we're all going to die? That doesn't really motivate us, now does it?

String.Source: I'm following you in order to increase my chances of survival. I'm perfectly capable of dying on my own.
String.Dest: I'm following you in order to increase my chances of survival. I'm perfectly capable of dying on my own.

String.Source: Good. It isn't healthy for adventurers to get too close to each other.
String.Dest: Good. It isn't healthy for adventurers to get too close to each other.

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: Oh I know, but I learned that discussing politics and religion is an exercise in futility.
String.Dest: 噢，我知道的，但据我所知，讨论政治和宗教是件很没意义的事儿。

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: I'll just evade the question, thank you and focus on more agreeable questions, like the weather, the temperature, and the local food.
String.Dest: I'll just evade the question, thank you and focus on more agreeable questions, like the weather, the temperature, and the local food.

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: Just try and disagree with me on the weather. See? You can't.
String.Dest: Just try and disagree with me on the weather. See? You can't.

String.Source: Sabjorn's in prison. If he got out, he'd just start making more mead.
String.Dest: Sabjorn's in prison. If he got out, he'd just start making more mead.

String.Source: Yes, but suppose Maven decided to strike a bargain with him. She could pin the crime on Mallus and free Sabjorn in exchange for his service.
String.Dest: Yes, but suppose Maven decided to strike a bargain with him. She could pin the crime on Mallus and free Sabjorn in exchange for his service.

String.Source: Sabjorn's in prison. If he got out, he'd just start making more mead.
String.Dest: Sabjorn's in prison. If he got out, he'd just start making more mead.

String.Source: Having saved his life, he'd be eternally grateful to Maven, and would offer to brew his mead for her. It's a win-win-win, the third winner being me.
String.Dest: Having saved his life, he'd be eternally grateful to Maven, and would offer to brew his mead for her. It's a win-win-win, the third winner being me.

String.Source: Sabjorn's in prison. If he got out, he'd just start making more mead.
String.Dest: Sabjorn's in prison. If he got out, he'd just start making more mead.

String.Source: The only loser would be Mallus, but he creeps me out anyway.
String.Dest: 唯一的失败者只会是莫鲁斯，但是他依然让我毛骨悚然。

String.Source: No, it wasn't. That night, I opened up my sack and started throwing away my things. They were as useless as I was.
String.Dest: No, it wasn't. That night, I opened up my sack and started throwing away my things. They were as useless as I was.

String.Source: I doubt that was easy for you.
String.Dest: I doubt that was easy for you.

String.Source: But when I got to the bottom, I found something I never knew was there. A gift from Otero. One last jester's trick.
String.Dest: But when I got to the bottom, I found something I never knew was there. A gift from Otero. One last jester's trick.

String.Source: I doubt that was easy for you.
String.Dest: I doubt that was easy for you.

String.Source: I doubt that was easy for you.
String.Dest: I doubt that was easy for you.

String.Source: It was a spell tome for a bound sword. And, I've relied on it ever since.
String.Dest: It was a spell tome for a bound sword. And, I've relied on it ever since.

String.Source: No. Quite the opposite. I paid them their ransom. It cost me everything I had, but I paid their price.
String.Dest: No. Quite the opposite. I paid them their ransom. It cost me everything I had, but I paid their price.

String.Source: And fighting these bandits is how you learned you were a warrior, right?
String.Dest: And fighting these bandits is how you learned you were a warrior, right?

String.Source: I didn't realize you had a heart.
String.Dest: I didn't realize you had a heart.

String.Source: Well, it's small, and doesn't like strangers, but it does come out when you least expect it. This was one of those times.
String.Dest: Well, it's small, and doesn't like strangers, but it does come out when you least expect it. This was one of those times.

String.Source: That's why I...I ended up gathering what little coin I had, and paying the kidnapper's ransom.
String.Dest: That's why I...I ended up gathering what little coin I had, and paying the kidnapper's ransom.

String.Source: I didn't realize you had a heart.
String.Dest: I didn't realize you had a heart.

String.Source: Telling the truth would have been the best course of action.
String.Dest: Telling the truth would have been the best course of action.

String.Source: No, I couldn't. I know they were just children, but...I didn't want to let them down.
String.Dest: No, I couldn't. I know they were just children, but...I didn't want to let them down.

String.Source: That's why I...I ended up gathering what little coin I had, and paying the kidnapper's ransom.
String.Dest: That's why I...I ended up gathering what little coin I had, and paying the kidnapper's ransom.

String.Source: Telling the truth would have been the best course of action.
String.Dest: Telling the truth would have been the best course of action.

String.Source: Maybe now, but back then I was just a jester with a flowers up my sleeve.
String.Dest: Maybe now, but back then I was just a jester with a flowers up my sleeve.

String.Source: What's the problem? A few bandits make for easy prey.
String.Dest: What's the problem? A few bandits make for easy prey.

String.Source: That's why I...I ended up gathering what little coin I had, and paid the kidnapper's ransom.
String.Dest: That's why I...I ended up gathering what little coin I had, and paid the kidnapper's ransom.

String.Source: What's the problem? A few bandits make for easy prey.
String.Dest: What's the problem? A few bandits make for easy prey.

String.Source: Actually, I killed both of them.
String.Dest: 实际上，我把他们两个都杀了。

String.Source: Oh, right. That certainly does make things easier. I wonder if the same solution would've worked for Ulfric and General Tullius?
String.Dest: Oh, right. That certainly does make things easier. I wonder if the same solution would've worked for Ulfric and General Tullius?

String.Source: That's why I leave the tough moral quandaries to you. It saves me from all the thinking and absolves me of all the blame.
String.Dest: That's why I leave the tough moral quandaries to you. It saves me from all the thinking and absolves me of all the blame.

String.Source: Actually, I killed both of them.
String.Dest: 实际上，我把他们两个都杀了。

String.Source: It doesn't matter. They will both die by my hand eventually.
String.Dest: It doesn't matter. They will both die by my hand eventually.

String.Source: Oh, right. That certainly does make things easier. I wonder if the same solution would've worked for Ulfric and General Tullius?
String.Dest: Oh, right. That certainly does make things easier. I wonder if the same solution would've worked for Ulfric and General Tullius?

String.Source: That's why I leave the tough moral quandaries to you. It saves me from all the thinking and absolves me of all the blame.
String.Dest: That's why I leave the tough moral quandaries to you. It saves me from all the thinking and absolves me of all the blame.

String.Source: It doesn't matter. They will both die by my hand eventually.
String.Dest: It doesn't matter. They will both die by my hand eventually.

String.Source: Why do you blame yourself?
String.Dest: Why do you blame yourself?

String.Source: Well, to be honest, I sometimes encourage people to think I'm a mage. It makes me feel better about myself.
String.Dest: Well, to be honest, I sometimes encourage people to think I'm a mage. It makes me feel better about myself.

String.Source: Why do you blame yourself?
String.Dest: Why do you blame yourself?

String.Source: Especially with children. Mostly because they're the easiest to fool. Which led to one of my more embarrassing moments.
String.Dest: Especially with children. Mostly because they're the easiest to fool. Which led to one of my more embarrassing moments.

String.Source: Why do you blame yourself?
String.Dest: Why do you blame yourself?

String.Source: I was showing a few children some jester tricks, and of course they thought I was a mage.
String.Dest: I was showing a few children some jester tricks, and of course they thought I was a mage.

String.Source: Why do you blame yourself?
String.Dest: Why do you blame yourself?

String.Source: I was just about finished when another child came rushing toward me, crying her eyes out. Her mother had been kidnapped by bandits.
String.Dest: I was just about finished when another child came rushing toward me, crying her eyes out. Her mother had been kidnapped by bandits.

String.Source: Why do you blame yourself?
String.Dest: Why do you blame yourself?

String.Source: They other children told her not to worry. Rumarin the mage would come to the rescue. Looking into their eyes, I didn't have the heart to say no.
String.Dest: They other children told her not to worry. Rumarin the mage would come to the rescue. Looking into their eyes, I didn't have the heart to say no.

String.Source: I love you too, husband.
String.Dest: 我也爱你，亲爱的。

String.Source: Well, don't make me feel guilty. You know I'm not the most romantic person in the world.
String.Dest: Well, don't make me feel guilty. You know I'm not the most romantic person in the world.

String.Source: I love you too, husband.
String.Dest: 我也爱你，亲爱的。

String.Source: Okay, how about this. It would be a shame if you didn't come back. I'm too young to be a widow.
String.Dest: Okay, how about this. It would be a shame if you didn't come back. I'm too young to be a widow.

String.Source: That was romantic, right? I'm tearing up already. Seriously though, please come back, I have no idea where we're supposed to put our trash.
String.Dest: That was romantic, right? I'm tearing up already. Seriously though, please come back, I have no idea where we're supposed to put our trash.

String.Source: I love you too, husband.
String.Dest: 我也爱你，亲爱的。

String.Source: We could just go to the Bannered Mare.
String.Dest: 我们可以去母马横幅。

String.Source: And pay for our food? Oh no, that probably isn't a good idea. In that case, we're better off shopping at Carlotta's for fresh ingredients.
String.Dest: And pay for our food? Oh no, that probably isn't a good idea. In that case, we're better off shopping at Carlotta's for fresh ingredients.

String.Source: We could just go to the Bannered Mare.
String.Dest: 我们可以去母马横幅。

String.Source: And then I might as well cook it myself. No, we're better off saving our energy for nap time.
String.Dest: And then I might as well cook it myself. No, we're better off saving our energy for nap time.

String.Source: True, I'm not very punctual, and I'm actually an inch shorter than the average High Elf.
String.Dest: True, I'm not very punctual, and I'm actually an inch shorter than the average High Elf.

String.Source: I guess that means you're not a Thalmor.
String.Dest: 我猜那意味着是你不是个梭默.

String.Source: Wait, that came out wrong. Well, you know what I mean.
String.Dest: Wait, that came out wrong. Well, you know what I mean.

String.Source: I guess that means you're not a Thalmor.
String.Dest: 我猜那意味着是你不是个梭默.

String.Source: You're not exactly a serious Elf, are you.
String.Dest: 你不真的是个严肃的精灵吧，不是么。

String.Source: Oh, I'm serious about a lot of things. In fact, I'm absolutely dedicated to not taking life seriously.
String.Dest: Oh, I'm serious about a lot of things. In fact, I'm absolutely dedicated to not taking life seriously.

String.Source: A High Elf with a sense of humor. I like you.
String.Dest: 有着幽默感的高精灵。我喜欢你。

String.Source: Good. Skyrim could use more of it. Humor, and sense.
String.Dest: Good. Skyrim could use more of it. Humor, and sense.

String.Source: No, I can't compare to them. Unless by illusion you mean hiding a dagger in my sleeve.
String.Dest: No, I can't compare to them. Unless by illusion you mean hiding a dagger in my sleeve.

String.Source: Would you classify yourself as a witchblade or spellsword then?
String.Dest: 你会把自己归结为一名魔女之刃呢还是个魔剑士呢？

String.Source: Not unless by alteration, you mean "covering my nose around beggars," or by destruction, you mean what time does to love.
String.Dest: Not unless by alteration, you mean "covering my nose around beggars," or by destruction, you mean what time does to love.

String.Source: Would you classify yourself as a witchblade or spellsword then?
String.Dest: 你会把自己归结为一名魔女之刃呢还是个魔剑士呢？

String.Source: Would you classify yourself as a witchblade or spellsword then?
String.Dest: 你会把自己归结为一名魔女之刃呢还是个魔剑士呢？

String.Source: I consider myself more of a blacksmith. Oblivion is my forge, and conjuration my hammer.
String.Dest: I consider myself more of a blacksmith. Oblivion is my forge, and conjuration my hammer.

String.Source: Hey, I didn't study war paint application for ten years at the Lythandus school in Cheydinhal to be mocked by an amateur! Good day!
String.Dest: Hey, I didn't study war paint application for ten years at the Lythandus school in Cheydinhal to be mocked by an amateur! Good day!

String.Source: Maybe with a better design it would look fierce. Yours look like whiskers.
String.Dest: Maybe with a better design it would look fierce. Yours look like whiskers.

String.Source: Maybe with a better design it would look fierce. Yours look like whiskers.
String.Dest: Maybe with a better design it would look fierce. Yours look like whiskers.

String.Source: At least, that's what I'd say if I didn't think whiskers were a compliment. Which they are.
String.Dest: 至少，如果我不认为“刮胡人”是一种恭维我就会这么说。不过它们其实是一种恭维。

String.Source: Well, as much as I enjoy sleeping, frolicking, and eating all day, I'm wondering if we can do something about the menu.
String.Dest: Well, as much as I enjoy sleeping, frolicking, and eating all day, I'm wondering if we can do something about the menu.

String.Source: Not really. But what's your concern?
String.Dest: Not really. But what's your concern?

String.Source: It's a bit heavy on the meat, don't you think? Last time I checked, the Companions didn't sign a Green Pact.
String.Dest: 硬骨头啊，你不觉得么？上次我检查的时候，战友团还没有签署绿色条约。

String.Source: Not really. But what's your concern?
String.Dest: Not really. But what's your concern?

String.Source: Well, as much as I enjoy sleeping, frolicking, and eating all day, I'm wondering if we can do something about the menu.
String.Dest: Well, as much as I enjoy sleeping, frolicking, and eating all day, I'm wondering if we can do something about the menu.

String.Source: Why, is there something wrong with that?
String.Dest: Why, is there something wrong with that?

String.Source: It's a bit heavy on the meat, don't you think? Last time I checked, the Companions didn't sign a Green Pact.
String.Dest: It's a bit heavy on the meat, don't you think? Last time I checked, the Companions didn't sign a Green Pact.

String.Source: Why, is there something wrong with that?
String.Dest: Why, is there something wrong with that?

String.Source: Well, for starters, I'd probably just get in your way. Not to mention you're strong enough to do this on your own.
String.Dest: Well, for starters, I'd probably just get in your way. Not to mention you're strong enough to do this on your own.

String.Source: What sort of excuses?
String.Dest: What sort of excuses?

String.Source: See? Those were two of my better ones.
String.Dest: See? Those were two of my better ones.

String.Source: What sort of excuses?
String.Dest: What sort of excuses?
