String.Source: But really, you don't need me. I hear Alduin only eats worlds. You're not a world, are you? Then you'll be fine.
String.Dest: But really, you don't need me. I hear Alduin only eats worlds. You're not a world, are you? Then you'll be fine.

String.Source: What sort of excuses?
String.Dest: What sort of excuses?

String.Source: And they have you to thank. Not me of course, I wasn't there, but while you were in that mine chipping ore, I was somewhere rooting you on in spirit.
String.Dest: And they have you to thank. Not me of course, I wasn't there, but while you were in that mine chipping ore, I was somewhere rooting you on in spirit.

String.Source: Madanach's dead. Markarth is free of the Forsworn.
String.Dest: Madanach's dead. Markarth is free of the Forsworn.

String.Source: And you did just what I would have done. It's good to have friends in high places, and the Silver-Bloods sit higher than most.
String.Dest: And you did just what I would have done. It's good to have friends in high places, and the Silver-Bloods sit higher than most.

String.Source: Madanach's dead. Markarth is free of the Forsworn.
String.Dest: Madanach's dead. Markarth is free of the Forsworn.

String.Source: Madanach's dead. Markarth is free of the Forsworn.
String.Dest: Madanach's dead. Markarth is free of the Forsworn.

String.Source: Sure, Madanach was a King, but a King in Rags. That's like being the Prince of Poverty or something. I'm sure that's why you chose Thonar, right?
String.Dest: Sure, Madanach was a King, but a King in Rags. That's like being the Prince of Poverty or something. I'm sure that's why you chose Thonar, right?

String.Source: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.
String.Dest: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.

String.Source: Which is a good thing right? It's not like that army of Forsworn you just unleashed is much of a threat, is it?
String.Dest: 你刚解放的那股弃誓者军队没有那么有威胁，不是吗？是个好事呢，不是吗？

String.Source: Oh, don't get me wrong. I'm not questioning your decision. I'm sure you have it all figured out. I mean, I can't see more than half a step ahead.
String.Dest: Oh, don't get me wrong. I'm not questioning your decision. I'm sure you have it all figured out. I mean, I can't see more than half a step ahead.

String.Source: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.
String.Dest: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.

String.Source: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.
String.Dest: Thonar is dead. Markarth is free of the Silver-Bloods.

String.Source: It would just help if you could explain it to me, me being dumber than a snowberry and all.
String.Dest: 我想我需要你和我解释一下。我可比雪浆果之类的笨多啦。

String.Source: The first part being more enjoyable than the last part, I bet. Not that saving the College isn't important to somebody.
String.Dest: The first part being more enjoyable than the last part, I bet. Not that saving the College isn't important to somebody.

String.Source: Ancano is dead, and Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了，冬堡安全了。

String.Source: But there's something about mages like Ancano that really pestles my mortar. They're always looking down on us bladebinders.
String.Dest: But there's something about mages like Ancano that really pestles my mortar. They're always looking down on us bladebinders.

String.Source: Ancano is dead, and Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了，冬堡安全了。

String.Source: So I'm not a real mage. So what? At least I'm still alive.
String.Dest: So I'm not a real mage. So what? At least I'm still alive.

String.Source: Ancano is dead, and Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 安卡诺死了，冬堡安全了。

String.Source: Relieved probably isn't the right word. More like ecstatic. You see, we're married, and as my spouse, I'd be obliged to follow you wherever.
String.Dest: Relieved probably isn't the right word. More like ecstatic. You see, we're married, and as my spouse, I'd be obliged to follow you wherever.

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.

String.Source: But here I am, escaping on a technicality. Now what am I going to do with all these excuses?
String.Dest: But here I am, escaping on a technicality. Now what am I going to do with all these excuses?

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.

String.Source: Relieved probably isn't the right word. More like ecstatic. You see, I consider us friends, and as friends, I'd be obliged to follow you wherever.
String.Dest: Relieved probably isn't the right word. More like ecstatic. You see, I consider us friends, and as friends, I'd be obliged to follow you wherever.

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.
String.Dest: (Dragonsreach) There's only room for one on this trip. But you look relieved.

String.Source: But here I am, escaping on a technicality. Now what am I going to do with all these excuses?
String.Dest: But here I am, escaping on a technicality. Now what am I going to do with all these excuses?

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Zora?
String.Dest: 你对佐拉有什么看法？

String.Source: She's charming enough, I suppose. Although I think she's mad at me.
String.Dest: She's charming enough, I suppose. Although I think she's mad at me.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Zora?
String.Dest: 你对佐拉有什么看法？

String.Source: There was a bug the size of finger crawling on her shoulder and I cringed. She might've thought I was cringing at her.
String.Dest: There was a bug the size of finger crawling on her shoulder and I cringed. She might've thought I was cringing at her.

String.Source: Which is preposterous. I'm very good at hiding my disgust. Just not with this bug. It was hideous.
String.Dest: Which is preposterous. I'm very good at hiding my disgust. Just not with this bug. It was hideous.

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Zora?
String.Dest: 你对佐拉有什么看法？

String.Source: Wow, did you read my mind? Or was it my facial expression? I call this one, "Bemused."
String.Dest: Wow, did you read my mind? Or was it my facial expression? I call this one, "Bemused."

String.Source: (Companions Quest) You look like something's troubling you.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）你看起来有点困扰。

String.Source: (Companions Quest) You look like something's troubling you.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）你看起来有点困扰。

String.Source: In any case, I do have a quarrel. It's just that since you've joined the Companions, I feel like you'll be spending more time here.
String.Dest: In any case, I do have a quarrel. It's just that since you've joined the Companions, I feel like you'll be spending more time here.

String.Source: Well, there's the problem. I have skill, not strength. I have speed, but no stamina.
String.Dest: Well, there's the problem. I have skill, not strength. I have speed, but no stamina.

String.Source: If you had any strength, your weapons would never be a burden.
String.Dest: 如果你有力量，你的武器永远不会成为你的负担。

String.Source: I mean look at me. I'm rather delicate. I'm surprised I can lift anything at all.
String.Dest: I mean look at me. I'm rather delicate. I'm surprised I can lift anything at all.

String.Source: If you had any strength, your weapons would never be a burden.
String.Dest: 如果你有力量，你的武器永远不会成为你的负担。

String.Source: Are you sure? Although I suppose that doesn't make her tough. Ants are tougher than they look, but I can still squish them easily enough.
String.Dest: Are you sure? Although I suppose that doesn't make her tough. Ants are tougher than they look, but I can still squish them easily enough.

String.Source: Don't worry about it. Zora's tougher than she looks.
String.Dest: Don't worry about it. Zora's tougher than she looks.

String.Source: Don't worry about it. Zora's tougher than she looks.
String.Dest: Don't worry about it. Zora's tougher than she looks.

String.Source: But I guess I'm being too literal. You're saying she can handle a cringe or two. Which is precisely the answer I wanted to hear. No harm done.
String.Dest: But I guess I'm being too literal. You're saying she can handle a cringe or two. Which is precisely the answer I wanted to hear. No harm done.

String.Source: I guess you have a point. Admittedly, I am sort of biased by all the inane banter they make.
String.Dest: I guess you have a point. Admittedly, I am sort of biased by all the inane banter they make.

String.Source: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.
String.Dest: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.

String.Source: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.
String.Dest: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.

String.Source: No, I do not fancy myself a conjurer, I fancy myself a bladebinder.
String.Dest: 不，我一点都不喜欢自己是个巫师。我更喜欢幻想自己是一名束刃武士。

String.Source: Although saying "I fancy myself" sounds like I want to be alone in a room with nothing but a mirror.
String.Dest: Although saying "I fancy myself" sounds like I want to be alone in a room with nothing but a mirror.

String.Source: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.
String.Dest: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.

String.Source: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.
String.Dest: Don't be foolish. Nord guards are paragons of integrity.

String.Source: In any case, you've convinced me. There's a dragon out there. And coincidentally, something warm running down my leg.
String.Dest: In any case, you've convinced me. There's a dragon out there. And coincidentally, something warm running down my leg.

String.Source: Maybe now, while the wound is fresh. But give him some time behind bars, and he'll come around.
String.Dest: Maybe now, while the wound is fresh. But give him some time behind bars, and he'll come around.

String.Source: An excellent idea. Well, except for the fact Sabjorn would die first.
String.Dest: An excellent idea. Well, except for the fact Sabjorn would die first.

String.Source: For now, you can suggest to Maven that she's in a good position to bargain with Sabjorn. And remind her how popular Honningbrew is with the Elves.
String.Dest: For now, you can suggest to Maven that she's in a good position to bargain with Sabjorn. And remind her how popular Honningbrew is with the Elves.

String.Source: An excellent idea. Well, except for the fact Sabjorn would die first.
String.Dest: An excellent idea. Well, except for the fact Sabjorn would die first.

String.Source: I don't know if that's true, by the way, but it sounds like it would be.
String.Dest: 我不知道这是不是真的，但是它听起来跟真的一样。

String.Source: An excellent idea. Well, except for the fact Sabjorn would die first.
String.Dest: An excellent idea. Well, except for the fact Sabjorn would die first.

String.Source: Males, females, beasts, goats, the list goes on and on.
String.Dest: Males, females, beasts, goats, the list goes on and on.

String.Source: Is that a jest? Or do you fancy other males?
String.Dest: Is that a jest? Or do you fancy other males?

String.Source: Is that a jest? Or do you fancy other males?
String.Dest: Is that a jest? Or do you fancy other males?

String.Source: Although I confess I don't like billies. You're not a billie, are you? Well, if you are, I'll still do it, but it's going to cost extra.
String.Dest: Although I confess I don't like billies. You're not a billie, are you? Well, if you are, I'll still do it, but it's going to cost extra.

String.Source: And here I thought you were the type who fancies males.
String.Dest: 而在这儿我曾认为你是那种中意男性的人。

String.Source: Oh, but I do. Males, females, beasts, goats, the list goes on and on.
String.Dest: Oh, but I do. Males, females, beasts, goats, the list goes on and on.

String.Source: And here I thought you were the type who fancies males.
String.Dest: 而在这儿我曾认为你是那种中意男性的人。

String.Source: Although I confess I don't like billies. You're not a billie, are you? Well, if you are, I'll still do it, but it's going to cost extra.
String.Dest: 虽然我承认我不喜欢守卫。你不会是守卫吧？你是么？算了，如果你是我照样会做，但那就不止这点钱了。

String.Source: I noticed you wear war paint. Why the lines under the eyes?
String.Dest: I noticed you wear war paint. Why the lines under the eyes?

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: Well, I was going to go for something more subtle like a wyvern mounting a cliff racer, but I thought that people might misinterpret the analogy.
String.Dest: Well, I was going to go for something more subtle like a wyvern mounting a cliff racer, but I thought that people might misinterpret the analogy.

String.Source: And besides, there wasn't enough room on my groin to begin with. So I decided to paint my face instead.
String.Dest: And besides, there wasn't enough room on my groin to begin with. So I decided to paint my face instead.

String.Source: I noticed you wear war paint. Why the lines under the eyes?
String.Dest: I noticed you wear war paint. Why the lines under the eyes?

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: I noticed you wear war paint. Why the lines under the eyes?
String.Dest: I noticed you wear war paint. Why the lines under the eyes?

String.Source: A dash under they eyes helps with the glare. So does a hood.
String.Dest: A dash under they eyes helps with the glare. So does a hood.

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: Well, in some parts of Tamriel, war paint is seen as a tribal mark for warriors.
String.Dest: Well, in some parts of Tamriel, war paint is seen as a tribal mark for warriors.

String.Source: What about in general? Do you know if there's any significance to war paint?
String.Dest: 那一般而言呢？你知道关于战痕的意义吗？

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: In others, it can be a family crest, an artistic splash, or just too much makeup.
String.Dest: In others, it can be a family crest, an artistic splash, or just too much makeup.

String.Source: What about in general? Do you know if there's any significance to war paint?
String.Dest: 那一般而言呢？你知道关于战痕的意义吗？

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: What about in general? Do you know if there's any significance to war paint?
String.Dest: 那一般而言呢？你知道关于战痕的意义吗？

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: Of course, excessive makeup is traditionally a sign you will service wealthy nobles for gold.
String.Dest: Of course, excessive makeup is traditionally a sign you will service wealthy nobles for gold.

String.Source: Is there any reason for the war paint?
String.Dest: 这些战痕有什么特别含义吗？

String.Source: And before you ask, my price is 100 septims and no kissing on the mouth. Okay, maybe once or twice. But no tongue.
String.Dest: And before you ask, my price is 100 septims and no kissing on the mouth. Okay, maybe once or twice. But no tongue.

String.Source: What about in general? Do you know if there's any significance to war paint?
String.Dest: 那一般而言呢？你知道关于战痕的意义吗？

String.Source: Not that it doesn't form an appealing visual, but if we actually did joust with our tongues, we'd likely crack our skulls.
String.Dest: 这一点也不有趣，如果我们真的用舌头来决斗的话，我们的脑袋估计得碎掉。

String.Source: That's a shame. I enjoy tongue jousting.
String.Dest: That's a shame. I enjoy tongue jousting.

String.Source: That's a shame. I enjoy tongue jousting.
String.Dest: That's a shame. I enjoy tongue jousting.

String.Source: And I don't even own a horse, so there's that.
String.Dest: 我甚至没有自己的马，所以就是这样了。

String.Source: If you know it's a gimmick, why buy them yourself?
String.Dest: 你要是知道里面有问题，为什么还要自己买下来？

String.Source: Well consider the fact that bandits are twice as naive as the average customer looks. Thus one ruse leads to another.
String.Dest: 考虑到事实上那些强盗比一般顾客看上去还要蠢上一倍。要用另一种法子来。

String.Source: If you know it's a gimmick, why buy them yourself?
String.Dest: 你要是知道里面有问题，为什么还要自己买下来？

String.Source: If you know it's a gimmick, why buy them yourself?
String.Dest: 你要是知道里面有问题，为什么还要自己买下来？

String.Source: Not that these robes are only good for conjuring a story. The enchantment is far from spectacular, but on occasion it does help me conserve magicka.
String.Dest: Not that these robes are only good for conjuring a story. The enchantment is far from spectacular, but on occasion it does help me conserve magicka.

String.Source: If you know it's a gimmick, why buy them yourself?
String.Dest: 你要是知道里面有问题，为什么还要自己买下来？

String.Source: We could do that. Or we could go to Knifepoint Ridge. The bandits he was dealing with kind of live there. Your choice though.
String.Dest: 我们能行。或者我们可以去刀尖山脊。强盗们会解决掉所有活着的东西。总之这是你的选择。

String.Source: Okay. My plan is to kill every bandit we see until we find him.
String.Dest: 好吧. 我的计划是干掉每一个强盗 直到我们找到他。

String.Source: More than an idea. I know the exact location of their hideout. I was pretending to be his bodyguard when he made the deal.
String.Dest: 不只是个点子而已。我知道他们藏身之处的准确位置。以前他做生意的时候我是扮作保镖的。

String.Source: Do you have an idea where these bandits took him?
String.Dest: 强盗们把他带到哪儿去，你有线索吗？

String.Source: Knifepoint Ridge, was the name, over in Falkreath. If he's alive, we'll find him there.
String.Dest: Knifepoint Ridge, was the name, over in Falkreath. If he's alive, we'll find him there.

String.Source: Do you have an idea where these bandits took him?
String.Dest: 强盗们把他带到哪儿去，你有线索吗？

String.Source: No, I'm sure there will be plenty of guts, blood, flesh...and what's the other thing? Oh right, scales! I almost forgot about the scales.
String.Dest: 不，我敢肯定会有很多的内脏，鲜血，生肉……其他还有什么？哦，该死，鳞片。我总是会忘记那些鳞片。

String.Source: So we're basically going to have to rescue a pile of bones.
String.Dest: 所以我们基本上是去救一堆骨头。

String.Source: Good idea, although he really is only good at forgery. I mean, we could ask him to tell us bad jokes, but then I'd be out of a job.
String.Dest: 好主意, 尽管他只擅长造假. 我是指, 我们能叫他给咱们讲烂笑话, 但那时我或许失业了.

String.Source: Excellent. The bandits will soften him up, and he'll do whatever we ask.
String.Dest: 很好，那些土匪会让他服软的，到时候我们说什么他都得听。

String.Source: He's all but skeever bait now. Any other ideas?
String.Dest: 他现在差不多成了雪鼠的食料了。还有别的主意吗？

String.Source: Well, I could try forging whatever it is you need myself. I can do a perfect forgery of an Elven bladebinder. Anything else, we'll need his help.
String.Dest: Well, I could try forging whatever it is you need myself. I can do a perfect forgery of an Elven bladebinder. Anything else, we'll need his help.

String.Source: No, I imagine it's going to hurt either way. At least, for him. Bandits aren't the gentlest of forest creatures.
String.Dest: 不，我觉得两条路线都会受伤，至少就他而言如此。强盗可不是森林里最绅士的生物。

String.Source: It wouldn't hurt to look for him.
String.Dest: 它找到他不会伤害他。

String.Source: This mad Dark Elf. Is his name Raynes?
String.Dest: This mad Dark Elf. Is his name Raynes?

String.Source: Oh, don't say his name out loud. If you say it three times, he'll visit you in your nightmares and stick a dagger up your nose or something.
String.Dest: 哦，别那么大声说他的名字。如果你说了三遍，他就会进到你的噩梦里，再用匕首割掉你的鼻子啥的。

String.Source: Yes, although there might be a significant bounty in it for us. Do bandits put out bounties? Like on guards they don't like? It would only be fair.
String.Dest: 强盗知道城里在通缉他们，但是强盗不会因为惧怕赏金就不惹事，就如同守卫不会因为盗贼不惹事就不会贴悬赏，这样才公平。

String.Source: Given how often we break the law, let's hope we don't run into this zealot.
String.Dest: 想象我们是怎样轻松平常地违反法律, 还是希望我们不要遇到这样的狂热者吧.

String.Source: Not quite. These are actually a cheap imitation, woven and enchanted to look like their more esteemed counterpart.
String.Dest: Not quite. These are actually a cheap imitation, woven and enchanted to look like their more esteemed counterpart.

String.Source: You wear the robes of a college mage.
String.Dest: 你穿着一所魔法学院的衣服。

String.Source: You wear the robes of a college mage.
String.Dest: 你穿着一所魔法学院的衣服。

String.Source: The point is to convince naive patrons the enchantments were performed by a master. They are not.
String.Dest: The point is to convince naive patrons the enchantments were performed by a master. They are not.

String.Source: Him? Oh no, he's a bit daft when it comes to writing. Besides, he's too busy making curved swords.
String.Dest: 他？哦不，在谈及写作的时候，他是有那么一丁点儿蠢。此外，他太忙于打造弧形的剑了。

String.Source: Can the person who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?
String.Dest: Can the person who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?

String.Source: Can the person who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?
String.Dest: Can the person who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?

String.Source: I do know an Argonian who does excellent forgeries. I once asked him to make a Jarl's decree that pies were a type of vegetable.
String.Dest: 我倒是认识一个擅长偷龙换凤的亚龙人。有一回我还让他给我弄了一张领主令呢，上面说的是“馅饼是一种蔬菜”。

String.Source: Problem is, I heard he ran into a bit of trouble stitching together guard uniforms for a group of bandits.
String.Dest: Problem is, I heard he ran into a bit of trouble stitching together guard uniforms for a group of bandits.

String.Source: Can the person who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?
String.Dest: Can the person who made your robes do handwritten forgeries?

String.Source: Well, apparently they weren't good enough to trick some mad Dark Elf who hunts lawbreakers.
String.Dest: Well, apparently they weren't good enough to trick some mad Dark Elf who hunts lawbreakers.

String.Source: What sort of trouble?
String.Dest: What sort of trouble?

String.Source: What sort of trouble?
String.Dest: What sort of trouble?

String.Source: So the bandits decided to take it out on my poor friend. Chances are he isn't alive, or in one piece, but we could try and rescue what's left of him.
String.Dest: So the bandits decided to take it out on my poor friend. Chances are he isn't alive, or in one piece, but we could try and rescue what's left of him.

String.Source: Well, that's the thing. I don't know for a fact that she saw me cringe. And if I tell her about the bug, there's no way she'll believe me.
String.Dest: Well, that's the thing. I don't know for a fact that she saw me cringe. And if I tell her about the bug, there's no way she'll believe me.

String.Source: You nitwit. You should apologize to her.
String.Dest: You nitwit. You should apologize to her.

String.Source: Bringing it up would just make things awkward. Better to just let the guilt eat at my insides.
String.Dest: Bringing it up would just make things awkward. Better to just let the guilt eat at my insides.

String.Source: You nitwit. You should apologize to her.
String.Dest: You nitwit. You should apologize to her.

String.Source: Meals?
String.Dest: 开饭了？

String.Source: No, but now that you mention it, you did eat one of the sweet rolls I was saving. I wasn't going to say anything, but you brought it up.
String.Dest: No, but now that you mention it, you did eat one of the sweet rolls I was saving. I wasn't going to say anything, but you brought it up.

String.Source: Doubtful any day has been as good as this one. Okay, that was fun, but I really don't have the stamina or patience to go all the way to Z.
String.Dest: Doubtful any day has been as good as this one. Okay, that was fun, but I really don't have the stamina or patience to go all the way to Z.

String.Source: Can't say I disagree.
String.Dest: 就这样吧。

String.Source: Yes, but so is the Empire. The Stormcloaks are the only ones who come late to the party.
String.Dest: 是的，但是帝国也是如此。风暴斗篷是聚会上唯一迟到的。

String.Source: Yes, Thalmor invasions are always on time.
String.Dest: 是的，梭默入侵总是很准时。

String.Source: But what they lack in punctuality they make up for with surliness.
String.Dest: 但他们用粗暴弥补了他们的不守时。

String.Source: Yes, Thalmor invasions are always on time.
String.Dest: 是的，梭默入侵总是很准时。

String.Source: Wait, you were just making small talk? I thought we were playing the Withershins game.
String.Dest: Wait, you were just making small talk? I thought we were playing the Withershins game.

String.Source: Yeah, it's a good day.
String.Dest: 是啊，天气是不错。

String.Source: Terrible. Whose idea was it for me to open a store? Mine? Well, that's the last time I'm listening to that fool!
String.Dest: Terrible. Whose idea was it for me to open a store? Mine? Well, that's the last time I'm listening to that fool!

String.Source: How's the business faring?
String.Dest: 生意还好吗？

String.Source: How's the business faring?
String.Dest: 生意还好吗？

String.Source: I can't even come up with a decent name. I was tossing around a few ideas earlier, and they were all horrible.
String.Dest: 我甚至想不出一个体面的名字。我之前扔掉了一些想法，因为它们都太糟糕了。

String.Source: And I mean horrible as in literally inducing "horror." Would you like to hear them? No? Well too bad.
String.Dest: And I mean horrible as in literally inducing "horror." Would you like to hear them? No? Well too bad.

String.Source: How's the business faring?
String.Dest: 生意还好吗？

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: Let's see...I counted the amount of lint in my belly button...ten pieces today.
String.Dest: 看看……我数了数肚脐眼里的线头儿……今天有10根。

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: I organized everything in our home alphabetically, then put it all back.
String.Dest: 我把我们家里的所有东西都按字母排列收拾整理了一通，然后把它们恢复一样一样摆放回去。

String.Source: I read a book from cover to cover, which is to say I read the front one twice.
String.Dest: I read a book from cover to cover, which is to say I read the front one twice.

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: How was your day?
String.Dest: 你今天过得怎么样？

String.Source: Then I took a nap and counted my lint again. I even gave them names. The big one is "Belly-marco." How was your day?
String.Dest: Then I took a nap and counted my lint again. I even gave them names. The big one is "Belly-marco." How was your day?

String.Source: Do anything productive today?
String.Dest: Do anything productive today?

String.Source: Well, the place was dusty, so I picked up a broom. Then I handed it to our housecarl.
String.Dest: Well, the place was dusty, so I picked up a broom. Then I handed it to our housecarl.

String.Source: Do anything productive today?
String.Dest: Do anything productive today?

String.Source: Or maybe it was the mannequin. I have trouble telling them apart.
String.Dest: Or maybe it was the mannequin. I have trouble telling them apart.

String.Source: Well, I thought a learned how to conjure a new sword, but it turned out it was the same one everyone else is using.
String.Dest: Well, I thought a learned how to conjure a new sword, but it turned out it was the same one everyone else is using.

String.Source: How did you spend your day?
String.Dest: How did you spend your day?

String.Source: Any interesting things happen while I was gone?
String.Dest: 我离开的时候发生了什么有趣的事吗？

String.Source: Why yes. Earlier today I almost stepped on a spider, and when I opened the door to let it out some dust in the corner of there moved a bit.
String.Dest: Why yes. Earlier today I almost stepped on a spider, and when I opened the door to let it out some dust in the corner of there moved a bit.

String.Source: Why yes. While you were out there slaying dragons and such, I was here agonizing over how to eat in bed without staining the sheets.
String.Dest: Why yes. While you were out there slaying dragons and such, I was here agonizing over how to eat in bed without staining the sheets.

String.Source: Something on your mind, love?
String.Dest: Something on your mind, love?

String.Source: Something on your mind, love?
String.Dest: Something on your mind, love?

String.Source: So what I'm saying is, this marriage is perfect and I wouldn't change a thing.
String.Dest: So what I'm saying is, this marriage is perfect and I wouldn't change a thing.

String.Source: Better than the last.
String.Dest: 比最后一名好点儿。

String.Source: A fine day is it not?
String.Dest: 很棒的一天，不是吗？

String.Source: Good, because you don't have a choice. The first name used a bit of alliteration. It was "Rumarin's Relics."
String.Dest: Good, because you don't have a choice. The first name used a bit of alliteration. It was "Rumarin's Relics."

String.Source: Actually, I would love to hear your horrible store names.
String.Dest: 事实上，我倒想听听你那糟糕的商店名字。

String.Source: Actually, I would love to hear your horrible store names.
String.Dest: 事实上，我倒想听听你那糟糕的商店名字。

String.Source: A good name for a museum, a bad name for newly crafted goods and dinnerware.
String.Dest: A good name for a museum, a bad name for newly crafted goods and dinnerware.

String.Source: So I tried using a pun. I placed the goods on benches, split by a single walkway. "The Summerset Aisle," I called it. As in A-I-S-L-E.
String.Dest: So I tried using a pun. I placed the goods on benches, split by a single walkway. "The Summerset Aisle," I called it. As in A-I-S-L-E.

String.Source: Actually, I would love to hear your horrible store names.
String.Dest: 事实上，我倒想听听你那糟糕的商店名字。

String.Source: Actually, I would love to hear your horrible store names.
String.Dest: 事实上，我倒想听听你那糟糕的商店名字。

String.Source: You mean do two things at the same time? And fashion a ward? Hmm...it's almost like juggling. And I'm only half terrible at that. Let's do this.
String.Dest: You mean do two things at the same time? And fashion a ward? Hmm...it's almost like juggling. And I'm only half terrible at that. Let's do this.

String.Source: Just concentrate and breathe deeply.
String.Dest: 请集中精力并深呼吸。

String.Source: Don't worry, I got it. Just shoot you in the face, er, feet.
String.Dest: Don't worry, I got it. Just shoot you in the face, er, feet.

String.Source: Oh I get it. You're trying to stir my survival instinct. Yes, right in the face. But not really. You know what I mean.
String.Dest: Oh I get it. You're trying to stir my survival instinct. Yes, right in the face. But not really. You know what I mean.

String.Source: Sure, why not. Sounds like it could be some fun.
String.Dest: Sure, why not. Sounds like it could be some fun.

String.Source: Wait, I don't like your tone. You do realize I want you to aim at my feet, right? Suddenly I'm wondering if you got that part.
String.Dest: Wait, I don't like your tone. You do realize I want you to aim at my feet, right? Suddenly I'm wondering if you got that part.

String.Source: Well, I don't want you to actually hit me. I just want you to aim near my feet. You can do that, right?
String.Dest: Well, I don't want you to actually hit me. I just want you to aim near my feet. You can do that, right?

String.Source: That sounds incredibly dangerous. I could kill you.
String.Dest: That sounds incredibly dangerous. I could kill you.

String.Source: Alright. I think I know someone who can help teach you a spell.
String.Dest: Alright. I think I know someone who can help teach you a spell.

String.Source: Oh? Who is it? It's not General Tullius is it? That would be a shocker.
String.Dest: Oh? Who is it? It's not General Tullius is it? That would be a shocker.

String.Source: You know what they say, second time's the charm. Or was it the third time? Does that mean this next one will be a failure too?
String.Dest: You know what they say, second time's the charm. Or was it the third time? Does that mean this next one will be a failure too?

String.Source: Okay, there might be another mage that can help you.
String.Dest: 好吧，或许别的法师能帮上你的忙。

String.Source: This mage has to be the one. I mean, it's not as if I'm some one-trick bladebinder wearing imitation robes. That would be a shocking twist.
String.Dest: This mage has to be the one. I mean, it's not as if I'm some one-trick bladebinder wearing imitation robes. That would be a shocking twist.

String.Source: I know one more mage that is a bit unorthodox.
String.Dest: 据我所知，可不止一个法师踏上了异端的道路。

String.Source: No...it's almost as if I don't have the talent to be anything more than a bladebinder...but that would mean I'm not perfect.
String.Dest: 不……貌似我没有任何超过武器召唤者的天赋……而这意味着我不是完美的。

String.Source: It doesn't appear as if our strategy is working.
String.Dest: 看样子不像是我们的计划生效的节奏。

String.Source: A stunning revelation. I never saw it coming.
String.Dest: A stunning revelation. I never saw it coming.

String.Source: It doesn't appear as if our strategy is working.
String.Dest: 看样子不像是我们的计划生效的节奏。

String.Source: We could try one last thing. Otero once said if you want to learn to juggle swords, it does no good to practice with wooden ones.
String.Dest: We could try one last thing. Otero once said if you want to learn to juggle swords, it does no good to practice with wooden ones.

String.Source: Is there anything else we can try?
String.Dest: Is there anything else we can try?

String.Source: This is going to sound crazy, but maybe if you pummeled me with a spell, my survival instinct will kick in and I'll fashion a ward.
String.Dest: 听起来真疯狂，但如果你往我身上扔魔法，我的生存本能就会启动，我会立即躲开。

String.Source: Is there anything else we can try?
String.Dest: Is there anything else we can try?

String.Source: Well, I didn't adopt everything Otero taught me.
String.Dest: 那么，看来我没能吸纳奥特罗教给我的所有东西。

String.Source: And you were his understudy? Remind me never to hand you an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: 以及你是他的候补？哦我不会把上古卷轴交给你的。

String.Source: For instance, if it were me who found the Elder Scroll, the first thing I would do is make copies.
String.Dest: For instance, if it were me who found the Elder Scroll, the first thing I would do is make copies.

String.Source: And you were his understudy? Remind me never to hand you an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: 以及你是他的候补？哦我不会把上古卷轴交给你的。

String.Source: And you were his understudy? Remind me never to hand you an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: 以及你是他的候补？哦我不会把上古卷轴交给你的。

String.Source: Then I would use the extra one to wipe my unmentionables.
String.Dest: Then I would use the extra one to wipe my unmentionables.

String.Source: Wouldn't that be something. It's like "Hey, there's Ysgramor! And wow, is that a Snow Elf? And look over there, it's Otero's droppings!"
String.Dest: 真是不可思议。这就像是 "嘿，伊斯格拉谟！哇哦，那是只雪精灵吗？看那边，奥特罗拉出的粑粑！"

String.Source: I wonder if his waste was sent to another time.
String.Dest: 我想知道下次他的垃圾会被送到哪。

String.Source: Not Otero. He was the type to scamper off into the woods and figure things out later.
String.Dest: 不是奥特罗。他是那种先逃进森林然后再想到底是怎么回事儿的人。

String.Source: There must have been leaves. You always have to have a plan.
String.Dest: 那里面一定有叶子。你总是必须有一个计划。

String.Source: Besides, regardless of where you are, you can always find something to wipe your unmentionables. And he did. It just happened to be an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: 另外，不管你在哪儿，你永远都能找到方法弄干你的内衣。他也那么做了。只不过这次弄干的是一个上古卷轴。

String.Source: There must have been leaves. You always have to have a plan.
String.Dest: 那里面一定有叶子。你总是必须有一个计划。

String.Source: You know what? It does sound suspiciously like a lie.
String.Dest: 你知道么？那听起来很可疑就跟个瞎话一样。

String.Source: That story couldn't possibly be true.
String.Dest: 那个故事不可能是真的。

String.Source: I wonder if he also lied about the night he bedded seven wenches and a Countess because they were fond of his cartwheels.
String.Dest: 我很怀疑他是否在他那个和七个女孩还有伯爵夫人上床的故事里面也说谎了。他说她们为了他的优雅炫目而着迷。

String.Source: That story couldn't possibly be true.
String.Dest: 那个故事不可能是真的。

String.Source: Alright, here's a question. If Jurgen Windcaller was the first Greybeard, that means he had a pretty powerful voice, right?
String.Dest: Alright, here's a question. If Jurgen Windcaller was the first Greybeard, that means he had a pretty powerful voice, right?

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) Looks like we have some fetching to do.
String.Dest: (约根唤风者的号角) 看样子我们得取些东西了。

String.Source: If that's the case, why does he need a horn?
String.Dest: 如果是这样的话，他为什么需要一个号角？

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) Looks like we have some fetching to do.
String.Dest: (约根唤风者的号角) 看样子我们得取些东西了。

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.

String.Source: As is Alduin's stomach. You actually did him a favor, love, because from what I hear this world is rotten to the core.
String.Dest: As is Alduin's stomach. You actually did him a favor, love, because from what I hear this world is rotten to the core.

String.Source: But would that make the world a fruit? And mortals its slimy pulp?
String.Dest: But would that make the world a fruit? And mortals its slimy pulp?

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.

String.Source: I mean, I'm skinny and yellow, but telling you that doesn't make me a banana. I could just be insane.
String.Dest: I mean, I'm skinny and yellow, but telling you that doesn't make me a banana. I could just be insane.

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.

String.Source: Which makes you the spouse of a crazy person. So don't get mad the next time I stuff coins up my nose.
String.Dest: Which makes you the spouse of a crazy person. So don't get mad the next time I stuff coins up my nose.

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.

String.Source: As is Alduin's stomach. You actually did him a favor, because from what I hear this world is rotten to the core.
String.Dest: As is Alduin's stomach. You actually did him a favor, because from what I hear this world is rotten to the core.

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.

String.Source: But would that make the world a fruit? And mortals its slimy pulp?
String.Dest: But would that make the world a fruit? And mortals its slimy pulp?

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.

String.Source: I mean, I'm skinny and yellow, but telling you that doesn't make me a banana. I could just be insane.
String.Dest: I mean, I'm skinny and yellow, but telling you that doesn't make me a banana. I could just be insane.

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.

String.Source: No wonder I've been stuffing gold coins up my nose.
String.Dest: No wonder I've been stuffing gold coins up my nose.

String.Source: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.
String.Dest: I defeated Alduin. Sovngarde is safe. The world is safe.

String.Source: Wow. An Elder Scroll. Otero used to tell me a story about how he found one while out in the woods.
String.Dest: 哇噢，上古卷轴。奥特罗经常跟我讲他是怎么在野外发现这么个玩意的故事。

String.Source: (Elder Knowledge) It looks as if we have to retrieve an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: （上古知识）看来我们得拿回上古卷轴。

String.Source: What did he do with it? Well, he used it to wipe his arse. There really wasn't any other choice, being so far away from the stream.
String.Dest: 他拿这干什么? 嗯~, 他拿它擦屁股. 还真没那么多其他可能, 在离河流那么远的地方.

String.Source: (Elder Knowledge) It looks as if we have to retrieve an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: （上古知识）看来我们得拿回上古卷轴。

String.Source: Why did you think Otero gave you the spell tome?
String.Dest: Why did you think Otero gave you the spell tome?

String.Source: Well, probably out of guilt. Like I said before, I wanted to be an adventurer ever since that day with the bandits.
String.Dest: Well, probably out of guilt. Like I said before, I wanted to be an adventurer ever since that day with the bandits.

String.Source: But Otero was never willing to teach me how to fight. Maybe he thought it would make me too serious. Or maybe he just wanted to protect me.
String.Dest: But Otero was never willing to teach me how to fight. Maybe he thought it would make me too serious. Or maybe he just wanted to protect me.

String.Source: Why did you think Otero gave you the spell tome?
String.Dest: Why did you think Otero gave you the spell tome?

String.Source: I suppose when he died, he realized the tome was the only way he could.
String.Dest: I suppose when he died, he realized the tome was the only way he could.

String.Source: Why did you think Otero gave you the spell tome?
String.Dest: Why did you think Otero gave you the spell tome?

String.Source: On the flip side, a bound sword is loud, time consuming, and can't be tempered.
String.Dest: On the flip side, a bound sword is loud, time consuming, and can't be tempered.

String.Source: You forgot impermanent, magicka draining, and the fact that they only come in one color. Still, you don't have to carry them.
String.Dest: You forgot impermanent, magicka draining, and the fact that they only come in one color. Still, you don't have to carry them.

String.Source: On the flip side, a bound sword is loud, time consuming, and can't be tempered.
String.Dest: On the flip side, a bound sword is loud, time consuming, and can't be tempered.

String.Source: I don't know about you, but the idea of slogging from town to town with a weapon rack strapped to my back is not my idea of an adventure.
String.Dest: 我不了解你，但这种把武器架绑到我的背上，苦哈哈的从一个城镇走到另一个城镇的主意，可不符合我对冒险家的美好印象。

String.Source: Oh no, I'm not falling for that. You heard what Arngeir said. I talk to one of them and I'll probably die.
String.Dest: Oh no, I'm not falling for that. You heard what Arngeir said. I talk to one of them and I'll probably die.

String.Source: How should I know? Ask one of the Greybeards.
String.Dest: How should I know? Ask one of the Greybeards.

String.Source: Still, food for thought, in case this horn turns out to be, you know, the kind Dremora have on their heads.
String.Dest: Still, food for thought, in case this horn turns out to be, you know, the kind Dremora have on their heads.

String.Source: How should I know? Ask one of the Greybeards.
String.Dest: How should I know? Ask one of the Greybeards.

String.Source: And it's good to see you haven't lost that splendid body of yours.
String.Dest: And it's good to see you haven't lost that splendid body of yours.

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor, my husband.
String.Dest: 看到你没丧失幽默感这很好，我的丈夫。

String.Source: I don't know if we could find a housecarl willing to take care of two cripples.
String.Dest: I don't know if we could find a housecarl willing to take care of two cripples.

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor, my husband.
String.Dest: 看到你没丧失幽默感这很好，我的丈夫。

String.Source: Not that I wouldn't be willing to make it work. Or that I only care about your body. Did I mention how much I love you and that I'm glad your home?
String.Dest: Not that I wouldn't be willing to make it work. Or that I only care about your body. Did I mention how much I love you and that I'm glad your home?

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor, my husband.
String.Dest: 看到你没丧失幽默感这很好，我的丈夫。

String.Source: And it's good to see you haven't lost your voice, with all that shouting you were asked to do.
String.Dest: 在你吼完之后你居然还没哑，挺不错的。

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor.
String.Dest: 见你还没丧失你那幽默感，真好。

String.Source: The last time I tried to shout I had to take a health potion to fix my throat. No, I'll stick to opining sarcastically, thank you.
String.Dest: The last time I tried to shout I had to take a health potion to fix my throat. No, I'll stick to opining sarcastically, thank you.

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor.
String.Dest: 见你还没丧失你那幽默感，真好。

String.Source: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need me.
String.Dest: Anyways, good to have you back. I imagine you'll want to rest for a bit, but I'll be here if you need me.

String.Source: It's good to see you haven't lost your sense of humor.
String.Dest: 见你还没丧失你那幽默感，真好。

String.Source: I hope not. I would love the chance to gut a dragon.
String.Dest: I hope not. I would love the chance to gut a dragon.

String.Source: Really? You don't want to slay it, or just chase it away, but gut its belly? That's a rather visceral description.
String.Dest: Really? You don't want to slay it, or just chase it away, but gut its belly? That's a rather visceral description.

String.Source: I hope not. I would love the chance to gut a dragon.
String.Dest: I hope not. I would love the chance to gut a dragon.

String.Source: It's kind of scary. I'm not really into that sort of blood and guts stuff, but maybe if I vomit constantly you'll see that I'm trying to do my part.
String.Dest: It's kind of scary. I'm not really into that sort of blood and guts stuff, but maybe if I vomit constantly you'll see that I'm trying to do my part.

String.Source: Oh, I wasn't suggesting we demand it. I like not having the Dark Brotherhood on my back.
String.Dest: Oh, I wasn't suggesting we demand it. I like not having the Dark Brotherhood on my back.

String.Source: We're on Maven's good side. Now's not the time to start making demands.
String.Dest: We're on Maven's good side. Now's not the time to start making demands.

String.Source: No, I was thinking you could float it out there. Like "I can't believe there's actually wealthy nobles who swear by Honningbrew. What fools!"
String.Dest: No, I was thinking you could float it out there. Like "I can't believe there's actually wealthy nobles who swear by Honningbrew. What fools!"

String.Source: We're on Maven's good side. Now's not the time to start making demands.
String.Dest: We're on Maven's good side. Now's not the time to start making demands.

String.Source: We're on Maven's good side. Now's not the time to start making demands.
String.Dest: We're on Maven's good side. Now's not the time to start making demands.

String.Source: But only if you think it's a good plan. That's why I'm running it by you first. I wouldn't know a good idea if it urinated on my leg.
String.Dest: But only if you think it's a good plan. That's why I'm running it by you first. I wouldn't know a good idea if it urinated on my leg.

String.Source: Keep your voice down! You do realize she's standing right there, don't you? Although I'm not sure she can hear us. Too many blows to the head.
String.Dest: Keep your voice down! You do realize she's standing right there, don't you? Although I'm not sure she can hear us. Too many blows to the head.

String.Source: I cringe at Zora all the time. Have you seen her face? It's horrifying.
String.Dest: I cringe at Zora all the time. Have you seen her face? It's horrifying.

String.Source: But if we're being completely honest, I'm inclined to agree. I try and stare at the space between her eyebrows. That helps.
String.Dest: But if we're being completely honest, I'm inclined to agree. I try and stare at the space between her eyebrows. That helps.

String.Source: I cringe at Zora all the time. Have you seen her face? It's horrifying.
String.Dest: I cringe at Zora all the time. Have you seen her face? It's horrifying.

String.Source: Exactly.
String.Dest: 就是这样。

String.Source: Sentences?
String.Dest: 宣判？

String.Source: You're in denial. You're trying to cope with your fear.
String.Dest: You're in denial. You're trying to cope with your fear.

String.Source: What are you, my priest? Because if you are, then who was the lady who cured my witbane?
String.Dest: What are you, my priest? Because if you are, then who was the lady who cured my witbane?

String.Source: You're in denial. You're trying to cope with your fear.
String.Dest: You're in denial. You're trying to cope with your fear.

String.Source: Maybe she was just some crazy person. Maybe I still have witbane.
String.Dest: Maybe she was just some crazy person. Maybe I still have witbane.

String.Source: You're in denial. You're trying to cope with your fear.
String.Dest: You're in denial. You're trying to cope with your fear.

String.Source: Okay, you've convinced me. There's a dragon out there. And coincidentally, something warm running down my leg.
String.Dest: Okay, you've convinced me. There's a dragon out there. And coincidentally, something warm running down my leg.

String.Source: I'm sure that was the jealousy talking. It's like adopting someone else's child. They're only a brat until they you're own.
String.Dest: I'm sure that was the jealousy talking. It's like adopting someone else's child. They're only a brat until they you're own.

String.Source: Except Maven hates Honningbrew Mead. I believe she called it "bile."
String.Dest: Except Maven hates Honningbrew Mead. I believe she called it "bile."

String.Source: You can suggest she bargain with Sabjorn now that he has no leverage. Just remind her how popular Honningbrew is with the Elves.
String.Dest: You can suggest she bargain with Sabjorn now that he has no leverage. Just remind her how popular Honningbrew is with the Elves.

String.Source: Except Maven hates Honningbrew Mead. I believe she called it "bile."
String.Dest: Except Maven hates Honningbrew Mead. I believe she called it "bile."

String.Source: I don't know if that's true, by the way, but it sounds like it would be.
String.Dest: 我不知道这是不是真的，但是它听起来跟真的一样。

String.Source: Except Maven hates Honningbrew Mead. I believe she called it "bile."
String.Dest: Except Maven hates Honningbrew Mead. I believe she called it "bile."

String.Source: Look, two minutes is a perfectly acceptable amount of time for someone of my age and stature. Besides, I was distracted the last time.
String.Dest: Look, two minutes is a perfectly acceptable amount of time for someone of my age and stature. Besides, I was distracted the last time.

String.Source: Excellent. Hopefully you will last longer in battle now.
String.Dest: Excellent. Hopefully you will last longer in battle now.

String.Source: Wait, what were we talking about again?
String.Dest: 等下。刚才我们说什么来着？

String.Source: Excellent. Hopefully you will last longer in battle now.
String.Dest: Excellent. Hopefully you will last longer in battle now.

String.Source: Oh, let's not get carried away. I'm still a bladebinder first. I'm just a wardbinder on my days off.
String.Dest: Oh, let's not get carried away. I'm still a bladebinder first. I'm just a wardbinder on my days off.

String.Source: Congratulations. You are officially a mage.
String.Dest: Congratulations. You are officially a mage.

String.Source: Oh no, I'm going to stay in my fantasy land with the other delusional folk. You should come over. It's much warmer and there's mermaid and unicorns.
String.Dest: Oh no, I'm going to stay in my fantasy land with the other delusional folk. You should come over. It's much warmer and there's mermaid and unicorns.

String.Source: Good. Now you don't have to pretend bladebinders actually exist.
String.Dest: Good. Now you don't have to pretend bladebinders actually exist.

String.Source: Size isn't everything. A lesser than lesser ward is good enough.
String.Dest: Size isn't everything. A lesser than lesser ward is good enough.

String.Source: Oh yes, it's perfect for an ice spike. All I have to do is line it up right at the needle point. Shouldn't be too hard for someone of my skill.
String.Dest: Oh yes, it's perfect for an ice spike. All I have to do is line it up right at the needle point. Shouldn't be too hard for someone of my skill.

String.Source: Size isn't everything. A lesser than lesser ward is good enough.
String.Dest: Size isn't everything. A lesser than lesser ward is good enough.

String.Source: But honestly, the size of the ward is really only enough to protect one nipple. Which begs the question...left or right?
String.Dest: But honestly, the size of the ward is really only enough to protect one nipple. Which begs the question...left or right?

String.Source: Perhaps. The real question is, do I want to? After what we went through to learn this one, I'd say the answer is a resounding no.
String.Dest: 也许吧。真正的问题是，我是不是想要？为了得到这个答案我们经历了这么多，我想最终的回答是个坚定的不。

String.Source: Do you think you'll be able to learn other spells this way?
String.Dest: 你认为你能这样学其他的法术？

String.Source: Look, I'm grateful for everything you've done. It's not the gift so much as the thought. Keep that in mind when I give you this paltry reward.
String.Dest: Look, I'm grateful for everything you've done. It's not the gift so much as the thought. Keep that in mind when I give you this paltry reward.

String.Source: Do you think you'll be able to learn other spells this way?
String.Dest: 你认为你能这样学其他的法术？

String.Source: Oh, and next time I get any bright ideas, just ignore me. But thanks for listening this one time.
String.Dest: Oh, and next time I get any bright ideas, just ignore me. But thanks for listening this one time.

String.Source: Do you think you'll be able to learn other spells this way?
String.Dest: 你认为你能这样学其他的法术？

String.Source: Really? Here I thought you knew everyone. Or was that Ulundil? I get you two confused sometimes, because I have poor eyesight.
String.Dest: Really? Here I thought you knew everyone. Or was that Ulundil? I get you two confused sometimes, because I have poor eyesight.

String.Source: Actually, I haven't met anyone that fits your description.
String.Dest: 事实上，我没见到任何一个符合你描述的人。

String.Source: All kidding aside, I'm sure that person is out there. We'll find them eventually.
String.Dest: All kidding aside, I'm sure that person is out there. We'll find them eventually.

String.Source: Actually, I haven't met anyone that fits your description.
String.Dest: 事实上，我没见到任何一个符合你描述的人。

String.Source: Mugnor's a college mage, but she's a little eccentric.
String.Dest: Mugnor's a college mage, but she's a little eccentric.

String.Source: Well, at least we won't have to go very far.
String.Dest: 好吧，至少我们不用走太远。

String.Source: Wouldn't have it been better to see her first? Not that I'd ever question you. Well, back to Winterhold then.
String.Dest: Wouldn't have it been better to see her first? Not that I'd ever question you. Well, back to Winterhold then.

String.Source: Mugnor's a college mage, but she's a little eccentric.
String.Dest: Mugnor's a college mage, but she's a little eccentric.

String.Source: Oh yes, your egomaniacal corpse friend. Somehow I don't think this is going to be entirely painless.
String.Dest: Oh yes, your egomaniacal corpse friend. Somehow I don't think this is going to be entirely painless.

String.Source: Actually, there's one mage who happens to live in a sewer. Dagri'lon.
String.Dest: Actually, there's one mage who happens to live in a sewer. Dagri'lon.

String.Source: Valgus should be able to help you.
String.Dest: 威尔格斯应该能帮你。

String.Source: Of course he can. And if he can't well, it'll be his fault. I like Olivia's way of thinking.
String.Dest: Of course he can. And if he can't well, it'll be his fault. I like Olivia's way of thinking.

String.Source: We could just buy you some scrolls.
String.Dest: 我们可以给你买点卷轴。

String.Source: And be a paper mage? Oh Gods no, I still have my pride.
String.Dest: And be a paper mage? Oh Gods no, I still have my pride.

String.Source: We just need to find a mage who's a little more unorthodox than the ones here. Do you know anyone like that?
String.Dest: We just need to find a mage who's a little more unorthodox than the ones here. Do you know anyone like that?

String.Source: We could just buy you some scrolls.
String.Dest: 我们可以给你买点卷轴。

String.Source: Probably not, I mean, they're still a guild. That would make them organized.
String.Dest: 也许不是，我是说，他们仍然是一个公会。这会让他们团结起来。

String.Source: How about an underground guild full of gutter wizards? Not informal enough?
String.Dest: 一个到处都是低劣的巫师的地下公会怎么样？过于正式了么？

String.Source: I'm thinking more along the lines of a mage who had sort of an unorthodox education. Do you know anyone like that?
String.Dest: I'm thinking more along the lines of a mage who had sort of an unorthodox education. Do you know anyone like that?

String.Source: How about an underground guild full of gutter wizards? Not informal enough?
String.Dest: 一个到处都是低劣的巫师的地下公会怎么样？过于正式了么？

String.Source: That's just crazy enough to be the stupidest idea ever.
String.Dest: 那曾今是疯狂至极且愚蠢的主意。

String.Source: Okay, maybe not mages that actually live in sewers. That would mean we'd have to actually go in one, and I just washed this robe.
String.Dest: 好吧，也许不是那些下水道的法师。但那意味着我们得亲自到那些下水道里找吧，我才把我的长袍洗了。

String.Source: That's just crazy enough to be the stupidest idea ever.
String.Dest: 那曾今是疯狂至极且愚蠢的主意。

String.Source: What I meant is, mages who had sort of an unorthodox education. Do you know anyone like that?
String.Dest: What I meant is, mages who had sort of an unorthodox education. Do you know anyone like that?

String.Source: Wow, that was a frightening experience. The Nords should really consider burning their dead.
String.Dest: Wow, that was a frightening experience. The Nords should really consider burning their dead.

String.Source: Although granted it would make opening urns a lot more harrowing.
String.Dest: 不过我想掀开骨灰罐的感觉确实会更痛苦一些吧。

String.Source: Well, that went about as poorly as one could expect. I need to make a mental note: Orcs are surly.
String.Dest: Well, that went about as poorly as one could expect. I need to make a mental note: Orcs are surly.

String.Source: This is probably not the best place for me to learn anyway. Winterhold is a traditional institution.
String.Dest: This is probably not the best place for me to learn anyway. Winterhold is a traditional institution.

String.Source: We need to find a place that's the opposite of that. Like a college built by sewer mages.
String.Dest: We need to find a place that's the opposite of that. Like a college built by sewer mages.

String.Source: I think...I think I did it! I mean, it was smaller than a juniper berry but I actually felt the ward coming out of my hand! It worked!
String.Dest: I think...I think I did it! I mean, it was smaller than a juniper berry but I actually felt the ward coming out of my hand! It worked!

String.Source: I think it was a lesser ward! Although you can't really call it that. Maybe a lesser than lesser ward. Or the least ward. But still, a ward.
String.Dest: I think it was a lesser ward! Although you can't really call it that. Maybe a lesser than lesser ward. Or the least ward. But still, a ward.

String.Source: I don't know, maybe he was eaten by werewolves? It's about as bad a guess as any.
String.Dest: I don't know, maybe he was eaten by werewolves? It's about as bad a guess as any.

String.Source: Where do you think Sam run off to, anyway?
String.Dest: Where do you think Sam run off to, anyway?

String.Source: Probably a hallucination or something. You wouldn't leave me for a goat. A canary, maybe, but a goat? Preposterous.
String.Dest: Probably a hallucination or something. You wouldn't leave me for a goat. A canary, maybe, but a goat? Preposterous.

String.Source: The priestess mentioned something about marriage and a goat. Sound familiar?
String.Dest: The priestess mentioned something about marriage and a goat. Sound familiar?

String.Source: Probably a hallucination or something. You wouldn't marry a goat. I could see you with a hawk or an owl, maybe, but a goat? Preposterous.
String.Dest: Probably a hallucination or something. You wouldn't marry a goat. I could see you with a hawk or an owl, maybe, but a goat? Preposterous.

String.Source: The priestess mentioned something about marriage and a goat. Sound familiar?
String.Dest: The priestess mentioned something about marriage and a goat. Sound familiar?

String.Source: I don't know, but being shamed by a Dibellan priestess is by itself a feat. I mean, have you heard the sort of things they're into?
String.Dest: I don't know, but being shamed by a Dibellan priestess is by itself a feat. I mean, have you heard the sort of things they're into?

String.Source: (Night to Remember) What do you think happened with Sam?
String.Dest: (Night to Remember) What do you think happened with Sam?

String.Source: AAAGH!!!
String.Dest: AAAGH!!!

String.Source: {Departs}
String.Dest: {离开 }

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Already? We haven't even told each other our deepest darkest fears yet! Mine's centaurs. There. Now we can go our separate ways.
String.Dest: Already? We haven't even told each other our deepest darkest fears yet! Mine's centaurs. There. Now we can go our separate ways.

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Now and forever. Just kidding. Marriage joke. I'll be going home now.
String.Dest: Now and forever. Just kidding. Marriage joke. I'll be going home now.

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: I'll be home if you need me. But who's to say I'll need you? We shall see, we shall see.
String.Dest: I'll be home if you need me. But who's to say I'll need you? We shall see, we shall see.

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: I'll be home if you need me.
String.Dest: 当你需要时到家里来找我。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: All right, you know where to find me.
String.Dest: All right, you know where to find me.

String.Source: That's fine.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 对，我来告诉你。

String.Source: Still need something?
String.Dest: 你还需要什么吗？

String.Source: Somehow I knew this was coming.
String.Dest: 反正我知道这要来。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: This always happens. Dump the goods on the Elf who carries nothing.
String.Dest: This always happens. Dump the goods on the Elf who carries nothing.

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: If only we could conjure everything. Keys, food, junk.
String.Dest: If only we could conjure everything. Keys, food, junk.

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: Okay, let's swap.
String.Dest: Okay, let's swap.

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: All right, let's trade.
String.Dest: All right, let's trade.

String.Source: Swapping things is a good way to build a fortune. The only question is, is it yours or mine?
String.Dest: Swapping things is a good way to build a fortune. The only question is, is it yours or mine?

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: Sure, I'll manage. Somehow.
String.Dest: Sure, I'll manage. Somehow.

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: What do you need me to take?
String.Dest: 你有什么要我拿的？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: Make your request, and it shall be done. Eventually.
String.Dest: Make your request, and it shall be done. Eventually.

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你帮我做些事。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你帮我做些事。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你帮我做些事。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟着我。

String.Source: I'm right behind you.
String.Dest: 我紧随在后。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下.

String.Source: Sure. Just leave me a honey nut treat and a bottle of beer or something to pass the time.
String.Dest: Sure. Just leave me a honey nut treat and a bottle of beer or something to pass the time.

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下.

String.Source: All right, I'll stand guard until you get back.
String.Dest: All right, I'll stand guard until you get back.

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: Is that it?
String.Dest: 就是这个？

String.Source: You do realize that's impossible, don't you?
String.Dest: 你明白这是不可能的，对吧？

String.Source: Sorry, can't be done.
String.Dest: 对不起，我做不到。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Sure, why not.
String.Dest: 好啊，为什么不呢？

String.Source: Sure, why not.
String.Dest: 当然，为什么不呢。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: Zzzzz...
String.Dest: Zzzzz……

String.Source: I have to try that sometime. "I don't have any chooooice, this isn't what I want!" And then boom, sword in your belly.
String.Dest: I have to try that sometime. "I don't have any chooooice, this isn't what I want!" And then boom, sword in your belly.

String.Source: So are we not going to talk about the dead troll lying by the campfire?
String.Dest: So are we not going to talk about the dead troll lying by the campfire?

String.Source: I realize hunters get lonely, but I think this one took one too many blows to the head.
String.Dest: I realize hunters get lonely, but I think this one took one too many blows to the head.

String.Source: A bandit once told me I picked a bad time to get lost. Which got me thinking. Is there ever a good time to get lost?
String.Dest: A bandit once told me I picked a bad time to get lost. Which got me thinking. Is there ever a good time to get lost?

String.Source: I suppose if we were on our way to a Nord ruin and ended up at the tavern, then it'd be a good time. But only then.
String.Dest: I suppose if we were on our way to a Nord ruin and ended up at the tavern, then it'd be a good time. But only then.

String.Source: So it turns out Gleda wasn't dead after all. That is, of course, if you believe "Gleda" ever existed.
String.Dest: So it turns out Gleda wasn't dead after all. That is, of course, if you believe "Gleda" ever existed.

String.Source: Sure, she was being escorted by a Giant, but at no point did he show us his invoice for the purchase.
String.Dest: Sure, she was being escorted by a Giant, but at no point did he show us his invoice for the purchase.

String.Source: Until we see that, we have no proof the farmer's story is true.
String.Dest: Until we see that, we have no proof the farmer's story is true.

String.Source: Thank the gods we killed this warlock. The last thing I want to do is spend my life trying to convince people I'm not a bad guy.
String.Dest: Thank the gods we killed this warlock. The last thing I want to do is spend my life trying to convince people I'm not a bad guy.

String.Source: Wow, so Hevnoraak is dead. But now comes the hard part. Finding a buyer gullible enough to believe we could kill him.
String.Dest: Wow, so Hevnoraak is dead. But now comes the hard part. Finding a buyer gullible enough to believe we could kill him.

String.Source: So that's the Pale Blade. Well, it certainly looks sharp enough, although I prefer swords with a bit of a tan.
String.Dest: So that's the Pale Blade. Well, it certainly looks sharp enough, although I prefer swords with a bit of a tan.

String.Source: Ew, is it me, or is there something floating inside that bottle you picked up? I'm just going to pretend it's me.
String.Dest: Ew, is it me, or is there something floating inside that bottle you picked up? I'm just going to pretend it's me.

String.Source: Some say children are like arrows. You send them out into the world, and they end up in the arms of bandits.
String.Dest: Some say children are like arrows. You send them out into the world, and they end up in the arms of bandits.

String.Source: So the Jarl of Winterhold wants you to fetch him a crown. Wouldn't it make more sense to find a carpenter?
String.Dest: So the Jarl of Winterhold wants you to fetch him a crown. Wouldn't it make more sense to find a carpenter?

String.Source: The farmer said you sold a goat to a Giant? Okay, that's just ridiculous. Giants don't carry money.
String.Dest: The farmer said you sold a goat to a Giant? Okay, that's just ridiculous. Giants don't carry money.

String.Source: You know what I think? He was making a show in front of his wife. He doesn't want her to know he ate the goat and is letting you take the fall.
String.Dest: You know what I think? He was making a show in front of his wife. He doesn't want her to know he ate the goat and is letting you take the fall.

String.Source: I wonder if it ever occurred to this wizard that you don't have to kill people to make corpses.
String.Dest: I wonder if it ever occurred to this wizard that you don't have to kill people to make corpses.

String.Source: There's actually plots of land full of them just waiting to be raised.
String.Dest: There's actually plots of land full of them just waiting to be raised.

String.Source: Well, this looks like a dead end. Why don't I just stand right here while you figure things out.
String.Dest: Well, this looks like a dead end. Why don't I just stand right here while you figure things out.

String.Source: According to the map, this place is called Talking Stone Camp. Well, two out of three isn't bad.
String.Dest: According to the map, this place is called Talking Stone Camp. Well, two out of three isn't bad.

String.Source: So that's the Helm of Winterhold. Is it me, or does it look like a normal steel helm?
String.Dest: So that's the Helm of Winterhold. Is it me, or does it look like a normal steel helm?

String.Source: But who knows, maybe the horns shoot lighting bolts or something.
String.Dest: But who knows, maybe the horns shoot lighting bolts or something.

String.Source: So this bard, who apparently hates King Olaf, was writing his poem in the middle of Olaf's tomb and died?
String.Dest: So this bard, who apparently hates King Olaf, was writing his poem in the middle of Olaf's tomb and died?

String.Source: Keep your enemies close, I suppose...
String.Dest: Keep your enemies close, I suppose...

String.Source: You know, neither Olaf nor this ghost bard would've made it to the 4th era if they didn't hate each other so much.
String.Dest: You know, neither Olaf nor this ghost bard would've made it to the 4th era if they didn't hate each other so much.

String.Source: I guess the real key to living forever is being angry and bitter.
String.Dest: I guess the real key to living forever is being angry and bitter.

String.Source: It looks like this ghost wants us to follow him. Sure, why not. I mean, it's not every day a stranger invites you into his home.
String.Dest: It looks like this ghost wants us to follow him. Sure, why not. I mean, it's not every day a stranger invites you into his home.

String.Source: Unless you're a courier. Then it happens almost regularly.
String.Dest: Unless you're a courier. Then it happens almost regularly.

String.Source: The helm is returned. Huzzah! But is one helmet enough to conquer a whole college full of mages? The Jarl certainly thinks so.
String.Dest: The helm is returned. Huzzah! But is one helmet enough to conquer a whole college full of mages? The Jarl certainly thinks so.

String.Source: Are you sure we should trust Valdar? I mean, what if he's the "evil spirit" we don't want to release?
String.Dest: Are you sure we should trust Valdar? I mean, what if he's the "evil spirit" we don't want to release?

String.Source: All I'm saying is, maybe we should ask Hevnoraak for his side of the story first.
String.Dest: All I'm saying is, maybe we should ask Hevnoraak for his side of the story first.

String.Source: Okay, can somebody explain to me why there are stairs at the end of those pipes? Because only a crazy person would think that's sensible.
String.Dest: Okay, can somebody explain to me why there are stairs at the end of those pipes? Because only a crazy person would think that's sensible.

String.Source: I wonder if the Hagraven magic differs depending on the skull. Does it matter to them if mine is lumpy?
String.Dest: I wonder if the Hagraven magic differs depending on the skull. Does it matter to them if mine is lumpy?

String.Source: So these cultists pray for more suffering, and then we show up to deliver it! Ha! It's funny if you don't think of them as people.
String.Dest: So these cultists pray for more suffering, and then we show up to deliver it! Ha! It's funny if you don't think of them as people.

String.Source: About Peryite...Far be it for me to tell a Daedric Prince how to do his job, but seriously, wouldn't the best person to spread your plague be a cook?
String.Dest: About Peryite...Far be it for me to tell a Daedric Prince how to do his job, but seriously, wouldn't the best person to spread your plague be a cook?

String.Source: So the Red Eagle really did have a flaming sword. I suppose that might sound impressive if you never seen an enchantment.
String.Dest: So the Red Eagle really did have a flaming sword. I suppose that might sound impressive if you never seen an enchantment.

String.Source: And with that, the Red Eagle is finally dead for the second time, unless someone tries to revive him again. We should really burn the corpse.
String.Dest: And with that, the Red Eagle is finally dead for the second time, unless someone tries to revive him again. We should really burn the corpse.

String.Source: This cove is a great way to smuggle things in and out of camp.
String.Dest: 这个山凹真是带货出入营地的好路子啊！

String.Source: Wow, Gathrik's tomb, huh. The famous Gathrik from the battle of what's-his-name. You know, that Gathrik. Feel free to fill in the blanks at any time.
String.Dest: 哇，加斯瑞克的坟墓。 哈，加斯瑞克之战中大名鼎鼎的加斯瑞克。你懂得，就是那个加斯瑞克，什么时候都可以拿来当话题的那个。

String.Source: Well, that escalated rather quickly. But maybe Christer won't mind that we took his one true love and spilled her brains on the floor.
String.Dest: 好吧，升级相当迅速嘛。也许克里斯特不会介意我们拿走他的挚爱并让他脑浆四溅。

String.Source: Look, I realize bandits aren't the sharpest tools in the shed, but if I'm a sentry, the last place I'd be standing is in front of a giant target.
String.Dest: 你瞧，我意识到强盗们在小屋里可不是什么敏捷的家伙，但如果我是个放哨的，我最不想站的地方估计是在一个巨型目标前面。

String.Source: Like, say you have an embarrassing social disease you want to hide from the others, and you need a potion. Just send them in the back way.
String.Dest: 比如你得了什么……见不得人的病，要买药就叫他们从这后门进。

String.Source: Not to talk ill of the dead, but "The Bear will lead the way?" Agna could've just told you about the pull chain.
String.Dest: 不是我要非议死者，但是“熊会带路？”AGNA就应该告诉你关于链环的事的。

String.Source: Pressure plates are one thing, but I think your relatives are the more pressing concern. Get it, pressing? I'll just shut up now.
String.Dest: Pressure plates are one thing, but I think your relatives are the more pressing concern. Get it, pressing? I'll just shut up now.

String.Source: You know, this arena looks familiar. I think I lost 100 septims betting on one of these bandits. Now I don't feel so bad for killing them.
String.Dest: 知道吗，这个竞技场看起来还挺眼熟的。我想我浪费了100个金币的赌注在这群强盗中的某人身上。现在杀了他们我也不会觉得难受了。

String.Source: It's a good thing Christer didn't follow us. Can you imagine if he walked in right when Fjola gave us the ring? That would've been awkward.
String.Dest: 克里斯没跟着我们真是好事。你能想象当菲欧拉给我们戒指的时候他正好走过来回事什么样子吗？那就糗大了。

String.Source: You know, this Sybil seems awfully mature. Which is probably why I like her. Neither of us want to act our age.
String.Dest: 你知道吗，那个女预言家真的非常成熟。这就是我喜欢她的原因。我们中没有一个人想表现得与自己的年龄相符。

String.Source: Wow, this Nord must really love his wife. She must be a good cook.
String.Dest: Wow, this Nord must really love his wife. She must be a good cook.

String.Source: You know, one of these days I'd like to be able to explore a cave without finding a corpse on a slab.
String.Dest: 你要知道, 这些天我想去探索一个山洞而不是去找一具尸体.

String.Source: Not that I want to question our Khajiit friend who in no way looks like a thief, but how do you make incense out of a flawless ruby?
String.Dest: 我并非想怀疑我们这位怎么看也不是小偷的虎人朋友，不过你是怎么用无瑕的红宝石做出熏香的呢？

String.Source: Ah, the Dainty Sload! I know these pirates! The first mate is an Orc. I say we kill him before he remembers I owe him money.
String.Dest: 啊，小蛞蝓号！我知道这些海盗！他们的大副是个兽人。我得说，我们得在他记起我欠还他钱之前杀死他。

String.Source: I've heard there are some incredibly stupid people who think this place is full of gold. But it's not. It's full of something called "Guld."
String.Dest: 我听说有些蠢到家了的家伙相信这地方到处是金子。但才不是那样呢。这鬼地方是有带金字开头的东西，不过那玩意叫金盏花。

String.Source: So, I have a question. If a pickaxe made of iron can chip off ebony, orichalcum, and other ore, doesn't that make iron the strongest metal?
String.Dest: So, I have a question. If a pickaxe made of iron can chip off ebony, orichalcum, and other ore, doesn't that make iron the strongest metal?

String.Source: Don't get me wrong, I feel bad for this couple having to die, but I'm also very impressed by whoever killed them, hitting a moving target and such.
String.Dest: 别把我想得太糟，我对这对夫妻必须死感到很不好，但是我对杀死他们的人一样印象深刻，竟然能击中移动中的目标。

String.Source: You know, they really should put up a sign outside this camp. On one side it'd say, "Warning: Bandits." On the other it'd say "Beware: Adventurers."
String.Dest: 你瞧，他们真应该在这个营地外立个牌子。一半儿写着“警告：此处有强盗”，另一半儿刻上“冒险者出没注意”。

String.Source: They say broken towers are usually filled with broken people. This tower's lopsided as well. And yet, I feel a strange compulsion to move in...
String.Dest: 他们说破旧的塔楼里一定盘踞着一群乌合之众。这座塔楼也有点斜了。而且，我还感到似乎有一种力量隐隐约约在吸引我进去...

String.Source: I like how the bandit announced his plans to kill us instead of just stabbing us in the back. I wish more of them shared his candor.
String.Dest: 比起背后暗害的强盗们我更喜欢他这种光明正大挑明的和我们正面冲突的方式，我希望更多的强盗能学到他的坦率。

String.Source: The Silver-Bloods are willing to offer gold for this pile of dirt that is the target of constant Forsworn raids...and Ainethach said "No?"
String.Dest: 就算这烂泥坑里装满了弃誓者，银血家族也很乐意为它付上一笔钱买下它……但艾尼塔克那家伙的回答居然是"不"？

String.Source: I mean, let's be serious. If a bunch of smelly savages want your land, how valuable can it be?
String.Dest: 好了，大家认真一点。如果一坨野蛮人要占据你的土地，那土地还能值钱？

String.Source: Huzzah! The Draugr is dead and now the miners can go back to a life of dangerous labor for menial pay! We did it!
String.Dest: 乌拉！尸鬼已经死完了，而矿场又重回正轨。现在危险的日子一去不回！我们做到了！

String.Source: This poor, sweet old hag. All she wants is to get her tower back so she can go back to turning men into monsters. Is that too much to ask?
String.Dest: 这个可怜又可爱的女巫. 她只求要回她的塔楼继续回去进行把人变成怪物的勾当。难道她要求过分么？

String.Source: Wow, I can't believe the Gildergreen's restored. And all it took was sap from the Eldergleam. It's like some kind of strange tree incest.
String.Dest: 哇哦，我简直无法相信翠苒树复活了，所需的只是古藤圣所的树液。像是树之间的通亲之类的奇怪的事情一样。

String.Source: I think Danica has a point. This sapling won't bring nearly as much glory to her pockets...I mean, Kynareth as the old tree.
String.Dest: 我觉得Danica有道理。种子不会带来和她匹敌往日的荣耀。我的意思是，无论是对吉娜莱丝还是那颗老树。

String.Source: We're incredibly far east for a Forsworn camp. Just how much of Skyrim do they think is there's anyway? Not that I blame them for fudging the maps.
String.Dest: 为了找一个弃誓者营地我们已经向东走得太远了吧。我不是在责怪他们捏造地图。但是他们到底认为天际有多少土地需要我们去探寻？
